src: 时间就在我们身边，影响着我们做的每一件事，但却很难理解。 数千年来，时间一直是宗教、哲学和科学学者的研究对象。 我们所经历的时间是一系列从未来到现在再到过去的事件。 时间也是我们用来比较事件持续时间（长度）的方式。 你可以通过观察重复的周期性事件来记录时间的流逝。周期性事件是指有规律地一次又一次发生的事。
mt: Time is all around us, affecting everything we do, but it is hard to understand. For thousands of years, time has been the subject of study by religious, philosophical, and scientific scholars. The time we experience is a series of events from the future to the present and then to the past. Time is also the way we compare the duration (length) of events. You can record the passage of time by observing recurring periodic events. Periodic events are events that happen regularly, one after another.
ref: Time is something that is all around us, and affects everything we do, yet is difficult to understand. Time has been studied by religious, philosophical, and scientific scholars for thousands of years. We experience time as a series of events passing from the future through the present to the past. Time is also how we compare the duration (length) of events. You can mark the passing of time yourself by observing the repetition of a cyclical event. A cyclical event is something that happens again and again regularly.

src: 传统上，王位继承人在完成学业后会直接入伍。 不过，查尔斯入读了剑桥大学三一学院，他在那里学习了人类学和考古学，后来又学习了历史学，获得了 2:2 学位（二等二学位）。 查尔斯是第一个获得学位的英国王室成员。
mt: Traditionally, heirs to the throne would enter the military after completing their education. However, Charles attended Cambridge University's Trinity College, where he studied anthropology and archaeology, and later history, earning a 2:2 degree (a second-class degree).
ref: Traditionally, the heir to the throne would go straight into the military after finishing school. However, Charles went to university at Trinity College, Cambridge where he studied Anthropology and Archaeology, and later History, earning a 2:2 (a lower second class degree). Charles was the first member of the British Royal Family to be awarded a degree.

src: 传统上，王位继承人在完成学业后会直接入伍。 不过，查尔斯入读了剑桥大学三一学院，他在那里学习了人类学和考古学，后来又学习了历史学，获得了 2:2 学位（二等二学位）。 查尔斯是第一个获得学位的英国王室成员。

ref: Traditionally, the heir to the throne would go straight into the military after finishing school. However, Charles went to university at Trinity College, Cambridge where he studied Anthropology and Archaeology, and later History, earning a 2:2 (a lower second class degree). Charles was the first member of the British Royal Family to be awarded a degree.

src: 重新征服丹麦法区域 (Danelaw) 后，英格兰经历了很长的和平时期。 然而，在 991 年，埃塞尔雷德面对的是一个世纪前的古斯鲁姆舰队之后最大的维京舰队。 这支舰队由奥拉夫·特里格瓦松率领。他是挪威人，志在将挪威从丹麦手中夺回来。 在初期军事失利之后，埃塞尔雷德终于与奥拉夫达成协议，奥拉夫重返挪威试图夺回王位，但算不上成功。
mt: After reconquering the Danelaw, England experienced a long period of peace. However, in 991, Ethelred faced the largest Viking fleet since the fleet of Guthrum in 991. This fleet was led by Olaf Tryggvason, a Norwegian who sought to retake Norway from the Danes. After initial military setbacks, Ethelred finally reached an agreement with Olaf, who returned to Norway to try to retake the throne, but was not successful.
ref: England had experienced a long period of peace after the reconquest of the Danelaw. However in 991 Ethelred was faced with a Viking fleet larger than any since Guthrum's a century earlier. This fleet was led by Olaf Trygvasson, a Norwegian with ambitions to reclaim his country from Danish domination. After initial military setbacks, Ethelred was able to agree to terms with Olaf, who returned to Norway to try to gain his kingdom with mixed success.

src: 15 世纪前后，爱沙尼亚北部深受德国文化的影响。 一些德国修道士想让上帝更接近本国人，所以他们发明了爱沙尼亚文字语言。 它是在德语字母表中加了一个字母“Õ/õ”。 随着时间的推移，许多德语外来词与原有词汇合并。这就是启蒙运动的开始。
mt: 15th century, Estonia was heavily influenced by German culture. Some German monks wanted to bring God closer to their countrymen, so they invented the Estonian language. It was a German alphabet with an extra letter “Õ/õ”. Over time, many German loanwords merged with existing vocabulary. This is the beginning of the Enlightenment.
ref: "Around the 15th century, northern Estonia was under great cultural influence of Germany. Some German monks wanted to bring God closer to the native people, so they invented the Estonian literal language. It was based on the German alphabet and one character ""Õ/õ"" was added. As time passed, many words that were borrowed from German coalesced. This was the beginning of enlightenment."

src: 对于说印地语的人口数，有不同的说法。据估计，印地语是世界上第二到第四最常用的语言。 母语人数取决于紧密相关的方言是否计算在内。 据估计，会说这种语言的人数量范围在 3.4 亿到 5 亿之间，而能听懂这种语言的人则多达 8 亿。 印度语和乌尔都语有着相似的词汇，但文字的书写方式不同；在日常对话中，这两种语言通常可以交流互通。
mt: There are differing estimates of the number of people who speak Hindi. It is estimated to be the second to fourth most widely spoken language in the world. The number of native speakers depends on whether closely related dialects are counted in. It is estimated that the number of people who speak this language ranges from 340 million to 500 million, while the number of people who understand this language is up to 800 million. Hindi and Urdu have similar vocabulary, but different writing systems; these two languages are usually mutually intelligible in daily conversation.
ref: There are varying estimates for how many people speak Hindi. It is estimated to be between the second and fourth most commonly spoken language in the world. The number of native speakers varies depending on whether or not very closely related dialects are counted. Estimates range from 340 million to 500 million speakers, and as many as 800 million people can understand the language. Hindi and Urdu are similar in vocabulary but different in script; in everyday conversations, speakers of both languages can usually understand each other.

src: 韩文字母是唯一一个特意发明供日常使用的字母表，是于 1444 年世宗皇帝（1418 - 1450）统治时期所发明的。 世宗大王为朝鲜王朝的第四任君主，也是最受推崇的君主之一。 他最初将韩语字母发音表命名为“训民正音”，意思是“用于教导人民的正确发音”。
mt: The Korean alphabet is the only alphabet ever to be invented for everyday use. It was invented in 1444 during the reign of King Sejong, the fourth ruler of the Joseon Dynasty and one of the most revered rulers in Korean history. He originally named the alphabet "Hunminjeongeum", meaning "Correct Sounds for the Instruction of the People".
ref: "Hangeul is the only purposely invented alphabet in popular daily use. The alphabet was invented in 1444 during the reign of King Sejong (1418 – 1450). King Sejong was the fourth king of the Joseon Dynasty and is one of the most highly regarded. He originally named the Hangeul alphabet Hunmin Jeongeum, which means ""the correct sounds for the instruction of the people""."

src: 韩文字母是唯一一个特意发明供日常使用的字母表，是于 1444 年世宗皇帝（1418 - 1450）统治时期所发明的。 世宗大王为朝鲜王朝的第四任君主，也是最受推崇的君主之一。 他最初将韩语字母发音表命名为“训民正音”，意思是“用于教导人民的正确发音”。

King Sejong was the fourth king of the Joseon Dynasty and is one of the most highly regarded. He originally named the Hangeul alphabet Hunmin Jeongeum, which means ""the correct sounds for the instruction of the people""."

src: 关于梵语的起源有很多说法。其中之一是雅利安人从西方移民到印度，将自己的语言带到这里。 梵语是一种古老的语言，能与欧洲的拉丁语相媲美。 世界上已知最早的书是用梵文写的。《奥义书》编撰完成后，梵文由于等级制度的原因逐渐消失。 梵语是一种博大精深的语言，也是许多现代印度语的起源，就像拉丁语是法语和西班牙语等欧洲语言的起源一样。
mt: There are many theories about the origin of Sanskrit. One of them is that the Aryans migrated from the west to India and brought their language with them. Sanskrit is an ancient language that can be compared to Latin. The oldest known book is written in Sanskrit. After the compilation of the Upanishads, Sanskrit gradually disappeared due to the hierarchical system. Sanskrit is a profound language, and it is the origin of many modern Indian languages, just as Latin is the origin of French and Spanish, etc.
ref: There are many theories to how Sanskrit came into existence. One of them is about an Aryan migration from the west into India who brought their language with them. Sanskrit is an ancient language and is comparable to the Latin language spoken in Europe. The earliest known book in the world was written in Sanskrit. After the compilation of Upanishads, Sanskrit just faded due to hierarchy. Sanskrit is a very complex and rich language, which has served to be the source for many modern Indian languages, just like Latin is the source for European languages like French and Spanish.

src: 木卫一的重力会对我产生怎样的作用力？如果你站在木卫一表面，你的体重会比在地球上轻。 一个在地球上重 200 磅（90公斤）的人，在木卫一上的重量约为 36 磅（16公斤）。因此重力理所当然地对你产生了较小的牵引力。
mt: What will gravity do to me on Io? If you were standing on the surface of Io, your weight would be less than it is on Earth. A person who weighs 200 pounds (90 kilograms) on Earth would weigh about 36 pounds (16 kilograms) on Io. So gravity would naturally pull you with less force.
ref: How would Io's gravity pull on me? If you stood on the surface of Io, you would weigh less than you do on Earth. A person who weighs 200 pounds (90kg) on Earth would weigh about 36 pounds (16kg) on Io. So the gravity, of course, pulls less on you.

src: 月球的表面由岩石和灰尘组成。月球的外层叫做地壳。 地壳近侧厚约 70 公里，远侧厚约 100 公里。 阴暗面下面的地壳薄一些，高地下的地壳厚一些。 因为地壳更薄，所以近的一面可能会有更多的阴暗部，熔岩更容易上升到地表。
mt: The moon's surface is made of rock and dust. The moon's outer layer is called the crust. The crust is about 70 kilometers thick on the near side and about 100 kilometers thick on the far side. The crust is thinner under the dark side, and thicker under the highlands. Because the crust is thinner, the near side may have more dark areas, and lava is more likely to rise to the surface.
ref: The surface of the Moon is made of rocks and dust. The outer layer of the Moon is called the crust. The crust is about 70 km thick on the near side and 100 km thick on the far side. It is thinner under the maria and thicker under the highlands. There may be more maria on the near side because the crust is thinner. It was easier for lava to rise up to the surface.

src: 许多人梦想着人类有一天可以移民到其他星球，探索其他世界。有些人想知道宇宙有什么；有些人相信其他行星上可能有外星人或其他生命。 但如果这种情况真的发生了，那么它很可能在很长一段时间内都不会再发生了。这些恒星非常分散，“相邻”的恒星相隔数万亿英里。 也许有一天，你的子孙后代会生活在外星世界，猜测着他们远古的祖先当时过得是怎样的一种生活。
mt: Many people dream of a day when humans can migrate to other planets and explore other worlds. Some want to know what the universe is like; some believe that there may be extraterrestrials or other life on other planets. But if such a situation really happened, it would probably not happen again for a very long time. These stars are very dispersed, and the "adjacent" stars are separated by billions of miles. Maybe one day your descendants will live on an alien world, speculating about how their ancestors lived back then.
ref: "Many people dream of the day when humans can travel to another star and explore other worlds, some people wonder what's out there some belive that aliens or other life may live on another plant. But, if this ever does happen probably won't happen for a very long time. The stars are so spread out that there are trillions of miles between stars that are ""neighbors"". Maybe one day, your great grandchildren will be standing atop an alien world wondering about their ancient ancestors?"

src: 太阳并没有像地球那样可以站在上面的地壳。整个太阳是由气体、火和等离子体组成的。 当你距离太阳中心越远，气体就越稀薄。 我们看到的太阳外部称作光球层，意即“光之球”。
mt: The sun does not stand on the Earth's crust like the Earth. The entire sun is composed of gas, fire, and plasma. The farther you are from the sun's center, the more rarefied the gas is. The outer part of the sun that we see is called the photosphere, meaning "sphere of light."
ref: "The Sun doesn't have a crust like the Earth that you can stand on. The whole Sun is made out of gases, fire, and plasma. The gas becomes thinner as you go farther from the center of the Sun. The outer-part we see when we look at the Sun is called the photosphere, which means ""ball of light""."

src: 约三千年后，也就是在1610年，意大利的天文学家伽利略·伽利莱（Galileo Galilei）使用望远镜观测天体，发现金星具有着与月球一致的相位。 相变的发生是因为金星（或月球）只有面向太阳的一边被照到。金星的相变支持了哥白尼的理论，即行星围绕太阳旋转。 然后，几年后的 1639 年，一位名叫耶利米·霍罗克斯 (Jeremiah Horrocks) 的英国天文学家观测到了一次金星凌日。
mt: 3,000 years later, in 1610, Italian astronomer Galileo Galilei used a telescope to observe the planets, discovering that Venus had phases like the moon. The phases of Venus supported the theory of Copernicus that the planets revolve around the sun. Then, a few years later, in 1639, an English astronomer named Jeremiah Horrocks observed a transit of Venus.
ref: About three thousand years later, in 1610, Italian astronomer Galileo Galilei used a telescope to observe that Venus has phases, just as the moon does. Phases happen because only the side of Venus (or of the Moon) facing the Sun is lighted. The phases of Venus supported the theory of Copernicus that the planets go around the Sun. Then, a few years later in 1639, an English astronomer named Jeremiah Horrocks observed a transit of Venus.

src: 约三千年后，也就是在1610年，意大利的天文学家伽利略·伽利莱（Galileo Galilei）使用望远镜观测天体，发现金星具有着与月球一致的相位。 相变的发生是因为金星（或月球）只有面向太阳的一边被照到。金星的相变支持了哥白尼的理论，即行星围绕太阳旋转。 然后，几年后的 1639 年，一位名叫耶利米·霍罗克斯 (Jeremiah Horrocks) 的英国天文学家观测到了一次金星凌日。
mt: 3,000 years later, in 1610, Italian astronomer Galileo Galilei used a telescope to observe the planets, discovering that Venus had phases like the moon. The phases of Venus supported the theory of Copernicus that the planets revolve around the sun. Then, a few years later, in 1639, an English astronomer named Jeremiah Horrocks observed a transit of Venus.
ref: About three thousand years later, in 1610, Italian astronomer Galileo Galilei used a telescope to observe that Venus has phases, just as the moon does. Phases happen because only the side of Venus (or of the Moon) facing the Sun is lighted. The phases of Venus supported the theory of Copernicus that the planets go around the Sun. Then, a few years later in 1639, an English astronomer named Jeremiah Horrocks observed a transit of Venus.

src: 亚马逊河是世界上第二长，也是最大的河流。 它的水量是第二大河流的 8 倍以上。 亚马逊河也是地球上最宽的河流，有些河段的宽度可达6英里。 亚马逊河占全世界所有河流的入海流量的 20%。 亚马孙河干流长 6387 公里（3980 英里）。河水来自数千条较小的支流。
mt: The Amazon River is the second longest and largest river in the world. Its flow is more than eight times that of the second largest river. The Amazon River is also the widest river on Earth, with some stretches being 6 miles wide. The Amazon River carries 20% of the world's freshwater into the ocean. The Amazon River's main stem is 3,980 miles long. The river's water comes from thousands of smaller tributaries.
ref: The Amazon River is the second longest and the biggest river on Earth. It carries more than 8 times as much water as the second biggest river. The Amazon is also the widest river on Earth, at times six miles wide. A full 20 percent of the water that pours out of the planet's rivers into the oceans comes from the Amazon. The main Amazon River is 6,387 km (3,980 miles). It collects water from thousands of smaller rivers.

src: 百分之十八的委内瑞拉人失业，而大部分就业者是非正规经济从业人员。 三分之二的委内瑞拉人就是这样从事服务行业，接近四分之一的人从事工业，五分之一的人在农业行业里工作。 委内瑞拉是石油净出口国，尽管只有百分之一的人在石油行业工作，但石油行业仍然是该国的重要产业。
mt: 18 percent of Venezuelans are unemployed, and most of those who are employed are in the informal economy. Two-thirds of Venezuelans are in the service industry, nearly a quarter are in industry, and one-fifth are in agriculture. Venezuela is a net exporter of oil, although only one percent of the population works in the oil industry, the oil industry remains an important industry in the country.
ref: Eighteen percent of Venezuelans are unemployed, and most of those who are employed work in the informal economy. Two thirds of Venezuelans who work do so in the service sector, nearly a quarter work in industry and a fifth work in agriculture. An important industry for Venezuelans is oil, where the country is a net exporter, even though only one percent work in the oil industry.

src: 恒星会散发光和热，这是因为氢原子结合（或聚变）在一起形成更重的元素时产生了能量。 科学家目前致力打造一种可通过相同的方式产生能量的反应堆。 然而，这是一个很难解决的问题。需要很多年的时间，我们才能看到实用的聚变反应堆建成。
mt: Stars emit light and heat because energy is released when hydrogen atoms combine (or fuse) to form heavier elements. Scientists are currently working to build a reactor that can produce energy in the same way. However, this is a difficult problem to solve. It will take many years before we see practical fusion reactors built.
ref: Stars give off light and heat because of the energy made when hydrogen atoms are merged (or fused) together to form heavier elements. Scientists are working to create a reactor that can make energy in the same way. This, however, is a very hard problem to solve and will take many years before we see useful fusion reactors built.

src: 元素和化合物可以在发生化学变化的情况下改变物态。 气态氮仍具有与液态氮相同的性质。液态氮的密度更大，但是分子还是一样的。 另一个例子是水。化合物水是由两个氢原子和一个氧原子组成的。 无论是气体、液体还是固体，它的分子结构都是一样的。 虽然它的物理状态可能会改变，但化学状态保持不变。
mt: Elements and compounds can change state while undergoing chemical changes. Gaseous nitrogen still has the same properties as liquid nitrogen. Liquid nitrogen has a higher density, but the molecules are still the same. Another example is water. The compound water is composed of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom. No matter if it is a gas, liquid, or solid, its molecular structure is the same. Although its physical state may change, its chemical state remains the same.
ref: Elements and compounds can move from one state to another and not change. Nitrogen as a gas still has the same properties as liquid nitrogen. The liquid state is denser but the molecules are still the same. Water is another example. The compound water is made up of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom. It has the same molecular structure whether it is a gas, liquid, or solid. Although its physical state may change, its chemical state remains the same.

src: 在独立战争期间，十三个州最初根据《联邦条例》组成了弱小的中央政府（国会是其唯一的组成部分）。 国会没有征税的权力，而且因为没有国家行政部门或司法部门，国会只能依赖州政府执行所有法案，而州政府又经常不配合。 它也没有权力推翻各州之间的税法和关税。 这些条款必须得到所有州的一致同意才能进行修改，而各州对待中央政府的态度十分轻慢，以至于其州立代表经常缺席。
mt: During the Revolutionary War, the original thirteen states formed a weak central government (Congress was its only component) under the Articles of Confederation. Congress had no power to tax and, because there was no national executive or judiciary, it had to rely on the states to enforce its laws, which the states often ignored. It also had no power to overturn state tax and tariff laws. These provisions had to be unanimously approved by all the states, and the states treated the central government so lightly that their state representatives often failed to show up.
ref: During the Revolutionary War, the thirteen states first formed a weak central government—with the Congress being its only component—under the Articles of Confederation. Congress lacked any power to impose taxes, and, because there was no national executive or judiciary, it relied on state authorities, who were often uncooperative, to enforce all its acts. It also had no authority to override tax laws and tariffs between states. The Articles required unanimous consent from all the states before they could be amended and states took the central government so lightly that their representatives were often absent.

These provisions had to be unanimously approved by all the states, and the states treated the central government so lightly that their state representatives often failed to show up.

Congress lacked any power to impose taxes, and, because there was no national executive or judiciary, it relied on state authorities, who were often uncooperative, to enforce all its acts. src: 如果你看过电影《国家宝藏》，你可能会以为《独立宣言》背面会画着一份藏宝图。 然而事实并非如此。虽然这份文件的背面写了一些东西，但并是不一份藏宝图。 《独立宣言》背面写着“Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776（《独立宣言》原件，1776 年 7 月 4 日）”的字样。文字写在文件底部，是倒过来的。 虽然没有人能确定作者是谁，但这个大型羊皮纸文档（尺寸为 29¾ 英寸乘以 24½ 英寸）据称在刚写成的时候是卷起来存放的。 因此，很可能这个符号只是作为一个标签添加的。
mt: If you've seen the movie National Treasure, you might think the back of the Declaration of Independence would be a treasure map. But that's not the case. While the back of the document does have some writing, it's not a treasure map. The back of the Declaration of Independence reads "Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776" in reverse. While no one knows who wrote it, the large vellum document (29¾ by 24½ inches) is said to have been rolled up when it was first written. So, the symbol may have just been added as a label.
ref: "If you have watched the movie National Treasure, you may think a treasure map was written on the back of the Declaration of Independence. However, that is not true. Although there is something written on the back of the document, it is not a treasure map. Written on the back of the Declaration of Independence were the words ""Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776"". The text appears on the bottom of the document, upside down. While no one knows for certain who wrote it, it is known that early in its life, the large parchment document (it measures 29¾ inches by 24½ inches) was rolled up for storage. So, it is likely that the notation was added simply as a label."

src: 在国家独立初期，新加坡植物园发挥其专业知识所长，帮助该岛成为了一座热带“花园城市”。 1981 年，卓锦万代兰被选为该国的国花。它是兰花的杂交品种。
mt: In its early years as an independent nation, Singapore Botanic Gardens used its expertise to help the island become a tropical "garden city." In 1981, the orchid Dendrobium 'Christine' was chosen as the country's national flower. It is a hybrid orchid.
ref: Early in the nation's independence, Singapore Botanic Gardens' expertise helped to transform the island into a tropical Garden City. In 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, an orchid hybrid, was chosen as the nation's national flower.

mt: In its early years as an independent nation, Singapore Botanic Gardens used its expertise to help the island become a tropical "garden city." In 1981, the orchid Dendrobium 'Christine' was chosen as the country's national flower. It is a hybrid orchid.
ref: Early in the nation's independence, Singapore Botanic Gardens' expertise helped to transform the island into a tropical Garden City. In 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, an orchid hybrid, was chosen as the nation's national flower.

src: 尽管石制金字塔的建造一直持续到古王国末期，但吉萨金字塔的宏大的规模和高超的建造技术从未被超越。 新王国时期的古埃及人惊叹于其前辈的已有一千多年历史的纪念碑。
mt: Although construction of stone pyramids continued into the late Old Kingdom, the grand scale and high level of craftsmanship of the Great Pyramid of Giza were never surpassed. The ancient Egyptians of the New Kingdom were awed by the monuments of their predecessors, which had been built over a millennium earlier.
ref: Although pyramid-building in stone continued until the end of the Old Kingdom, the pyramids of Giza were never surpassed in their size and the technical excellence of their construction. New Kingdom ancient Egyptians marvelled at their predecessors monuments, which were then well over a thousand year old.

src: 每年 10 月前后，大约有 150 万只食草动物从北部山区出发，穿过马拉河，前往雨水充足的南部平原。 然后，在四月左右的雨季之后，从西部回到北部，再次穿越马拉河。 塞伦盖蒂（Serengeti）地区包括塞伦盖蒂（Serengeti ）国家公园、坦桑尼亚的恩戈罗恩戈罗（Ngorongoro）自然保护区、马斯瓦（Maswa）野生动物保护区以及肯尼亚的马赛马拉（Maasai Mara）国家保护区。
mt: 150,000 wildebeest, zebras, and gazelles migrate through the Mara River in October and November, and then return in April and May. The Serengeti ecosystem includes the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area, the Maswa Game Reserve, and the Maasai Mara National Reserve.
ref: Every year around October nearly 1.5 million herbivores travel towards the southern plains, crossing the Mara River, from the northern hills for the rains. And then back to the north through the west, once again crossing the Mara river, after the rains in around April. The Serengeti region contains the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and Maswa Game Reserve in Tanzania and the Maasai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.

src: 对法作战结束后，德国又开始为入侵不列颠岛做准备。 德国将此次袭击的代号定为“海狮行动”。英国军队从敦刻尔克撤退时失去了大部分重型武器和补给，元气大伤。 但皇家海军还是比德国海军（“Kriegsmarine”）强得多，可以摧毁任何跨越英吉利海峡的入侵舰队。 然而，很少有皇家海军舰艇在潜在的入侵路线附近驻扎，因为海军将领们担心舰艇会被德国的空袭击沉。
mt: After the end of the Battle of France, Germany began preparing for the invasion of Britain.  The code name for this attack was "Operation Sealion".  The British Army had lost most of its heavy weapons and supplies in the retreat from Dunkirk, but the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy ("Kriegsmarine"), and could sink any invasion fleet crossing the English Channel.  However, few Royal Navy ships were stationed near the potential invasion route, as naval commanders were concerned that the ships would be sunk by German air attacks.
ref: With the battle for France over, Germany began to get ready to invade the island of Britain. Germany code-named the attack “Operation Sealion”. Most of the British Army's heavy weapons and supplies had been lost when it evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was fairly weak. But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (“Kriegsmarine”) and could have destroyed any invasion fleet sent across the English Channel. However, very few Royal Navy ships were based near the likely invasion routes as the admirals were afraid they would be sunk by German air attack.

src: 让我们先来解释一下意大利的计划。意大利基本上属于德国和日本的“小兄弟”。 该国陆军和海军都比较弱，尽管他们在战争开始前不久建造了四艘新舰船。 意大利的主要目标是非洲国家。为了夺取这些国家，他们需要一个军队基地，以便军队可以驶穿地中海，入侵非洲。 为此，他们不得不将英国在埃及的基地和船舰撤出。除了采取这些行动，意大利的战舰本不应该有所行动。 现在来看日本。和英国一样，日本是一个岛国。
mt: Let's start with Italy's plan. Italy is basically Germany and Japan's "little brother". Its army and navy are weak, despite the fact that they built four new ships not long before the war began. Italy's main target is African countries. To take these countries, they need a military base so that their troops can sail through the Mediterranean and invade Africa. For this, they had to withdraw the British base and ships in Egypt. Besides taking these actions, Italy's warships should not have done anything. Now let's look at Japan. Like Britain, Japan is an island nation.
ref: "Let's start with an explanation about Italy's plans. Italy was mainly the ""little brother"" of Germany and Japan. It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although they had just built four new ships right before the beginning of the war. Italy's main goals were African countries. To capture those countries, they would need to have a troop launching pad, so as troops could sail across the Mediterranean Sea and invade Africa. For that, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides those actions, Italy's battleships were not supposed to do anything else. Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain."

src: 让我们先来解释一下意大利的计划。意大利基本上属于德国和日本的“小兄弟”。 该国陆军和海军都比较弱，尽管他们在战争开始前不久建造了四艘新舰船。 意大利的主要目标是非洲国家。为了夺取这些国家，他们需要一个军队基地，以便军队可以驶穿地中海，入侵非洲。 为此，他们不得不将英国在埃及的基地和船舰撤出。除了采取这些行动，意大利的战舰本不应该有所行动。 现在来看日本。和英国一样，日本是一个岛国。
mt: Let's start with Italy's plan. Italy is basically Germany and Japan's "little brother". Its army and navy are weak, despite the fact that they built four new ships not long before the war began. Italy's main target is African countries. To take these countries, they need a military base so that their troops can sail through the Mediterranean and invade Africa. For this, they had to withdraw the British base and ships in Egypt. Besides taking these actions, Italy's warships should not have done anything. Now let's look at Japan. Like Britain, Japan is an island nation.
ref: "Let's start with an explanation about Italy's plans. Italy was mainly the ""little brother"" of Germany and Japan. It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although they had just built four new ships right before the beginning of the war. Italy's main goals were African countries. To capture those countries, they would need to have a troop launching pad, so as troops could sail across the Mediterranean Sea and invade Africa. For that, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides those actions, Italy's battleships were not supposed to do anything else. Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain."

src: 诺曼底登陆和随后的战斗解放了法国北部，但南部仍然没有解放。 它由“维希”法国人统治。这些法国人在 1940 年与德国人达成了和平协议，不反抗侵略者，而是和他们合作。 1940 年 8 月 15 日，盟军攻入法国南部，这次进攻被称为“龙骑兵行动”。 仅仅两个星期，美国和自由法国的军队就解放了法国南部，并转向德国。
mt: The Normandy landings and subsequent battles liberated northern France, but the south remained under the control of the “Vichy” French, who had made a peace agreement with the Germans in 1940 and did not resist the invaders, but cooperated with them. On August 15, 1940, the Allies entered southern France, this invasion was called “Operation Dragoon”. Only two weeks later, American and Free French troops liberated southern France and turned towards Germany.
ref: "The D-Day landings and the following battles had freed the north of France, but the south still wasn't free. It was ruled by the ""Vichy"" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them. On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called ""Operation Dragoon"". In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany."

src: 潜水艇是为了在水底下行驶而设计的船，而且潜水艇在水面下停留的时间较长。 第一次世界大战和第二次世界大战期间都使用了潜水艇。 那时它们的速度很慢，射击范围也非常有限。 在战争开始时，它们大多在海面上航行，但随着雷达的发展和精确度的提高，潜艇被迫潜入水下以免被发现。 德国潜艇被称为 U 型潜艇。德国人非常擅长导航和操作潜艇。 由于德国人在潜艇方面很成功，他们在战后不获托管大量潜艇。
mt: Submarines are designed to operate underwater and stay submerged for long periods of time. They were used extensively during both World War I and World War II. At the beginning of the wars, they mostly operated on the surface, but as radar technology improved and became more accurate, submarines were forced to submerge to avoid detection. German submarines were called U-boats. The Germans were very good at navigation and operating submarines. Because the Germans were so successful with submarines, they were not given many of them after the war.
ref: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.

src: 到了 1939 年 9 月 17 日，波兰的防线已经被攻破，剩下的唯一希望就是沿着罗马尼亚桥头堡撤退和改编军队。 然而，这些计划几乎在一夜之间被弃如敝履，在违反《里加和平条约》、《苏联波兰互不侵犯条约》及其他双边及多边国际条约，入侵波兰的东部地区之后，超过 80 万名苏联红军入境，并在白俄罗斯和乌克兰筑起阵地。
mt: By September 17, 1939, Poland's front line had been breached, and the only hope was to retreat along the Romanian bridgehead and reorganize the army. However, these plans were almost abandoned overnight after the violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other bilateral and multilateral international treaties, when more than 800,000 Soviet Red Army troops entered Poland's eastern regions and built up positions in Belarus and Ukraine.
ref: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.

src: 意大利人在北非的处境几乎从一开始就不甚理想。1940 年 6 月 10 日，意大利宣战后不到一周，英国第 11 轻骑兵就占领了利比亚的卡普佐堡。 在巴蒂亚东部的一次伏击中，英军俘虏了意大利第十军的工程兵司令拉图西将军。 6 月 28 日，利比亚总督、墨索里尼的接班人伊塔洛·巴尔博元帅 (Marshal Italo Balbo) 在托布鲁克着陆时被友军误射致死。
mt: The Italians' position in North Africa was never very good to begin with. Less than a week after declaring war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had captured the Capuzzo Fort in Libya. In a surprise attack east of Buerat, the British captured the commander of the Italian Tenth Army's engineers, General Ratii. On June 28, Libya's governor, Italo Balbo, Marshal Mussolini's heir apparent, was killed by friendly fire when he landed at Tobruk.
ref: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

src: 藏传佛教以佛陀的教义为基础，但通过大乘佛教的普世之爱和印度瑜伽的许多技巧得到了拓展。 原则上，藏传佛教是非常简单的。它包括昆达里尼瑜伽、冥想和普世之爱的方法。 在昆达里尼瑜伽中，昆达里尼能量（启迪能量）通过瑜伽姿势、呼吸练习、念语和视觉形象被唤醒。 西藏冥想的核心活动是天瑜伽。通过把不同的神形象化，净化能量通道，激活轮穴，从而达到顿悟的境界。
mt: Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of the Buddha, but expanded through the universal love of Mahayana Buddhism and many techniques of Indian yoga. In principle, Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It includes Kundalini yoga, meditation and methods of universal love. In Kundalini yoga, Kundalini energy (inspirational energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visual images. The core activity of Tibetan meditation is sky yoga. By turning different gods into images, purifying energy channels, activating acupoints, and reaching the state of enlightenment.
ref: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

src: 节目于当地时间晚上 8:30 (15.00 UTC) 开始。 全国各地的著名歌手都唱祈祷歌献给 Shri Shyam。 当晚由歌手桑朱·沙玛（Sanju Sharma）开场演出，随后是贾伊·尚卡尔·乔杜里 （Jai Shankar Choudhary）出场。也演唱了 chhappan bhog 祈祷歌。歌手拉朱·坎戴尔瓦尔（Raju Khandelwal） 同他一起进行了表演。 然后，拉卡·辛格带头唱了拜赞歌。 108 碟珍馐奉纳（Chhappan Bhog）（在印度教中，Chhappan Bhog 指供奉神灵的56 种不同食物，其中包括糖果、水果、坚果、菜品等物）供奉给 Baba Shyam。 拉卡·辛格 (Lakkha Singh) 还介绍了 chhappan bhog bhajan。歌手 Raju Khandelwal 陪同他身边。
mt: The program began at 8:30 pm local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers from all over the country sang prayers to Shri Shyam. Sanju Sharma opened the show, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary, who also sang the chhappan bhog prayer. Raju Khandelwal performed with him. Then, Lakkha Singh led the praise song. 108 Chhappan Bhog (In Hinduism, Chhappan Bhog refers to the offering of 56 different foods to the gods, including candy, fruit, nuts, and vegetables) was offered to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh also introduced the chhappan bhog bhajan. Singer Raju Khandelwal was by his side.
ref: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

src: 世界著名的太阳马戏团上演了一场特别表演，为庆祝活动拉开了序幕。 紧随其后的是伊斯坦布尔国家交响乐团 (Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra)、一支禁卫军乐队以及歌手法提赫·埃尔科克 (Fatih Erkoc) 和穆斯林·古尔斯 (Muslum Gurses)。 然后，旋转的苦行僧出现在舞台上。 土耳其歌剧女歌唱家茜泽·阿克苏 （Sezen Aksu）与意大利男高音亚历山德罗·沙费纳（Alessandro Safina）和希腊歌手哈里斯·阿莱克修（Haris Alexiou）同台表演。 作为压轴，土耳其舞蹈团”安纳托利亚之火“表演了节目《特洛伊》。
mt: The world-famous Sun Circus put on a special performance to kick off the festivities. The Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a military band, and singers Fatih Erkoc and Muslum Gurses followed. Then, the whirling dervishes appeared on stage. Turkish opera singer Sezen Aksu performed with Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. The Anatolian Fire Dance Troupe closed the show with a performance of "Troy."
ref: "The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show ""Troy""."

src: "因为乘客在90度（F）度的高温下等待，他们得以领取了分发的水。 消防队长斯科特·库恩斯表示：“圣塔克拉拉当天十分燥热，温度得有 90 多华氏度高。"" 被困在过山车上的每分每秒都很不舒服，可以毫不夸张地说，我们花了至少一个小时才把第一个人从过山车上救下来。”"
mt: "Because passengers were waiting in 90-degree heat, they were able to receive the water that was being distributed. Fire Chief Scott Kouns said, "It was very hot in Santa Clara on that day, with temperatures in the 90s. "Every second on that roller coaster was uncomfortable, and we had to spend at least an hour to get the first person off the roller coaster.""
ref: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""

mt: "Because passengers were waiting in 90-degree heat, they were able to receive the water that was being distributed. Fire Chief Scott Kouns said, "It was very hot in Santa Clara on that day, with temperatures in the 90s. "Every second on that roller coaster was uncomfortable, and we had to spend at least an hour to get the first person off the roller coaster.""
ref: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""

src: 最新公报显示，海平面的读数表明已经发生过海啸。帕果帕果和纽埃岛附近确切记录了海啸活动的发生。 汤加 (Tonga) 没有重大损失或人员伤亡报告，但电力暂时中断。据报道，停电让汤加当局无法收到太平洋海啸警报中心 (PTWC) 发出的海啸警报。 尽管警报已解除，坐落于夏威夷海岸线或附近的 14 所学校在整个周三都关闭了。
mt: The latest bulletin shows that sea level readings indicate a tsunami has occurred. The exact location of the tsunami activity was recorded near Pago Pago and Niue Island. Tonga has reported no major losses or injuries, but power is temporarily out. It is reported that the power outage prevented Tonga officials from receiving a tsunami warning from the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center. Although the warning has been canceled, 14 schools along the Hawaiian coastline or nearby were closed for the entire Wednesday.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: 今天，A1GP 新西兰队副驾驶约翰·里德 (Jonny Reid) 在合法驾驶的情况下，成为在有 48 年历史的新西兰奥克兰海港大桥上行驶最快的人，从而创造了历史。 瑞德先生最终驾驶新西兰 A1GP 汽车“黑美人”，以超过 160 千米每小时的速度七次穿过桥梁。 由于“黑美人”的底盘过低，新西兰警方没法用测速雷达枪来检测里德先生的车速。警方唯一一次成功检测到里德先生的车速，是在他将车速降到 160 公里/小时的时候。
mt: Today, A1GP New Zealand driver Jonny Reid became the fastest person to drive over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge in New Zealand, setting a new record. Reid drove the New Zealand A1GP car "Black Beauty" at over 160 km/h seven times over the bridge. Due to the low chassis of "Black Beauty", New Zealand police were unable to use their speed gun to detect Reid's speed. The only time police were able to successfully detect Reid's speed was when he slowed down to 160 km/h.
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

src: 周一晚 10：08，蒙大拿州西部发生中强地震。 美国地质调查局 (USGS) 及美国国家地震信息中心目前还没有收到有关地震破坏的即时报告。 这次地震的震中位于狄龙（Dillon）东北偏北 20 公里（15英里），比尤特（Butte）以南 65 公里处（40英里）。
mt: 10:08 p.m. local time on Monday, a magnitude 5.8 earthquake struck the western part of the state. The U.S. Geological Survey and the National Earthquake Information Center have not yet received immediate reports of damage from the earthquake. The epicenter was located 20 kilometers (15 miles) northeast of Dillon and 65 kilometers (40 miles) south of Butte.
ref: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

src: 伊拉克的阿布格莱布监狱在一次暴乱中着火。 美军接管后，该监狱发现了虐囚事件，自此变得声名狼藉。
mt: A fire broke out at Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison during a riot. The prison became notorious after U.S. forces took over and discovered abuse.
ref: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.

src: 乐队取消了演出活动，并向粉丝们表示了歉意。该场演出原本应在毛伊岛战争纪念体育场举行，预计将有 9000 人参与其中。 乐队的经纪公司是香港管理公司（HK management Inc.），该公司在 9 月 20 日最初取消演出活动时并未给出原因，转天却将之归咎于后勤保障原因。
mt: The band canceled the show and apologized to fans. The show was originally scheduled to take place at the War Memorial Stadium on Maui, with an estimated 9,000 people in attendance. The band's management company, HK management Inc., initially canceled the show on September 20 without giving a reason, then blamed logistical issues the next day.
ref: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.

src: 据报道，由于执法人员不在场，比什凯克街道上的大规模抢劫持续了一夜。 一名观察者形容比什凯克（Bishkek）正在陷入“无政府“ 状态，成群的人们在街上游荡，掠夺商店里的消费品。 几个比什凯克居民将这种违法状态归咎于来自南方的抗议者。
mt: According to reports, law enforcement was not present on the streets of Bishkek overnight as large-scale looting continued. One observer described Bishkek as being in a state of “anarchy,” with groups of people roaming the streets and looting consumer goods from stores. Several Bishkek residents blamed the lawlessness on protesters from the south.
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

src: 此前，铃声 (Ring) 公司 CEO 杰米·西米诺夫曾表示，公司成立之初，他在位于车库的工作室里是听不到门铃响声的。 他称，他制作了一个 WiFi 门铃。 西米诺夫说，2013 年他在《创智赢家》节目中露面后，公司的销售额大增，当时节目组拒绝向这家初创公司投资。 2017 年年末，西米诺夫出现在 QVC 电视销售频道。 铃声 (Ring) 公司还与竞争对手 ADT 安保公司在一起官司中达成了庭外和解。
mt: In the past, Ring CEO Jamie Siminoff said he couldn't hear the doorbell ring in his garage workshop when the company was first founded. He said he made a WiFi doorbell. Siminoff said his sales increased after he appeared on the show "Shark Tank" in 2013, when the show's producers refused to invest in the startup. Siminoff appeared on QVC, a television shopping channel, in late 2017. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competitor ADT.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: PBS 电视台的这个节目荣获二十多项艾美奖，其播出历史仅次于《芝麻街》和《罗杰斯先生的左邻右舍》。 每集节目都会聚焦于特定图书中的某个主题，并通过多个故事对该主题展开探索活动。 每期节目还会向孩子们提供建议，向推荐他们在去图书馆时应当查阅的书籍。 来自水牛城 WNED 电台（“阅读彩虹”节目的主电台）的约翰·格兰特 (John Grant) 说：“阅读彩虹教会了孩子们为什么要阅读，……还有对阅读的热爱——（该节目）鼓励孩子们拿起书来潜心阅读。” 约翰·格兰特等人认为，该节目之所以停播，是因为资金短缺，以及教育节目制作理念发生了转变。
mt: This PBS program has won more than two dozen Emmys, and is second in longevity only to "Sesame Street" and "Mr. Rogers' Neighborhood." Each episode focuses on a particular book and explores its theme through multiple stories. Each episode also offers advice to children on what books to look for in the library. John Grant of WNED in Buffalo, N.Y. (the main station for "Reading Rainbow") says, "Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... and love of reading — (the program) encouraged kids to pick up a book and read." John Grant and others believe the program was canceled because of funding shortages and a shift in educational programming philosophy.
ref: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

src: 阿姆斯特丹市政府和安妮·弗兰克博物馆 (Anne Frank Museum) 的官员表示，这棵树感染了一种真菌，并会对公众健康造成威胁，因为据称它随时都有倒下的危险。 按照原计划，它将在周二被砍倒，但在法庭紧急裁决后幸免遇难。
mt: Officials from the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum said the tree was infected with a fungus and posed a threat to public health, as it was in danger of falling at any time. It was scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was spared after an emergency court ruling.
ref: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

src: 动物解放组织和皇家防止虐待动物协会 (RSPCA) 再次呼吁在澳大利亚所有屠宰场强制安装闭路电视摄像头。 英国皇家防止虐待动物协会 (RSPCA ) 新南威尔士州总督察大卫·奥沙纳西 (David O'Shannessy) 告诉 ABC，在澳大利亚监管和视察屠宰场应该是司空见惯的事。 “对那些照看动物的人，监控系统肯定会是一种强烈的暗示，那就是动物福利才是最重要的。”
mt: The Animal Liberation Front and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for closed-circuit television cameras to be installed in all abattoirs in Australia. Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) New South Wales director of investigations David O'Shannessy told ABC that monitoring and inspecting abattoirs should be a routine matter in Australia. "For those who look after animals, the monitoring system would be a strong hint that animal welfare is the most important thing."
ref: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

src: 今天红湖社区为杰夫·韦斯 (Jeff Weise) 和九名受害者中的三人举行葬礼时有消息称，另一名与 3 月 21 日校园枪击案有关的学生已被捕。 除了确认今天的逮捕外，官方几乎没有发布任何其他信息。 不过，一位知情人士向《明尼阿波利斯星坛报》透露，凶手是红湖部落（Red Lake Tribal）主席弗洛伊德·乔丹（Floyd Jourdain）之子，16 岁的路易斯·乔丹（Louis Jourdain）。 目前既不知道将会被指控何种罪名，也不知道当局是如何认定这个男孩有犯罪嫌疑的，但联邦法院已经开始进行少年犯诉讼程序。
mt: 3/24/2005: Today's funeral for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims of the March 21 school shooting was interrupted by news that another student involved in the shooting has been arrested. Officials have released little information beyond confirming the arrest today. However, an anonymous source told the Minneapolis Star Tribune that the shooter was the son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain, Jr., 16-year-old Louis Jourdain. It is not known what charges will be filed or how authorities determined the boy was a suspect, but the federal court has begun a juvenile delinquency proceeding.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: 今天红湖社区为杰夫·韦斯 (Jeff Weise) 和九名受害者中的三人举行葬礼时有消息称，另一名与 3 月 21 日校园枪击案有关的学生已被捕。 除了确认今天的逮捕外，官方几乎没有发布任何其他信息。 不过，一位知情人士向《明尼阿波利斯星坛报》透露，凶手是红湖部落（Red Lake Tribal）主席弗洛伊德·乔丹（Floyd Jourdain）之子，16 岁的路易斯·乔丹（Louis Jourdain）。 目前既不知道将会被指控何种罪名，也不知道当局是如何认定这个男孩有犯罪嫌疑的，但联邦法院已经开始进行少年犯诉讼程序。
mt: 3/24/2005: Today's funeral for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims of the March 21 school shooting was interrupted by news that another student involved in the shooting has been arrested. Officials have released little information beyond confirming the arrest today. However, an anonymous source told the Minneapolis Star Tribune that the shooter was the son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain, Jr., 16-year-old Louis Jourdain. It is not known what charges will be filed or how authorities determined the boy was a suspect, but the federal court has begun a juvenile delinquency proceeding.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: 抗议活动的组织者称，大约有 10 万人出现在柏林、科隆、汉堡和汉诺威等德国城市。 警方估计柏林有 6,500 名抗议者。 抗议还发生在巴黎、保加利亚的索非亚、立陶宛的维尔纽斯、马耳他的瓦莱塔、爱沙尼亚的塔林以及苏格兰的爱丁堡和格拉斯哥。 伦敦约有 200 人在主要的版权持有者的办公室外抗议。 上一个月，波兰签署《ACTA》时，国内爆发大规模抗议活动，致使波兰政府决定暂缓批准该协议。 拉脱维亚和斯洛伐克都推迟了加入 ACTA 的进程。
mt: 10,000 people were reported to have protested in Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg and Hanover, according to organizers. Police estimated 6,500 protesters in Berlin. Protests also occurred in Paris, Sofia, Vilnius, Valletta, Tallinn, Edinburgh and Glasgow. About 200 people protested outside the offices of major copyright holders in London. Last month, Poland signed ACTA, which sparked large protests in the country, leading the government to delay ratification of the agreement. Latvia and Slovakia have also delayed their processes to join ACTA.
ref: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.

src: 据报道，大约有 60 起 iPod 发生故障、机身过热的情况，共造成 6 起火灾，4 人轻微烧伤。 日本经济产业省 (METI) 表示，他们已经注意到有 27 起事故与该设备有关。 上周，日本经济产业省 (METI) 宣布，苹果公司向该部门通报另外 34 起过热造成的事故，尽管该公司称这些事故“并不严重”。 经济产业省回应称，苹果推迟发布报告“非常令人遗憾”。
mt: 60 iPods have reportedly overheated, causing six fires and four minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) says it has identified 27 incidents involving the device. Last week, Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) announced that Apple had reported another 34 overheating incidents to the department, despite the company saying the incidents were "not serious." The ministry responded that Apple's delay in reporting the incidents was "very regrettable."
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

src: 苹果公司的首席执行官史蒂夫·乔布斯走上舞台，从他的牛仔裤口袋里掏出 iPhone，揭开了这款设备的神秘面纱。 在他时长 2 小时的演讲中，他声称：“现在苹果要重新发明手机，我们现在要创造历史。”
mt: Apple CEO Steve Jobs stepped onto the stage, pulled an iPhone from his jeans pocket, and unveiled the device. In his two-hour presentation, he claimed, "Apple is reinventing the phone, and we're going to create history."
ref: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his 2 hour speech he stated that ""Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today""."

src: 现任参议员、阿根廷第一夫人克里斯蒂娜·费尔南德斯·德·柯克纳 (Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner) 昨晚在距离布宜诺斯艾利斯 50 公里（31英里）的拉普拉塔市 (La Plata) 宣布了其总统竞选资格。 基什内尔女士在阿根廷大剧院宣布她有意参加总统竞选，2005 年也是在这里，她作为布宜诺斯艾利斯省代表开始竞选参议员。
mt: Current Senator and First Lady of Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her candidacy for president last night in La Plata, 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Teatro Colon, where in 2005 she began her campaign for senator as a representative of the province of Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: ACMA 还发现，尽管视频已经在互联网上播放，但《老大哥》（Big Brothe）并未违反在线内容审查的法律，因为该媒体并未保存在《老大哥》的网站上。 《广播服务法》规定了对互联网内容如何监管，但只有实际储存在服务器上的内容才能被视为互联网内容。
mt: ACMA also found that, although the video had been played on the internet, Big Brother had not broken online content regulation laws because the media had not been stored on the Big Brother website. The Broadcasting Services Act regulates how internet content is monitored, but only content actually stored on servers can be considered internet content.
ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

src: 澳大利亚财务部长、最有可能接替总理约翰·霍华德担任自由党领袖的彼得·科斯特洛，对澳大利亚的核电工业表示支持。 科斯特洛先生说，当核能发电在经济上有可行性的时候，澳大利亚应当推进核电的使用。 “如果可以用于商业目的，我们就应该推广这种方式。也就是说，原则上不存在反对核能的理由。”科斯特洛先生说道。
mt: Australian Finance Minister and the most likely successor to Prime Minister John Howard as leader of the Liberal Party, Peter Costello, expressed support for Australia's nuclear power industry. Costello said that if nuclear power is economically viable, Australia should move forward with its use. "If it can be used for commercial purposes, we should promote it. That is to say, there is no principled reason to oppose nuclear power," Costello said.
ref: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

src: 由于一天只颁发十八块奖牌，许多国家的运动员未能登上领奖台。 与奖牌无缘的运动员包括荷兰的安娜·乔彻姆森，她在昨天的女子站姿超级大回转比赛中获得第九名，芬兰的卡特娅·萨里宁则在同一比赛中获得第十名。 澳大利亚选手米切尔·古尔力获得男子站姿超级大回转比赛第十一名。捷克选手奥德里奇·耶利内克获得男子坐姿超级大回转比赛第十六名。 墨西哥选手拉利·委拉斯开兹在男子坐姿超级大回转比赛中获得第 15 名的成绩。新西兰选手亚当·霍尔在男子站姿超级大回转比赛中获得第 9 名的成绩。 波兰男子视障滑雪选手马切吉·克雷泽尔（Maciej Krezel ）和向导安娜·奥加津斯卡（Anna Ogarzynska）在超级大回转比赛中获得第十三名，韩国选手朴钟硕（Jong Seork Park）在男子坐式超级大回转比赛中获得第二十四名。
mt: 18 medals were awarded each day, so many athletes did not get to stand on the podium. Among them were Anna Veith of Austria, who finished ninth in the women's super-G, and Katerina Karusova of Finland, who finished tenth in the same event. Australian Mitchell Gourley finished 11th in the men's super-G, Czech Ondrej Jezek finished 16th in the men's sitting super-G, Mexican Raul Villasenor finished 15th in the men's sitting super-G, New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing super-G, Polish men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished 13th in the super-G, and South Korean Jong Seork Park finished 24th in the men's sitting super-G.
ref: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

src: 审判在伯明翰皇家法院进行，并于 8 月 3 日审结。 现场被捕的主持人否定了袭击，并声称有多达三十个人向他投掷瓶子，他用棍子是为了不让自己受到伤害。 布雷克（Blake）还因企图妨碍司法公正而被定罪。 法官告诉布莱克，他的入狱“几乎是铁定的”。
mt: The trial was held at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The host arrested on the scene denied the attack and claimed that up to thirty people threw bottles at him, and he used the stick to avoid being hurt. Blake was also convicted of attempting to obstruct the course of justice. The judge told Blake that his imprisonment was "almost inevitable".
ref: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."

src: 巴厘岛会议议程中的其他议题还包括拯救世界上现存的森林，分享技术以帮助发展中国家以污染较少的方式发展。 联合国还希望最终成立一项基金，帮助有关国家应对全球变暖的影响。 这些资金可以用于建造防洪房屋、改善水资源管理以及促进农作物多样化。
mt: Other topics on the agenda of the Bali conference include saving the world's remaining forests, sharing technology to help developing countries develop in a less-polluting way. The U.N. also hopes to eventually establish a fund to help affected countries cope with the effects of global warming. The money could be used to build flood-resistant houses, improve water resource management and promote crop diversity.
ref: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.

src: 巴厘岛会议议程中的其他议题还包括拯救世界上现存的森林，分享技术以帮助发展中国家以污染较少的方式发展。 联合国还希望最终成立一项基金，帮助有关国家应对全球变暖的影响。 这些资金可以用于建造防洪房屋、改善水资源管理以及促进农作物多样化。
mt: Other topics on the agenda of the Bali conference include saving the world's remaining forests, sharing technology to help developing countries develop in a less-polluting way. The U.N. also hopes to eventually establish a fund to help affected countries cope with the effects of global warming. The money could be used to build flood-resistant houses, improve water resource management and promote crop diversity.
ref: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.

src: 尼日利亚日前宣布，计划在峰会召开的前一周内加入非洲大陆自由贸易区 (AfCFTA)。 非洲联盟贸易和工业专员艾伯特·穆坎加宣布贝宁将加入联盟。 特派员表示：“我们尚未就原产地规则和关税协定达成一致，但我们现有的框架足以满足 2020 年 7 月 1 日开始贸易的需要。”
mt: Nigeria announced its plan to join the African Continental Free Trade Area (AfCFTA) in the week before the summit. Albert Muchanga, the African Union Trade and Industry Commissioner, announced that Benin would join the union. The envoy said, "We have not yet reached an agreement on the rules of origin and tariffs, but our existing framework is sufficient to meet the needs of trade starting on July 1, 2020."
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: 在亚特兰大期间，她获得了评论界的赞誉，并因创新城市教育而得到表彰。 2009 年，她被授予全国年度校长称号。 在她荣获此头衔之际，亚特兰大的学校在考试成绩上有了很大的提高。 此后不久，《亚特兰大宪法报》发表了一份报告，指出了检测结果存在的问题。 报告显示，考试成绩提升速度快得令人难以置信，并称学校内部发现了问题，但没有根据这一发现采取行动。 此后的证据表明试卷被篡改过，霍尔 (Hall) 和其他 34 名教育官员因此在 2013 年被起诉。
mt: During her tenure in Atlanta, she received praise from the press and was honored for her innovative urban education. In 2009, she was named National Superintendent of the Year. At the time she received the title, Atlanta's schools had made significant gains in test scores. Shortly thereafter, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report that raised questions about the test results. The report showed that the test scores had improved at an unbelievable rate and that the school system had discovered problems internally but had not taken action based on those findings. Subsequent evidence showed that the test had been tampered with, and Hall and 34 other education officials were charged in 2013.
ref: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.

src: 一枚炸弹在总督办公室外爆炸。 两小时内，政府大楼附近又发生了三起炸弹爆炸事件。 一些报道称官方宣布的死亡人数为 8 人，而据官方报道证实，有多达 30 人受伤；但是最终的数字尚未确定。
mt: A bomb exploded outside the governor's office. Three more bomb explosions occurred in the vicinity of the government building in the next two hours. Some reports claim the official death toll is 8, while the official reports confirm up to 30 people were injured; however, the final number is still unknown.
ref: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.

src: 21 岁的杰西（Jesus）于 2017 年 1 月从巴西的帕尔梅拉斯足球俱乐部加盟曼城，据报道其转会费为 2700 万英镑。 从那以后，这位巴西人代表该俱乐部参加了全部比赛中的 53 场，并打进了 24 球。
mt: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City from Brazilian club Palmeiras in January 2017 for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has played in all 53 of the club's matches and scored 24 goals.
ref: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.

src: 当地时间上午约十时，伊斯兰圣城麦加的一家旅馆坍塌了。 这栋楼里住着一些朝圣者，他们是在麦加朝圣前夕来到这座圣城的。 旅馆的客人大多是阿联酋公民。 死亡人数至少为 15 人，预计还会增加。
mt: 15 people were killed when a hotel collapsed in the Islamic holy city of Mecca at around 10 am local time. The hotel was home to some pilgrims who had come to Mecca to perform the Hajj before the start of the pilgrimage. Most of the hotel's guests were UAE citizens. The death toll is expected to rise.
ref: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.

src: 这两颗都超过 1,000 磅的卫星以每小时 17,500 英里的速度飞行，在距离地球 491 英里的上空相撞。 科学家表示，这次碰撞引起的爆炸规模巨大。 他们仍在努力确定这次撞击的规模以及对地球的影响。 美国国防部战略司令部正在追踪残骸。 绘图分析的结果将发布在公网上。
mt: Both were over 1,000 pounds and were flying at 17,500 miles per hour at an altitude of 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion was massive. They are still trying to determine the scale of the impact and its effects on Earth. The U.S. Strategic Command is tracking the debris. The results of the analysis will be published on the public web.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

src: 巴滕位列 2008 年全美最富有 400 人榜单第 190 位，预计其财富达到约 23 亿美元。 他在 1950 年毕业于弗吉尼亚大学艺术与科学学院，并且是该校的重要捐赠者。
mt: 2008 Forbes 400 richest people list ranked him at number 190 with an estimated fortune of $3.3 billion. He graduated from the University of Virginia's College of Arts and Sciences in 1950 and is a major donor to the school.
ref: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.

src: 加利福尼亚州长阿诺德·施瓦辛格签署了一项法案，禁止向未成年人出售或出租暴力电子游戏。 该法案规定在加州销售的暴力电子游戏必须贴上“18”的标签，销售商每违法销售给未成年人一次就会被处以 1000 美元的罚款。
mt: California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed a bill into law that prohibits the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires that violent video games sold in California be labeled with an "18" rating, and retailers will be fined $1,000 for each sale to a minor.
ref: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading ""18"" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense."

src: 杜瓦尔已婚，有两个已经成年的孩子，他并没有给故事的讲述者米勒留下太大印象。 当被要求发表看法时，米勒说：“迈克在听证会上说了很多……我当时正在做准备，所以没听清他在说什么。”
mt: Duval is married with two adult children, and he didn't leave much of an impression on the story's narrator Miller. When asked to comment, Miller said, "Mike said a lot at the hearing...I was preparing, so I didn't hear what he was saying."
ref: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

src: 周二，总理斯蒂芬·哈珀（ Stephen Harper ）在其办公室与新民主党党魁杰克·林顿（ Jack Layton ）举行 25 分钟的会议后，已经同意将政府的《清洁空气法》送交一个多党委员会审查，然后再进行二读。 “莱顿 (Layton) 在与首相会面期间要求修改保守党的环境法案，他要求‘彻底重写’保守党的环境法案。” 自从联邦政府介入接管塔斯马尼亚州德文波特的默西医院的资金后，州政府和一些联邦议员批评此举是 11 月联邦大选前的噱头。 但澳大利亚总理约翰•霍华德 (John Howard) 表示，该法案只是为了通过额外拨付 4500 万澳元来防止医院设施被塔斯马尼亚政府降级。
mt: On Tuesday, Prime Minister Stephen Harper agreed to send the government's Clean Air Act to a multi-party committee for review before a second reading, after a 25-minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton in his office. "Layton asked Harper to amend the Conservative's environmental bill, and asked for a 'complete rewrite' of the Conservative's environmental bill," after the federal government took over funding for the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, since the state government and some federal MPs criticized the move as an election-year stunt. But Australian Prime Minister John Howard said the bill was only to prevent the hospital facilities from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, with an additional $450 million in funding.
ref: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."

src: 在食用受污染宠物食品后死亡的宠物的尿样中，均发现了氰尿酸和三聚氰胺。 该大学的研究人员表示，这两种化合物相互作用形成的晶体可能会造成肾脏功能障碍。 研究人员观察到，在添加三聚氰胺和三聚氰尿酸后，猫的尿液中形成了结晶。 通过红外光谱 (FTIR) 进行比较后发现，这些结晶的成分与在受影响宠物的尿液中发现的结晶成分吻合。
mt: The urine of pets that died after eating contaminated pet food contained both cyanuric acid and melamine. Researchers at the university said the two compounds, when combined, form crystals that can cause kidney problems. Researchers observed that when melamine and cyanuric acid were added to cat urine, crystals formed. Comparing the crystals by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR) found that the crystals matched those found in the urine of affected pets.
ref: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said. The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

src: 新华社报道称，政府调查人员周三发现了两个“黑匣子”飞行记录仪。 其他摔跤选手也纷纷悼念露娜 (Luna) 。 汤米·追梦儿说：“露娜是首位至尊女王，我的第一任经理人。露娜在双月之夜去世。这样的夜晚就像她本人一样特别。她是个坚强的女人。” 达斯汀·鲁内尔斯（Dustin Runnels，外号“金沙”）评论说：“卢娜和我一样难以捉摸……她可能要更难摸透……我爱她，也会想她……希望她去到了更好的地方。”
mt: Xinhua reports government investigators found two "black boxes" flight recorders Wednesday. Other wrestlers also mourned Luna. Tommy Dreamer said, "Luna was the first Queen of the Night, my first manager. Luna died on a Full Moon night. Such nights are special like her. She was a strong woman." Dustin Runnels (Goldust) commented, "Luna was as unpredictable as I am... She may be even more unpredictable... I love her and will miss her... I hope she's in a better place."
ref: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that ""Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."""

src: 新华社报道称，政府调查人员周三发现了两个“黑匣子”飞行记录仪。 其他摔跤选手也纷纷悼念露娜 (Luna) 。 汤米·追梦儿说：“露娜是首位至尊女王，我的第一任经理人。露娜在双月之夜去世。这样的夜晚就像她本人一样特别。她是个坚强的女人。” 达斯汀·鲁内尔斯（Dustin Runnels，外号“金沙”）评论说：“卢娜和我一样难以捉摸……她可能要更难摸透……我爱她，也会想她……希望她去到了更好的地方。”
mt: Xinhua reports government investigators found two "black boxes" flight recorders Wednesday. Other wrestlers also mourned Luna. Tommy Dreamer said, "Luna was the first Queen of the Night, my first manager. Luna died on a Full Moon night. Such nights are special like her. She was a strong woman." Dustin Runnels (Goldust) commented, "Luna was as unpredictable as I am... She may be even more unpredictable... I love her and will miss her... I hope she's in a better place."
ref: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that ""Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."""

src: 虽然车撞到房子时，房子里面有三个人，但最后并没有人受伤。 然而，司机的头部受到了重创。 事故发生的道路暂时封闭，紧急救援人员将司机从红色奥迪 TT 中救了出来。 起初，他被送往位于大雅茅斯的詹姆斯·佩吉特医院进行救治。 他随后被转送到剑桥的阿登布鲁克医院。
mt: Although there were three people in the house when the car crashed into it, no one was injured. However, the driver sustained serious head injuries. The road where the accident occurred is temporarily closed, and emergency rescue personnel rescued the driver from the red Audi TT. Initially, he was taken to the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth for treatment. He was later transferred to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
ref: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt. However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head. The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.

src: 比赛于上午 10 点开始。天气很好，上午有毛毛雨，很快就放晴了。这样的天气对七人制橄榄球来说十分完美。 锦标赛头号种子南非队开局不错，他们以 26 - 00 轻松战胜了 5 号种子赞比亚队。 在与南方姐妹队的比赛中，南非队看起来明显有点生疏，但随着比赛的进行，南非队的表现稳步改进。 他们因其严格防守、控球技术和出色的团队合作脱颖而出。很显然，这是一支无往不胜的球队。
mt: 10 a.m. The weather was perfect for rugby sevens. There was a light drizzle in the morning, but it cleared up quickly. The top seed South Africa started well, beating the fifth seed Zambia 26-0. In the match against the South sisters, South Africa looked a little rusty at first, but as the game progressed, South Africa's performance improved steadily. They stood out for their strict defense, ball control and excellent teamwork. It was obvious that this was an unbeatable team.
ref: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.

src: 在过去三十年里，尽管官方层面仍然是个共产主义国家，中国已经发展了市场经济。 第一次经济改革是在邓小平的领导下进行的。 从那时候开始，中国的经济规模增长了 90 倍。 去年，中国的汽车出口量首次超过德国，并超越美国成为汽车出口最大的市场。 中国的 GDP 有可能在 20 年内反超美国。
mt: 30 years ago, China was still a communist country on the official level, but it has developed a market economy. The first economic reform was led by Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economy has grown by 90 times. Last year, China's car exports exceeded Germany for the first time and surpassed the United States to become the largest car export market. China's GDP may surpass the United States in 20 years.
ref: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.

src: “到 2020 年之前，我们将努力使单位国内生产总值二氧化碳排放量比 2005 年显著下降，”胡锦涛说。 他没有设定削减数额，只是表示将根据中国的经济产出来决定数额。 胡锦涛鼓励发展中国家“不要重走先污染后治理的老路”。 他补充道，“然而，他们不应该被要求承担超出其发展阶段、责任和能力范围的义务。”
mt: "By 2020, we will strive to make our unit of gross domestic product per capita carbon dioxide emissions significantly lower than in 2005," Hu said. He did not set a reduction target, only saying the amount would be decided based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries "not to repeat the old path of first polluting and then cleaning up." He added, "However, they should not be asked to take on obligations beyond their development stage, responsibility and capacity."
ref: """We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""
