src: 医疗慈善机构 Mangola、无国界医生组织和世界卫生组织表示，这是该国有史以来最严重的疫情。 无国界医生组织的发言人理查德·维尔曼 (Richard Veerman) 说：“安哥拉正面临有史以来最严重的疫情，当地的局势仍然非常糟糕。”
mt: Mangola, Médecins Sans Frontières and the World Health Organization said this was the worst outbreak in the country's history. Médecins Sans Frontières's spokesman Richard Veerman said: "Angola is facing its worst outbreak ever, the situation on the ground is still very bad."
ref: "The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country. Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: ""Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola,"" he said."

src: 总检察长兼王室法律顾问凯尔·斯塔莫 (Kier Starmer) 今天上午发表声明，宣布对胡纳和普莱斯提起公诉。 胡纳已经辞职，他在内阁中的位置将由国会议员埃德·戴维 (Ed Davey) 接替。预计国会议员诺曼·兰姆 (Norman Lamb) 将接替戴维空出的商务部长一职。 胡纳和普赖斯将于 2 月 16 日在威斯敏斯特治安法院出庭。
mt: Attorney General and royal legal adviser Kier Starmer announced this morning that he would be prosecuting Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned, and his position in the cabinet will be taken by MP Ed Davey. It is expected that MP Norman Lamb will take over Davey's position as business secretary. Huhne and Pryce will appear in Westminster Magistrates' Court on February 16.
ref: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.

src: 卡米尔·圣桑 (Camille Saint-Saens) 创作的法国歌剧讲述的是一名艺术家的故事，“他一生沉迷于毒品和对日本的热爱”。 结果，演员在舞台上吸食大麻，剧院本身也鼓励观众一起加入。
mt: Camille Saint-Saens' French opera tells the story of an artist who "was addicted to drugs and obsessed with Japan" throughout his life. The actors on stage smoke marijuana, and the theater itself encourages the audience to join in.
ref: "The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist ""whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."" As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in."

src: 被称为“11 号宇航员”的列昂诺夫是苏联最早的宇航员团队中的一员。 1965 年 3 月 18 日，他完成了首次载人舱外活动（ EVA，俗称“太空漫步”），在航天器外独自维持了 12 分钟多一点。 由于工作表现出色，他获得了苏联最高荣誉“苏联英雄”的称号。 十年之后，他领导了阿波罗-联盟号任务的苏联部分，这标志着太空竞赛已经结束。
mt: 11th Soviet cosmonaut Leonov was a member of the first team of Soviet cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he completed the first EVA, spending 12 minutes and a few seconds outside the spacecraft alone. For his excellent performance, he was awarded the title of "Hero of the Soviet Union". Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo-Soyuz Test Project, which marked the end of the space race.
ref: "Leonov, also known as ""cosmonaut No. 11"", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or ""spacewalk"", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes. He received the ""Hero of the Soviet Union"", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over."

src: 事故发生后，吉布森被送往医院，但很快就一命呜呼。 这位 64 岁的卡车司机在车祸中没有受伤。 当天，格林尼治时间 (GMT) 约 12 时许，该车辆被拖离事故现场。 一名在事故发生地附近的车库立的工作人员说：“孩子们正等着过马路，并且都在大声尖叫，哭个不停。” 他们都从事故发生的地方跑了回来。
mt: 64-year-old truck driver Gibson was sent to the hospital, but soon died. The truck driver was not injured in the accident. At around noon local time (GMT), the vehicle was towed away from the accident site. A worker at a nearby garage said, "The children were waiting to cross the road and were all screaming and crying." They all ran back from the accident site.
ref: "After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day. A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: ""There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" They all ran back from where the accident had happened."

src: 完成的工作大多是理论性的，但编写程序的目的，是为了模拟对人马座星系的观测。 该团队正在寻找的效应可能是由星系暗物质和银河系暗物质之间的潮汐力引起的。 就像月球对地球施加拉力，引起潮汐一样，银河系也对人马座星系施加着作用力。 科学家们可以得出结论，暗物质对其他暗物质的影响方式与普通物质相同。 该理论认为，一个星系周围的大多数暗物质都处在星系周围的某种光环中，由许多小粒子组成。
mt: The work is largely theoretical, but the team is writing a computer program to simulate observations of the Milky Way's Andromeda neighbor. The effect they're looking for could be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just as the moon exerts a gravitational pull on Earth, causing tides, the Milky Way exerts a pull on Andromeda. Scientists can conclude that dark matter affects other dark matter in the same way as ordinary matter. The theory holds that most of a galaxy's dark matter is in a halo around the galaxy, made up of many small particles.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does. This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: 这场辩论是因为对卡特里娜飓风后的救济和重建支出有争议而开始的；一些财政保守派幽默地将其称为“布什的新（奥尔良）政”。 自由派人士对重建工作的批判主要集中在把重建合同授予了视为华盛顿内部人士的这一做法。
mt: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction after Hurricane Katrina; some fiscal conservatives humorously dubbed it "Bush's new (New) Orleans." Criticism of the reconstruction effort by liberal activists focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to what were seen as Washington insiders.
ref: "The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."

src: 这场辩论是因为对卡特里娜飓风后的救济和重建支出有争议而开始的；一些财政保守派幽默地将其称为“布什的新（奥尔良）政”。 自由派人士对重建工作的批判主要集中在把重建合同授予了视为华盛顿内部人士的这一做法。
mt: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction after Hurricane Katrina; some fiscal conservatives humorously dubbed it "Bush's new (New) Orleans." Criticism of the reconstruction effort by liberal activists focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to what were seen as Washington insiders.
ref: "The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."

src: 太空舱大约会在早上 5 点（东部时间）到达地球，并进入大气层，为北加州、俄勒冈州、内华达州和犹他州的居民上演一场精彩的焰火秀。 太空舱看起来很像划过天空的流星。 太空舱将以每秒约 12.8 公里（8 英里）的速度飞行，速度之快，足以在一分钟内从旧金山飞到洛杉矶。 星尘号将打破 1969 年 5 月阿波罗 X 指令舱返回地球时创下的纪录，并创下空前的新纪录，成为返回地球最快的太空飞船。 星尘号的项目经理汤姆·达克斯伯里 (Tom Duxbury) 说：“它将穿过北加州西海岸，从加州穿过俄勒冈州中部，然后穿过内华达州和爱达荷州，然后进入犹他州，照亮这些地方的天空。”
mt: The capsule is expected to arrive back on Earth around 5 a.m. Pacific Time (12:00 UTC) and enter the atmosphere for a spectacular show for residents of Northern California, Oregon, Nevada and Utah. The capsule will look like a shooting star streaking across the sky. The capsule will be flying at about 12.8 kilometers per second (8 miles per second), fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in a minute. Stardust will break the record set in 1969 by the Apollo X command module returning to Earth and set a new record for the fastest return to Earth of a space capsule. Stardust project manager Tom Duxbury said, "It will go through the Northern California coast, through California, through the middle of Oregon, through Nevada and Idaho, and into Utah, lighting up the skies of those places."
ref: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.

src: 俄亥俄州当局表示，因星期三于一名医生的汽车后备箱中发现其母尸体，这位在宾夕法尼亚州匹兹堡儿童医院工作的医生将面临情节严重的谋杀罪指控。 29 岁的 Malar Balasubramanian 医生在俄亥俄州辛辛那提市以北约 15 英里的郊区布鲁艾施被发现，她被找到时身穿 T 恤衫和内裤，躺在路边的地上，看上去服用了大量药物。 她向军官们指示往她的黑色奥兹莫比尔“激情”轿车查看，这辆车停在 500 英尺远的地方。 在那里，他们发现了 53 岁的萨罗贾·巴拉苏布拉曼尼亚的尸体，盖着血迹斑斑的毯子。 警方说，尸体看上去在那里放了一天左右。
mt: 29-year-old Malar Balasubramanian, a doctor at the Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh in Pennsylvania, will face a serious murder charge after her mother's body was found in the trunk of her car on Wednesday. She was found in the rural suburb of Blue Ash, about 15 miles north of Cincinnati, Ohio, wearing a T-shirt and underwear, lying on the side of the road, apparently having taken a large amount of drugs. She pointed to the black Ozmo mobile "passion" car, which was parked 500 feet away. There, they found the body of 53-year-old Sarojab Balasubramanian, covered in blood-stained blankets. Police said the body had been there for about a day.
ref: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state. She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away. There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets. Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.

src: 这是 eBay 史上最大型的一次收购。 该公司希望实现利润来源的多元化，并在 Skype 广泛普及的中国、东欧和巴西等地区提高知名度。
mt: It is the largest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and raise its profile in China, Eastern Europe and Brazil, where Skype is widely used.
ref: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.

src: 伤员被送往医院后，打斗平息下来，剩下的约 40 名囚犯留在院子里，拒绝回牢房。 谈判人员试图扭转局面，但囚犯的要求并不明确。 山区夏令时晚上 10 点到 11 点之间，院子里的犯人们引发了一场火灾。 很快，配备了防暴装备的警察进入了院子，并用催泪瓦斯把囚犯逼得走投无路。 消防救援人员最终在晚上 11 点 35 分扑灭了大火。
mt: 40 inmates were left in the yard after the fight subsided and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to turn the situation around, but the inmates' demands were unclear. In the mountains, the inmates started a fire in the yard between 10 and 11 p.m. in the evening. Soon, police equipped with riot gear entered the yard and forced the inmates into a corner with tear gas. Firefighters finally put out the fire at 11:35 p.m.
ref: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear. Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard. Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas. Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.

src: 这次电视直播是伊朗高层消息人士首次承认制裁产生的影响正在显现。 这些措施包括金融限制和欧盟对原油出口的禁令，而伊朗经济有 80% 的国外收入来自原油出口。 在最新一期的月报中，石油输出国组织声称原油出口已经跌到了二十年来的最低水平，仅为一天 280 万桶。 伊朗最高领袖阿亚图拉·赛义德·阿里·哈梅内伊（Ayatollah Ali Khamenei）称，伊朗对石油的依赖是可追溯到1979年伊朗伊斯兰革命之前的“一个陷阱”，伊朗应该摆脱这个陷阱。
mt: This is the first time that a senior Iranian official has acknowledged that the impact of sanctions is being felt. These measures include financial restrictions and an EU ban on oil exports, which account for 80 percent of Iran's foreign income. In its latest monthly report, the Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) said oil exports had fallen to their lowest level in two decades, at 2.8 million barrels a day. Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei said Iran's dependence on oil was "a trap" that could be traced back to before the 1979 Iranian Islamic Revolution, and that Iran should get out of the trap.
ref: "The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect. They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income. In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day. The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as ""a trap"" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself."

src: 在法国，传统上投票是一种没什么技术含量的体验：选民进到一个小隔间里，把一张预先印好的、表明了所选候选人的纸片装入信封中。 官员核实投票者的身份后，投票者将信封投入投票箱，并在投票册上签名。 法国选举法为选举程序制订了相当严格的法规。 自 1988 年以来，投票箱就必须是透明的，这样选民和观察员才能看到投票开始时箱内没有信封，还能看到除了那些及时统计过、有权投票的选民以外，没有其他人向箱内投入信封。 候选人可以派代表现场察看选举过程的每一个环节。晚上，志愿者在严密监督之下按照特定程序计票。
mt: In France, voting traditionally has been a low-tech experience: voters enter a small booth, put a pre-printed paper ballot indicating their choice into an envelope, and officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into a ballot box, and signs a voting register. French election law prescribes strict rules for the voting process. Since 1988, ballot boxes have had to be transparent, so voters and observers could see that no envelopes were in the box at the start of voting, and that no one other than duly registered and timely-verified voters were putting envelopes into the box. Candidates can have representatives observe every step of the voting process. At night, volunteers count the ballots under strict supervision according to a prescribed procedure.
ref: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope. After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll. French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters. Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.

src: 如果这一发现得到证实，艾伦对武藏号 8 年的搜寻工作就大功告成了。 在测绘海床后，借助遥控无人潜水器 (ROV) 找到了沉船。 艾伦是世界上最富有的人之一。据报道，他将很大一部分财富投资到海洋勘探上，并因为毕生对战争的浓厚兴趣而开始寻找武藏号。
mt: If this discovery is confirmed, Allen's eight-year search for the Yamato would be complete. After mapping the sea floor, an ROV found the shipwreck. Allen is one of the world's richest people. He is reported to have invested a large part of his fortune in ocean exploration and began searching for the Yamato because of his lifelong interest in war.
ref: If confirmed, the find completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi. Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV. One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.

src: 电视报道显示，有白烟从工厂里冒出。 当地政府警告核电站附近的居民，要待在室内，关掉空调，不要喝自来水。 日本原子能机构表示，核电站检测出了放射性物质铯和碘。 有关部门推测，这表明现场储存铀燃料的容器可能已经破裂，并且正在泄漏。
mt: Television reports show white smoke coming from the factory. Local government warned residents near the nuclear power plant to stay indoors, turn off air conditioning, and not drink tap water. The Japan Atomic Energy Agency said the nuclear power plant detected radioactive substances cesium and iodine. Authorities speculate that this indicates that the container storing uranium fuel may have already ruptured and is leaking.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant. Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water. According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant. Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant. Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: 托尼·莫尔博士在南非夸祖鲁-纳塔尔省发现了这种广泛耐药结核病 (XDR-TB)。 他在一次采访中表示，这个新变种“非常令人不安和担忧，因为它的致死率非常高。” 莫尔 (Moll) 博士认为，有些病人可能是在医院感染了病菌，而且至少有两名病人是医院的医护人员。 一年内，一个感染者可能会感染 10 至 15 名密切接触者。 然而，广泛耐药结核病在整个结核病患者群体中所占的比例似乎仍然很低；在南非，在任意特定时刻，总计 33 万人中只有 6000 人感染。
mt: Dr. Tony Moll discovered this widespread drug-resistant tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa. He said in an interview that this new strain was "very alarming and worrying because of its high mortality rate." Moll believes that some patients may have been infected in the hospital and at least two of the patients were hospital staff. In a year, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts. However, the proportion of widespread drug-resistant tuberculosis in the entire tuberculosis patient population seems to be still very low; in South Africa, out of 330,000 people at any given time, only 6,000 are infected.
ref: "Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal. In an interview, he said the new variant was ""very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."" Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers. In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa."

src: 美国联邦航空局 (FAA) 称，新一代航空运输系统 (NextGen) 可以使飞机缩短飞行航线，每年节省数百万加仑的燃料，并减少碳排放。 它使用卫星技术，而不是老旧的地面雷达技术，使空中交通管制员能够更精确地定位飞机，并向飞行员提供更准确的信息。
mt: The FAA says the NextGen can make planes fly shorter routes, saving millions of gallons of fuel a year and reducing carbon emissions. It uses satellite technology instead of old ground radar technology, allowing air traffic controllers to pinpoint planes more accurately and provide more accurate information to pilots.
ref: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions. It uses satellite-based technology as opposed to older ground-radar-based technology to allow air traffic controllers to pinpoint aircraft with greater precision and give pilots more accurate information.

src: 历史学家批判了联邦调查局的过往政策，这种政策会把资源集中到容易破获的案件上，尤以偷车案件居多，目的只在于提高该机构的成功破案率。 国会从 2005 财年开始资助该扫黄倡议，并规定联邦调查局 (FBI) 必须指派 10 名探员专门打击成人色情。
mt: Historians have criticized the FBI's past policy of concentrating resources on easy-to-crack cases, especially car thefts, with the sole purpose of boosting the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the anti-pornography initiative in the 2005 fiscal year and required the FBI to assign 10 agents to crack down on adult pornography.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: 历史学家批判了联邦调查局的过往政策，这种政策会把资源集中到容易破获的案件上，尤以偷车案件居多，目的只在于提高该机构的成功破案率。 国会从 2005 财年开始资助该扫黄倡议，并规定联邦调查局 (FBI) 必须指派 10 名探员专门打击成人色情。
mt: Historians have criticized the FBI's past policy of concentrating resources on easy-to-crack cases, especially car thefts, with the sole purpose of boosting the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the anti-pornography initiative in the 2005 fiscal year and required the FBI to assign 10 agents to crack down on adult pornography.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: 当地时间上午 9:30 左右 (UTC 0230)，JAS 39C 鹰狮战斗机撞上跑道并发生爆炸，导致机场关闭，商业航班无法正常起降。 涉事飞行员是空军中队长迪罗里·帕塔维 (Dilokrit Pattavee)。 当地媒体报道，一辆机场消防车在响应火警时翻了车。
mt: 9:30 local time (UTC 0230) a JAS 39C Gripen fighter jet crashed into the runway and exploded, causing the airport to close and commercial flights to be unable to take off normally. The pilot was Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reported that a fire engine flipped over while responding to a fire.
ref: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.

src: 20 世纪 60 年代，布热津斯基先是为约翰·福特·肯尼迪效力，担任他的顾问，后来又为林登·贝恩斯·约翰逊政府工作。 在 1976 年总统选举期间，他为卡特提供了对外政策方面的建议，随后在 1977 到 1981 年接替亨利·基辛格担任国家安全顾问 (NSA) 。 身为国家安全顾问，他曾协助卡特处理诸多国际事务，例如 1978 年签署《戴维营协议》；在20 世纪 70 年代末实现美中关系正常化；1979 年导致伊朗人质危机的伊朗革命；1979 年苏联入侵阿富汗。
mt: 1960s, Brzezinski first served as an advisor to John F. Kennedy, then worked for the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. In the 1976 presidential election, he advised Carter on foreign policy, and then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he helped Carter deal with various international issues, such as the 1978 signing of the Camp David Accords; the normalization of U.S.-China relations in the late 1970s; the 1979 Iranian Revolution that led to the Iran hostage crisis; and the 1979 Soviet invasion of Afghanistan.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: 博贝克出生于克罗地亚首都萨格勒布，在为贝尔格莱德游击队足球俱乐部效力时成名。 他于 1945 年加入球队，一直效力到 1958 年。 在该球队效力期间，他出场 468 次攻入 403 球。 没有人比博贝克 (Bobek) 的出场次数更多、为俱乐部进球得分更多的了。 1995 年，他当选为游击队史上最佳球员。
mt: Born in Zagreb, Croatia, Bobek made his name playing for Red Star Belgrade. He joined the club in 1945 and played for them until 1958. In that time, he played 468 games and scored 403 goals. No one has played more games or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. In 1995, he was voted the club's best player.
ref: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958. During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances. No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.

src: 伊氏西爪龙属于驰龙科，是迅猛龙的表亲。 据说，这种全身长满羽毛的温血猛禽像迅猛龙一样，用带爪子的两条腿直立行走。 它的第二只爪子要大一些，因此得名“赫斯佩罗龙”，意思是“西方的爪”。
mt: The Iberomesornis was a member of the Troodontidae, a close relative of the Velociraptor. It was said to be a warm-blooded, feathered, bipedal predator like the Velociraptor, with two clawed legs and a larger second claw, hence the name "Hesperornis", meaning "claw of the west".
ref: "Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor . This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means ""western claw."""

src: 至少有 100 人参加此次聚会，庆祝一对夫妇的结婚一周年纪念日。 官方称，这对夫妇原定于稍后举行正式的周年纪念活动。 一年前，这对夫妇在德克萨斯州结婚，之后来到布法罗和亲友共同庆祝。 这名30岁的丈夫出生于布法罗，是枪击案中的四名死者之一，但他的妻子没有受伤。
mt: 100 or more people attended the party, celebrating the first anniversary of a couple's marriage. Officials said the couple was originally planning a formal anniversary event. A year ago, the couple married in Texas and then came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and family. The 30-year-old husband was one of four victims in the shooting, but his wife was not injured.
ref: At least 100 people had attended the party, in order to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was held last year. A formal anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, officials said. The couple had married in Texas one year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives. The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four killed in the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.

src: “Luno”号上载有 120-160 立方米的燃料。在发生故障后，大风和海浪把它推到了防波堤上。 直升机救出了 12 名船员，其中只有一人受伤，鼻骨骨折。 这艘 100 米长的船是去装载常见的化肥货物的，起初官员们担心这艘船上装的货物可能会泄漏。
mt: 120-160 cubic meters of fuel was on board the Luno. After the incident, strong winds and waves pushed it onto the breakwater. A helicopter rescued the 12 crew members, one of whom suffered a broken nose. The 100-meter ship was originally going to load up with common fertilizer, and officials were initially concerned that the cargo on board might leak.
ref: The Luno had 120–160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it broke down and high winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater. Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose. The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.

src: 除了导演电影，沃蒂埃的成就还包括 1973 年为反对他眼中的政治钳制而发起的绝食抗议。 此次抗议使法国的法律得到修改。他的这种激进行为可以追溯到 15 岁那年，当时是二战时期，他奋不顾身地投身到法国保卫战中。 他在 1998 年出版了一本自传，记录了自己的生平事迹。 20 世纪 60 年代，他回到刚刚独立的阿尔及利亚，教授电影导演知识。
mt: In addition to directing films, Wautier's achievements also included a hunger strike in 1973 to protest what he saw as political censorship. This protest led to changes in French law. His activist behavior can be traced back to when he was 15 years old, during World War II, when he threw himself into the defense of France. He published an autobiography in 1998, recording his life story. In the 1960s, he returned to newly independent Algeria, teaching film directing knowledge.
ref: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship. French law was changed. His activism went back to age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He documented himself in a 1998 book. In the 1960s he headed back to newly-independent Algeria to teach film directing.

src: 有 400 多万人前往罗马参加葬礼。 对于在圣彼得广场举行的葬礼，出席者太多了，因此不可能每个人都能进入。 罗马各地安装了数个大型电视屏幕，供人们观看仪式。 在意大利很多其他城市以及世界上其他地方，尤其是波兰，都设置了类似的设施，以供大量群众观看。
mt: 4 million people attended the funeral in Rome. For the funeral in St. Peter's Square, there were too many people to allow everyone to attend. Large TV screens were set up in Rome and other cities in Italy and around the world, especially in Poland, for the large crowds to watch.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral. The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square. Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony. In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: 据报道，麦克白大街（Macbeth Street）的一间公寓因煤气泄漏而发生爆炸。 在一位邻居打电话称发生煤气泄漏之后，煤气公司的一名高级职员在现场进行汇报。 官员到达后，公寓发生了爆炸。 据报告并没有发生重大伤亡，但至少有5 人因身处爆炸现场而出现休克症状，接受了治疗。 公寓里没有人。 当时，该地区有近 100 名居民被疏散。
mt: A flat on Macbeth Street was reported to have exploded due to a gas leak. After a neighbour called to report a gas leak, a senior employee from the gas company arrived on the scene. The flat exploded after the employee arrived. There were no major injuries, but at least five people who were in the vicinity of the explosion were treated for shock symptoms. No one was in the flat at the time. Nearby, around 100 residents were evacuated.
ref: According to reports, an apartment on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak. An official with the gas company was reporting to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak. When the official arrived, the apartment exploded. No major injuries were reported, but at least five people on scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock. No one was inside the apartment. At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.

src: 遇难者分别是 25 岁的尼古拉斯·奥尔登 (Nicholas Alden) 和 21 岁的扎卡里·卡德巴克 (Zachary Cuddeback)。当时驾车的是卡德巴克。 埃德加·贝吉利亚 (Edgar Veguilla) 的手臂和下巴受伤，而克里斯托弗· 施耐德 (Kristoffer Schneider) 则需要做脸部重建手术。 乌卡 (Uka) 的武器在指着第五个人的头时失灵了。施耐德（Schneider）疼痛不已，一只眼睛失明，一块头骨缺失，利用钛板才重塑了脸部。 施耐德 (Schneider) 在其祖国的美国空军 (USAF) 基地通过视频连线进行作证。
mt: 25-year-old Nicholas Alden and 21-year-old Zachary Cuddeback were killed when the car was driven by Cuddeback. Edgar Veguilla's arm and jaw were injured, and Kristoffer Schneider needed facial reconstruction surgery. Uka's weapon malfunctioned when it was pointed at the fifth person's head. Schneider was in pain, one eye was blind, a piece of skull was missing, and his face was reconstructed with titanium plates. Schneider testified via video link from his home country's USAF base.
ref: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver. Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face. Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium. Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.

src: 高尔夫球和英式橄榄球都将再次回归，成为奥运会正式比赛项目。 今天，国际奥委会在柏林举行执行理事会会议，会上投票决定了要纳入的体育项目。橄榄球（更确切地说，联合会式橄榄球）以及高尔夫击败了其他五项运动，被选定为奥运会的参赛项目。 壁球、空手道和旱冰运动以及棒球和垒球都曾试图进入奥林匹克项目，而后两个项目在 2005 年落选了。 这项投票还必须于 10 月份在哥本哈根举行的会议上得到 IOC 全体成员的批准。
mt: Golf and rugby will return to the Olympics, as official events. Today, the IOC executive board met in Berlin, and voted on the sports to be included. Rugby (more accurately, rugby union) and golf beat out the other five sports, and were selected as Olympic events.  Paddleball, karate, and ice hockey, as well as baseball and softball, all tried to get in, and the latter two were rejected in 2005. This vote must still be approved by the full IOC membership at a meeting in Copenhagen in October.
ref: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics. Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.

src: 1759 年 9 月 24 日，阿瑟·吉尼斯在爱尔兰都柏林为圣詹姆斯之门啤酒厂签署了一份 9000 年的租约。 250 年后，健力士已经成长为年营业额 100 亿欧元（147亿美元）的全球性企业。
mt: 1759 September 24, Arthur Guinness signed a 9000-year lease for St. James's Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland. 250 years later, Guinness had grown into a global enterprise with annual sales of 100 billion euros ($147 billion).
ref: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland. 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.

src: 周一，法国东部里昂附近的沼泽内发现了一只死野鸭。经证实，这只野鸭感染了对人类致命的 H5N1 型禽流感病毒。 在奥地利、德国、斯洛文尼亚、保加利亚、希腊和意大利之后，法国是第七个深受这种病毒之苦的欧盟国家。 克罗地亚和丹麦的 H5N1 疑似病例仍未确诊。
mt: On Monday, a dead wild duck was found in a marsh near Lyon, France. It was confirmed to have been infected with the H5N1 strain of avian flu, which is fatal to humans. France is the seventh European Union country to be affected by the virus, after Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected cases in Croatia and Denmark are still unconfirmed.
ref: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France. France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.

src: 联合国维和人员在 2010 年地震后抵达海地，他们因疫情蔓延而受到指责。疫情是从部队营地附近开始扩散的。 诉讼材料显示，联合国营地未能对废弃物进行适当的消毒处理，因而导致细菌进入阿蒂博尼特河的支流，这是海地最大河流之一。 在军队到来之前，海地自 19 世纪初以来从未遇到过与该疾病有关的问题。 海地正义与民主研究所 (Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy) 引用的独立研究表明，是尼泊尔的联合国维和部队在不知情的情况下将这种疾病带到了海地。 研究该疾病的联合国专家丹妮尔·拉塔涅 (Danielle Lantagne) 表示，疫情爆发很可能是由维和人员引起的。
mt: United Nations peacekeepers are accused of spreading the disease after arriving in Haiti following the 2010 earthquake. The outbreak began spreading from the camp's latrines. Lawsuit documents show that the UN camp did not properly disinfect waste, allowing bacteria to enter the Artibonite River's tributary, one of Haiti's largest rivers. Haiti had never had a cholera problem since the 19th century before the UN troops arrived. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy cites independent research that the disease was brought to Haiti unknowingly by Nepalese UN peacekeepers. UN cholera expert Danielle Lantagne says the outbreak may have been caused by the peacekeepers.
ref: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment. According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest. Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.

src: 为整顿这一局面，爱尔兰政府迫切希望议会推出立法。 “不管是从公共卫生的角度还是刑事司法的角度来看，现在都应当尽快立法。”一位政府发言人说道。 卫生部长对以下两方面表示了关切：利用所涉物质暂时合法性谋取个人利益的人员保障，以及自（现在看来）违宪的修改条例生效以来所作出的与毒品有关的定罪。
mt: To address this situation, the Irish government is eager for the parliament to pass legislation. "Whether it's from a public health perspective or a criminal justice perspective, it's now time to legislate," a government spokesman said. The health minister expressed concern over two areas: ensuring that people who have profited from the temporary legality of the substances are protected, and the convictions made since the now unconstitutional amendment came into effect.
ref: "The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation. ""It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible"", said a government spokesperson. The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect."

The health minister expressed concern over two areas: ensuring that people who have profited from the temporary legality of the substances are protected, and the convictions made since the now unconstitutional amendment came into effect.
ref: "The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation. ""It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible"", said a government spokesperson. The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect."

src: 洛杉矶警察局发言人克里斯托弗·加西亚（Christopher Garcia）表示，该名男性嫌疑人正接受调查，被调查的原因是非法侵入，而不是故意破坏公物。 该标志没有受到实际损坏；这一改动是用装饰着和平与爱心标志的黑色防水油布将字母 “O” 改成了可读性强的小写 “e”完成的。
mt: Los Angeles Police Department spokesman Christopher Garcia said the male suspect is being investigated for unlawful entry, not malicious mischief. The sign was not actually damaged; the change was made by covering the letter "O" with a black waterproof oilcloth decorated with the peace and heart symbol and changing it to a small "e" that is easier to read.
ref: "Christopher Garcia, a spokesperson of the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspected male offender is being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism. The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the ""O"" to read lowercase ""e""."

src: "卡诺是一位鼎鼎有名但颇具争议的英语教师，他曾在现代教育和英皇教育任教，他声称，在职业生涯的巅峰时期，他有 9000 名学生。 在他的笔记中，他使用了一些家长认为粗俗的词语，据称他也在课堂上讲过脏话。 现代教育集团指控他未经授权就在公交车上刊登大型广告，并谎称自己是首席英语教师。 他也曾被指控侵犯版权，但没有受到起诉。 他教过的一个学生说，老师“会在课堂上使用俚语，在笔记里教授约会技巧，就像是学生的朋友一样。"""
mt: "Kano was a well-known but controversial English teacher who taught at Modern and English King, and claimed to have had 9,000 students at the peak of his career. In his notes, he used some vulgar words that parents found offensive, and it was said that he also swore in class. Modern Education Group accused him of unauthorized large advertisements on buses and falsely claiming to be the chief English teacher. He was also accused of copyright infringement, but was not prosecuted. One of his students said, "The teacher will use slang in class and teach dating skills in notes, like a friend to students."
ref: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career. In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class. Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor. He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged. A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'

src: 菲律宾一名前警察在首都马尼拉劫持旅游大巴，将车上的香港游客作为人质。 罗兰多·门多萨 (Rolando Mendoza) 架起他的 M16 步枪对游客扫射。 多名人质获救，目前至少有六名人质确认遇难。 六名人质（包括儿童和老人在内）以及那些菲律宾摄影师被提前释放。 两位摄影师其后顶替一位需要上洗手间的老妇。门多萨则被击毙。
mt: A former police officer hijacked a tourist bus in Manila, holding Hong Kong tourists as hostages. Rolando Mendoza brandished his M16 rifle and shot at the tourists. Several hostages were rescued, and at least six were confirmed dead. Six hostages (including children and elderly) and two photographers were released early. The photographers later took the place of an elderly woman who needed to use the restroom. Mendoza was killed.
ref: A former Filipino policeman has kept Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far. Six hostages, including the children and elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers. The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.

mt: A former police officer hijacked a tourist bus in Manila, holding Hong Kong tourists as hostages. Rolando Mendoza brandished his M16 rifle and shot at the tourists. Several hostages were rescued, and at least six were confirmed dead. Six hostages (including children and elderly) and two photographers were released early. The photographers later took the place of an elderly woman who needed to use the restroom. Mendoza was killed.
ref: A former Filipino policeman has kept Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far. Six hostages, including the children and elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers. The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.

src: 巴西是世界上最大的罗马天主教国家，而该国的罗马天主教会向来反对同性婚姻合法化。 10 年来，巴西国民议会一直就其合法性进行讨论，目前这种民间婚姻只在南里奥格兰德 (Rio Grande do Sul) 是合法的。 最初的法案由前圣保罗市长玛尔塔·苏普里希草拟。这项经过修改的立法提案，目前由罗伯托·杰斐逊负责。 抗议者希望在请愿书上收集 120 万个签名，并在十一月提交给国民议会。
mt: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country in the world, and its Roman Catholic Church has always opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage.  For ten years, the National Congress of Brazil has been discussing its legality, and such civil unions are only legal in Rio Grande do Sul.  The original bill was drafted by former Mayor of São Paulo Marta Suplicy.  This modified legislative proposal is currently being handled by Roberto Jefferson.  Protesters hope to collect 1.2 million signatures on a petition and submit it to the National Congress in November.
ref: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.

src: 表演开始五分钟后，刮起了风，约一分钟后，风速达到了 70 公里/小时……紧接着又下起了雨，雨势如此之大，像针扎一样拍打在皮肤上，随后天上下起了冰雹，惊慌失措的人群尖叫着四散奔逃。 “我姐姐和她的朋友不见了，路上有两个残疾人坐着轮椅，有人跳过去帮他们推轮椅”，阿尔芒·范思哲说道。
mt: 5 minutes after the show started, the wind picked up, and 1 minute later, it was 70 km/h… then it started raining, and the rain was so hard it felt like needles hitting your skin, and then hail started falling from the sky, and people panicked and ran away. "My sister and her friends are missing, there are two disabled people sitting in wheelchairs, and someone jumped over them to help them push their wheelchairs," Armand Van Houten said.
ref: "Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other. I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them,"" Armand Versace said."

src: 预报员称，这场位于佛得角群岛以西 645 英里（1040 公里）的风暴可能在对陆地地区造成威胁之前就会自行消散。 “弗雷德”目前正以每小时 105 英里（每小时 165 公里）的风速向西北方向移动。 “弗雷德”是卫星图像问世以来，在大西洋南部和东部记录到的最强热带气旋，也是有记录以来西经 35° 以东地区的第三大飓风。
mt: Forecasters say the storm, located 645 miles west of the Cape Verde Islands, could dissipate before threatening land areas. "Fred" is moving northwest at 105 mph. "Fred" is the strongest tropical cyclone in the South and East Atlantic since satellite images began and the third largest hurricane on record east of longitude 35°.
ref: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say. Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.

src: 预报员称，这场位于佛得角群岛以西 645 英里（1040 公里）的风暴可能在对陆地地区造成威胁之前就会自行消散。 “弗雷德”目前正以每小时 105 英里（每小时 165 公里）的风速向西北方向移动。 “弗雷德”是卫星图像问世以来，在大西洋南部和东部记录到的最强热带气旋，也是有记录以来西经 35° 以东地区的第三大飓风。

"Fred" is the strongest tropical cyclone in the South and East Atlantic since satellite images began and the third largest hurricane on record east of longitude 35°.
ref: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say. Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.

src: 802.11n 标准在 2.4Ghz 和 5.0Ghz 频率上都可运行。 它能向后兼容 802.11a、802.11b 和 802.11g，前提是基站要有双无线电。 802.11n 的速度大大快于前代技术，最大理论吞吐量可达 600Mbit/s。
mt: 802.11n can run on both 2.4GHz and 5.0GHz frequencies. It is backward compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided the base station has dual radios. 802.11n is much faster than previous technologies, with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies. This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios. The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: 这位奥运会金牌得主本应参加 100 米和 200 米自由泳和英联邦运动会的三项接力赛，但由于他的抱怨，他的健康状况一直受到质疑。 他一直无法用药物来缓解疼痛，因为比赛禁止参赛者服用这些药物。
mt: This Olympic gold medalist was supposed to compete in the 100 and 200 meter freestyle and the three relay events at the Commonwealth Games, but his complaints about his health have been questioned. He has been unable to use painkillers because they are banned from competition.
ref: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt. He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.

src: 这位奥运会金牌得主本应参加 100 米和 200 米自由泳和英联邦运动会的三项接力赛，但由于他的抱怨，他的健康状况一直受到质疑。 他一直无法用药物来缓解疼痛，因为比赛禁止参赛者服用这些药物。
mt: This Olympic gold medalist was supposed to compete in the 100 and 200 meter freestyle and the three relay events at the Commonwealth Games, but his complaints about his health have been questioned. He has been unable to use painkillers because they are banned from competition.
ref: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt. He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.

src: 美国地质调查局国际地震地图显示，冰岛在前一周并未发生地震。 冰岛气象局也报告说，在过去 48 小时内，赫克拉（Hekla）地区并没有发生地震活动。 导致相位变化的重大地震活动于 3 月 10 日发生在该火山顶部火山口的东北侧。 据报道，山底出现了与火山活动无关的乌云。 这些云可能会让人们怀疑火山到底有没有真正喷发过。
mt: The United States Geological Survey's map of Iceland shows no earthquakes in the past week. Iceland's Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla region in the past 48 hours. Major earthquake activity that caused the phase change occurred on March 10 at the northeast side of the volcano's crater. Clouds appeared at the base of the mountain that were not related to volcanic activity. These clouds may have led people to believe the volcano had actually erupted.
ref: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera. Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.

src: 无人驾驶月球轨道飞行器月船一号发射了月球撞击探测器，该探测器以每秒 1.5 公里(每小时 3000 英里) 的速度掠过月球表面，并在月球南极附近成功硬着陆 除了搭载三台重要的科学仪器，月球探测器的每一侧都印有印度国旗图案。
mt: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 launched the lunar impact probe, which flew over the lunar surface at 1.5 kilometers per second (3,000 miles per hour) and successfully hard landed near the lunar south pole. In addition to carrying three important scientific instruments, each side of the lunar probe was printed with the Indian flag.
ref: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole. Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.

mt: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 launched the lunar impact probe, which flew over the lunar surface at 1.5 kilometers per second (3,000 miles per hour) and successfully hard landed near the lunar south pole. In addition to carrying three important scientific instruments, each side of the lunar probe was printed with the Indian flag.
ref: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole. Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.

src: 7 月下旬报告了本季节的第一批病例。 猪携带该疾病，然后通过蚊子传染给人类。 这场疫情促使印度政府采取一些措施，比如在严重感染地区放置捕猪器、派发数千个蚊帐并喷洒杀虫剂。 政府还承诺提供数百万剂脑炎疫苗，这将有助于医疗机构为明年做好准备。 由于缺乏资金，且与其他疾病相比优先级较低，今年向历史上疫情最严重的地区提供疫苗的计划被推迟了。
mt: 7月下旬报告了本季节的第一批病例。 猪携带该疾病，然后通过蚊子传染给人类。 这场疫情促使印度政府采取一些措施，比如在严重感染地区放置捕猪器、派发数千个蚊帐并喷洒杀虫剂。 政府还承诺提供数百万剂脑炎疫苗，这将有助于医疗机构为明年做好准备。 由于缺乏资金，且与其他疾病相比优先级较低，今年向历史上疫情最严重的地区提供疫苗的计划被推迟了。
ref: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July. The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos. The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides. Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year. Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.

src: 修正议案在 2011 年就在两院通过了。 本次的立法会议进行了一处修改，先是众议院删除了其中的第二句话语，随后参议院在周一如法炮制，使其获准通过。 禁止同性民事结合的第二个语句未能通过，这可能会为未来的同性婚姻打开大门。 在这一过程之后，下一届选举产生的立法机构，将在 2015 年或 2016 年再次审查 HJR-3 决议，确保它持续贯彻执行。
mt: 2011, the bill passed both chambers. This time, the House deleted the second sentence, and the Senate followed suit on Monday, allowing the bill to pass. The second sentence, which would have banned same-sex civil unions, did not pass, which may open the door for future same-sex marriage. After this process, the next legislature, elected in 2014 or 2016, will again review HJR-3, ensuring it is carried out.
ref: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011. A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday. The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future. Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.

src: “巴拿马文件” 是巴拿马莫萨克·冯塞卡律师事务所 (Mossack Fonseca) 约 1,000 万份文件的总称，这些文件在 2016 年春季被爆料给媒体。 文件显示，十四家银行帮助富有的客户隐藏了数十亿美元的财富来逃避税收和其它监管。 英国《卫报》指出，在用于实现这一目标的 1200 家空壳公司中，德意志银行控制了大约三分之一。 世界各地都发生了抗议活动，有几起刑事诉讼，冰岛和巴基斯坦政府的领导人都辞职了。
mt: The "Panama Papers" is the collective name for 11.5 million files of the Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, which were leaked to the media in the spring of 2016. The files show that fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of dollars in wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. The British Guardian reported that Deutsche Bank controlled about a third of the 1200 shell companies used to achieve this goal. Protests occurred in countries around the world, several criminal cases were filed, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned.
ref: """Panama Papers"" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016. The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this. There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned."

src: “巴拿马文件” 是巴拿马莫萨克·冯塞卡律师事务所 (Mossack Fonseca) 约 1,000 万份文件的总称，这些文件在 2016 年春季被爆料给媒体。 文件显示，十四家银行帮助富有的客户隐藏了数十亿美元的财富来逃避税收和其它监管。 英国《卫报》指出，在用于实现这一目标的 1200 家空壳公司中，德意志银行控制了大约三分之一。 世界各地都发生了抗议活动，有几起刑事诉讼，冰岛和巴基斯坦政府的领导人都辞职了。
mt: The "Panama Papers" is the collective name for 11.5 million files of the Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, which were leaked to the media in the spring of 2016. The files show that fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of dollars in wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. The British Guardian reported that Deutsche Bank controlled about a third of the 1200 shell companies used to achieve this goal. Protests occurred in countries around the world, several criminal cases were filed, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned.
ref: """Panama Papers"" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016. The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this. There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned."

src: 空难在伊朗是司空见惯的事，这个国家的民用和军用飞机都已经老化，缺少维护。 在国际制裁下，伊朗无法购买新的飞机。 本周早些时候，一架警用直升机坠毁，事件造成 3 人死亡，3 人受伤。 上个月，伊朗一架飞往亚美尼亚的客机坠毁，机上 168 人遇难，这是伊朗多年来最惨烈的一起空难。 同一个月，又有一架客机冲出马什哈德的跑道，撞上一堵墙，造成 17 人死亡。
mt: Accidents are common in Iran, where both civilian and military aircraft are old and poorly maintained. Under international sanctions, Iran cannot buy new planes. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crashed, killing three people and injuring three others. Last month, an Iranian passenger plane crashed in Armenia, killing all 168 people on board, the deadliest crash in Iran in years. The same month, another passenger plane ran off the runway in Mashhad, crashing into a wall and killing 17 people.
ref: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.

src: 伊拉克研究小组于格林尼治时间 (GMT) 今天 12 点提交了报告。 报告警告称，没有人能保证目前在伊拉克采取的任何行动能够阻止宗派战争、不断增长的暴力或走向混乱。 该报告开篇呼吁美国就中东政策展开公开辩论并形成共识。 该报告对行政当局目前对伊拉克政策的几乎每一个方面都提出了严厉批评，并敦促立即改变方向。 在这份报告的 78 项建议中，第一条建议是在今年年底之前采取新的外交行动，目的在于保护伊拉克的边界免受敌对势力的侵害，并与邻国重建外交关系。
mt: 12:00 GMT today, an Iraqi study group submitted its report. The report warned that no one can guarantee that any action taken in Iraq at present will prevent sectarian war, growing violence, or chaos. The report called for an open debate and consensus on U.S. policy in the Middle East. The report criticized almost every aspect of the administration's current policy in Iraq and urged an immediate change of direction. Among the 78 recommendations in the report, the first was to take new diplomatic action by the end of the year to protect Iraq's borders from hostile forces and to rebuild diplomatic relations with neighboring countries.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: 安莎通讯社表示：“警方对多起高层遇袭事件感到担忧，担心这类事件可能会引发一场全面继任战争。 警方表示，洛皮科洛之所以能占上风，是因为他曾是普罗文扎诺在巴勒莫的得力助手。他经验丰富，赢得了老一辈黑帮老大们的尊重，这些人奉行普罗文扎诺的政策，在增强帮派势力的同时，尽可能保持低调。 1992 年，普罗文扎诺（Provenzano）结束了由里亚纳发动的反政府的战争，这场战争夺去了黑手党十字军乔瓦尼·法尔科内（Giovanni Falcone）和保罗·博尔塞利诺（Paolo Borsellino）的生命，随后这些老大们就被他控制住了。“
mt: "Police are worried about a series of attacks on top mafia figures, fearing they could spark a full-scale succession war. Police say Lopricolo was able to gain the upper hand because he was a trusted aide of Provenzano in Palermo. He is experienced and has the respect of the old bosses who follow Provenzano's policy of strengthening the clan while keeping a low profile. In 1992, Provenzano ended the war launched by Riina against the state, which claimed the lives of mafia godfathers Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino, and then took control of the old bosses," Ansa reported.
ref: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: 日本柔道选手、两枚奥运会金牌得主齐藤仁 (Hitoshi Saito) 逝世，享年 54 岁。 宣布的死因是肝内胆管癌。 周二，他在大阪去世。 作为前奥运冠军和世界冠军的齐藤仁，在去世前担任全日本柔道联盟训练委员会主席。
mt: 54-year-old Hitoshi Saito, a Japanese judo athlete and two-time Olympic gold medalist, died. The cause of death was bile duct cancer. He died on Monday in Osaka. As a former Olympic champion and world champion, Hitoshi Saito was the chairman of the training committee of the All-Japan Judo Federation before his death.
ref: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54. The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.

src: 在旅途中，岩崎在很多场合碰到了麻烦。 他曾被海盗抢劫，在西藏被疯狗袭击，在尼泊尔逃婚，还曾在印度被捕。
mt: On his journey, Iwazaki encountered trouble in many places. He was robbed by pirates, attacked by mad dogs in Tibet, escaped from a marriage in Nepal, and was arrested in India.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions. He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: 詹卡洛·费斯切拉因失去了对赛车的把控，在比赛开始后不久就退出了。 他的队友费尔南多·阿隆索（Fernando Alonso）在比赛中的绝大多数时间里都处于领先地位，但却在进站后就退出了比赛，大概是因为其右前轮实在塞得厉害。 迈克尔·舒马赫在阿隆索退赛后不久也退出了比赛，因为在比赛的多次竞逐中，悬架受到了损伤。
mt: 2010 F1 season champion Jenson Button won the 2011 Canadian Grand Prix, while his McLaren teammate Lewis Hamilton finished second. Ferrari's Fernando Alonso and Michael Schumacher both retired from the race.
ref: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel. Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.

src: 在过去的 3 个月里，超过 80 名被捕者在没有被正式起诉的情况下从中央拘留所释放。 今年 4 月，格林法官针对该机构颁布了一项临时禁令，强制释放那些被关押 24 小时以上，却没有得到法庭专员听证的人。 如果获得批准，法庭专员即可设定保释金，并最终确定执行逮捕的警员提出的指控。这些指控随后会录入该州的计算机系统，以便在其中对案件进行追踪。 听证会也会根据嫌疑人的权利，定下快速审判的日期。
mt: 80+ detainees have been released from central detention without being formally charged in the past 3 months. In April, Greene J. issued a temporary injunction against the institution, requiring the release of those detained for more than 24 hours without a hearing by a magistrate. If approved, the magistrate can set bail and ultimately determine the charges brought by the arresting officer. These charges will then be entered into the state's computer system for tracking of the case. Hearings will be set according to the rights of the suspect.
ref: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged. In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.

src: 洛丁（Lodin）还表示，官员们决定取消第二轮选举，是为了给阿富汗人节省再次选举的开支，同时避免选举的安全风险。 外交官们表示在阿富汗宪法中发现了足够多的歧义，因此没有必要举办决胜选举。 这与先前的报道相矛盾，先前的报道称取消决选本来是违反宪法的。
mt: Lodin said officials decided to cancel the second round of voting to save the cost of another election and to avoid the security risks of holding a runoff. Diplomats said they found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to justify not holding a runoff. This contradicts earlier reports that the cancellation would be unconstitutional.
ref: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election. Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.

src: 自 1947 年巴基斯坦从英国麾下独立以来，巴基斯坦总统就任命“政治代理”来管理 FATA，而 FATA 则对该地区实行几乎完全的自治。 这些代理人负责根据《巴基斯坦宪法》第 247 条提供政府和司法服务。
mt: Since Pakistan's independence from British rule in 1947, Pakistani presidents have appointed "political agents" to govern FATA, which has been granted almost complete autonomy under the Pakistani constitution. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani constitution.
ref: "Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed ""Political Agents"" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."

src: 这部由瑞恩·高斯林 (Ryan Gosling) 和艾玛·斯通 (Emma Stone) 主演的电影获得了各大奖项的提名。 高斯林和斯通分别获得了最佳男主角和最佳女主角的提名。 其他提名包括最佳影片、最佳导演、最佳摄影、最佳服装设计、最佳电影剪辑、最佳原创配乐、最佳艺术指导、最佳音效剪辑、最佳混音和最佳原创剧本。 该电影的两首歌曲《追梦痴子心》和《星光之城》获得了最佳原创歌曲的提名。狮门影业获得了 26 项提名，比其他任何一家工作室都要多。
mt: This film, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, has been nominated for all the major awards. Gosling and Stone were nominated for Best Actor and Best Actress, respectively. Other nominations include Best Picture, Best Director, Best Cinematography, Best Costume Design, Best Film Editing, Best Original Score, Best Production Design, Best Sound Editing, Best Sound Mixing, and Best Original Screenplay. The film's two songs, "City of Stars" and "Audition (The Fools Who Dream)," were nominated for Best Original Song. Lionsgate received 26 nominations, more than any other studio.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: 这部由瑞恩·高斯林 (Ryan Gosling) 和艾玛·斯通 (Emma Stone) 主演的电影获得了各大奖项的提名。 高斯林和斯通分别获得了最佳男主角和最佳女主角的提名。 其他提名包括最佳影片、最佳导演、最佳摄影、最佳服装设计、最佳电影剪辑、最佳原创配乐、最佳艺术指导、最佳音效剪辑、最佳混音和最佳原创剧本。 该电影的两首歌曲《追梦痴子心》和《星光之城》获得了最佳原创歌曲的提名。狮门影业获得了 26 项提名，比其他任何一家工作室都要多。
mt: This film, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, has been nominated for all the major awards. Gosling and Stone were nominated for Best Actor and Best Actress, respectively. Other nominations include Best Picture, Best Director, Best Cinematography, Best Costume Design, Best Film Editing, Best Original Score, Best Production Design, Best Sound Editing, Best Sound Mixing, and Best Original Screenplay. The film's two songs, "City of Stars" and "Audition (The Fools Who Dream)," were nominated for Best Original Song. Lionsgate received 26 nominations, more than any other studio.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: 日本广播协会 (NHK) 还报道说，位于新泻县的柏崎刈羽 (Kashiwazaki Kariwa) 核电站运行正常。 北陆电力株式会社报道称，志贺核能发电厂 1 号和 2 号反应堆已经关闭，地震并未造成影响。 据报道，该地区约有 9400 户家庭断水，大约 100 户断电。 一些道路受到了损坏，受影响地区的铁路服务中断，石川（Ishikawa）县的能登机场仍然处于关闭状态。
mt: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata Prefecture was running normally.  Chubu Electric Power Co. reported that the No. 1 and No. 2 reactors at the Higashidori nuclear power plant were shut down and were not affected by the quake.  It was reported that about 9,400 households were without water and about 100 were without power.  Some roads were damaged and train service was suspended in the affected area, and Ishikawa Prefecture's Noto Airport remained closed.
ref: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.

src: 据透露，这份文件将提及边界争端，巴勒斯坦希望以1967年中东战争前的边界为基础。 据报道，讨论的其他议题包括对两国来说都神圣的耶路撒冷的未来状态和约旦河谷问题。 以色列要求协议签订后，在山谷中部署十年的军事力量，而巴勒斯坦民族权力机构只同意保留五年。
mt: The document is expected to address border disputes, with the Palestinians wanting a basis of the pre-1967 Middle East war borders. Other issues reportedly discussed include the future status of Jerusalem, which is holy to both sides, and the Jordan Valley. Israel wants a military presence in the valley for ten years after a deal is signed, while the Palestinian National Authority only agreed to five years.
ref: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.

src: 马生于香港，曾就读于纽约大学和哈佛大学法学院，还一度持有美国永久居民身份证“绿卡”。 谢长廷在选举期间暗示，马英九在遇到危机时可能会逃离台湾。 谢长廷还声称马英九虽然很上镜，但中看不中用。 尽管受到这些指责，马英九在一次演讲中主张与中国大陆建立更加紧密的联系，并轻松获胜。
mt: Born in Hong Kong, he attended New York University and Harvard Law School, and once held a green card, a permanent resident identity card in the United States.  During the election, Tsai Ing-wen hinted that Ma Ying-jeou might flee Taiwan when facing a crisis.  Tsai Ing-wen also claimed that Ma Ying-jeou is very photogenic, but not useful.  Despite these accusations, Ma Ying-jeou advocated a closer relationship with mainland China in a speech and won easily.
ref: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."

src: 显然，很多家庭都在寻求法律帮助，以反对这种驱逐行为。为此，东湾社区法律中心于3月20日举行会议，帮助房屋诈骗的受害者。 房客们开始聊起身边趣闻，这时大部分涉事家庭突然意识到，OHA 的卡罗琳·威尔逊私吞了他们的押金，溜出城去了。 Lockwood Gardens 的租户认为，可能还有 40户 甚至更多的家庭面临被驱逐的命运，因为他们了解到，奥克兰住房管理局的警察还在调查奥克兰其他可能陷入房屋骗局的公房。
mt: Many families are seeking legal help to fight the evictions. The East Bay Community Law Center held a meeting on March 20 to help victims of housing scams. Tenants began talking about the news, and most of the affected families suddenly realized that OHA's Carolyn Wilson had pocketed their deposits and fled the city. Tenants of Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be 40 or more families facing eviction because they learned that Oakland Housing Authority police are still investigating other possible housing scams in Oakland.
ref: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.

src: 比赛结束后，凯塞洛斯基以 2,250 分的成绩，继续在车手积分榜上高居榜首。 约翰逊落后 7 分，以 2243 分排名第二。 哈姆林落后二十分，是第三名，但领先鲍耶五分。卡纳 (Kahne) 和小楚克斯 (Truex, Jr.) 分别以 2,220 和 2,207 分位列第五和第六。 斯图尔特、戈登 、肯塞斯和哈维克在本赛季还剩四场比赛的情况下，进入车手积分榜前十名。
mt: After the race, Keselowski maintained the top spot in the driver standings with 2,250 points. Johnson was second, 7 points behind, with 2,243 points. Hamlin was third, 20 points behind, with 2,223 points. Kahne and Truex, Jr. were fifth and sixth, respectively, with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth and Harvick were in the top ten with four races remaining in the season.
ref: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.

src: 这被认为是人类历史上第五次观测到经过化学方式证实的火星物质坠落到地球上。 在已知的大约 24,000 块坠落至地球的陨石中，经核实只有 34 块是来自火星。 这些岩石中的十五块来源于去年七月份的流星雨。 其中一些岩石在地球上非常稀有，售价在每盎司 11,000 美元到 22,500 美元之间，比黄金的价格高出约十倍。
mt: This is the fifth time in human history that Martian material has been confirmed to have fallen to Earth by chemical means. Of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites that have fallen to Earth, only 34 are known to be from Mars. Fifteen of these rocks came from a meteor shower in July last year. Some of these rocks are very rare on Earth, selling for between $11,000 and$22,500 per ounce, about ten times the price of gold.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

src: 在赢得一级方程式赛车锦标赛 (Formula 1) 总冠军七次后于 2006 年退役的名将舒马赫 (Schumacher)，将接替受伤的菲利佩·马萨 (Felipe Massa)。 这位巴西选手在 2009 年匈牙利大奖赛期间发生车祸，头部严重受伤。 马萨 (Massa) 至少在 2009 赛季的其余比赛中都不会出场。
mt: 2006 Formula 1 champion Michael Schumacher, who retired after winning the title seven times, will replace Felipe Massa, who was injured in a crash at the Hungarian Grand Prix in 2009. Massa will not compete in the remaining races of the 2009 season.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

src: 到目前为止，由于 AOL 已在美国广泛普及，该公司能够按照自己的节奏推进和开发即时通讯市场。 在这样的安排下，这种自由可能就要结束了。 雅虎和微软服务的用户总和，与美国在线的客户数不相上下。
mt: So far, AOL has been able to develop and expand the instant messaging market at its own pace because it was the dominant player in the U.S. market. That freedom may be coming to an end. The number of users of Yahoo and Microsoft services is comparable to the number of AOL's customers.
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: 昨日上午，土耳其加齐安泰普（Gaziantep）的警察总部发生了一起汽车炸弹爆炸事件，该事件导致两名警察死亡，20 余人受伤。 州长办公室表示，伤者中有十九人是警察。 警方说他们怀疑一名疑似伊斯兰国 (ISIL) 的武装分子发动了这场袭击。
mt: 19 people were injured and two police officers were killed in a car bomb explosion outside the police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey, on Monday morning. The governor's office said 19 of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspected an Islamic State (ISIL) militant was behind the attack.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: 前马萨诸塞州州长米特·罗姆尼星期二以超过 46% 的选票在佛罗里达州的共和党总统初选中获胜。 前美国众议院议长纽特·金里奇获得 32% 的选票，位居第二。 作为一个“赢者通吃”的州，佛罗里达州将所有 50 张选举代表票都投给了罗姆尼，使他在共和党提名中保持领先。
mt: Former Massachusetts Governor Mitt Romney won the Republican presidential primary in Florida on Tuesday with more than 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. House Speaker Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent of the vote. As a winner-take-all state, Florida will give all 50 of its electoral votes to Romney, keeping him ahead in the Republican nomination race.
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

src: 前众议院议长纽特·金里奇、德克萨斯州州长里克·佩里和女国会议员米歇尔·巴赫曼最终分别名列第四、第五和第六。 结果出来后，金里奇连连称赞桑托勒姆，但对罗姆尼做出严厉批评。以后者的名义，在爱荷华州放送对金里奇不利的竞选广告。 佩里表示，他会“返回得克萨斯，评估今晚党团会议的结果，明确自己在这次较量中是否有胜算的余地”。但后来他又表示会继续参加竞选，并参加于 1 月 21 日在南卡罗莱纳州举行的初选。 八月曾在埃姆斯模拟民意调查中胜出的巴赫曼决定退出竞选。

ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."
