src: ”根据该电台的网站描述，这档节目是一档“带有全新震撼极客风格的老式广播剧！” 早年，该节目仅在运营已久的互联网广播网站TogiNet Radio上播出，TogiNet Radio是一个专注于谈话广播的网站。 2015 年年末， TogiNet 创建了 AstroNet 广播作为子电台。 该节目最初由业余配音演员参演，范围从当地人到东德克萨斯州人。
mt: "According to the website of the radio station, this show is a 'new old-fashioned radio drama with a new shock geek style!' In the early years, the show was only broadcast on the long-running internet radio station TogiNet Radio, which is a website focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet created AstroNet Radio as a substation. The show was originally performed by amateur voice actors, ranging from locals to East Texans."
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: 2008 年 11 月 26 日，孟买袭击者带着手榴弹和自动武器乘船抵达。他们袭击了多个目标，包括人群密集的查特拉帕蒂·希瓦吉 (Chhatrapati Shivaji) 火车站和著名的泰姬陵酒店。 戴维·黑德利（David Headley）的侦察和情报搜集工作，促使巴基斯坦激进组织虔诚军（Laskhar-e-Taiba）的 10 名枪手发动这次行动。 这次袭击事件给印巴关系造成了巨大压力。
mt: 2008 November 26, Mumbai attackers arrived by boat with grenades and automatic weapons. They attacked multiple targets, including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji train station and the famous Taj Mahal hotel. David Headley's reconnaissance and intelligence gathering work led to the 10 gunmen of the Pakistani militant group Lashkar-e-Taiba launching this attack. The attack put tremendous pressure on Indo-Pakistani relations.
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

src: 纳达尔（Nadal）与加拿大人的交手记录是 7-2。 不久前，他在布里斯班公开赛上败于拉奥尼奇。 纳达尔（Nadal ）在比赛中把 88% 的净胜分收入囊中，在第一个发球局赢得 76 分。 赛后，红土之王拉斐尔·纳达尔称：“我很开心重返能这项重大赛事的决赛，我会尽全力争取夺冠。”
mt: Nadal's record against Canadians is 7-2.  He was recently beaten by Raonic in Brisbane.  Nadal won 76% of his first serve points in the first set.  After the match, Rafael Nadal said: "I'm very happy to be back in the final of a major tournament, I will give my all to win."
ref: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""

src: 上周，裸体新闻 (Naked News) 宣布将推出三档新的广播节目，以此大幅增加其在新闻报道中的国际语言授权。 该全球组织已经使用英语和日语进行报道，目前正在为电视、网络和移动设备推出西班牙语、意大利语和韩语节目。
mt: Last week, Naked News announced the launch of three new broadcasts to significantly increase its international language rights in news reporting. The global organization has been reporting in English and Japanese, and is now launching Spanish, Italian and Korean programs for television, the web and mobile devices.
ref: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.

The global organization has been reporting in English and Japanese, and is now launching Spanish, Italian and Korean programs for television, the web and mobile devices.
ref: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.

src: 除了周三的比赛，卡帕内多（Carpanedo）还参加了锦标赛的两项个人竞赛。 她的第一个项目是障碍滑雪，并在第一回合以“未完成”的成绩结束比赛。该比赛 116 名参赛者中有 36 人取得了相同的成绩。 她的另一项比赛是大回转，在女子站姿组中以 4:41.30 分钟的总成绩名列第十，比排名第一的奥地利选手克劳迪娅·罗什慢了 2:11.60 分钟，比排名第九的匈牙利选手巩基·达尼慢了 1:09.02 分钟。 女子坐式组的四名滑雪选手未能完赛，大回转项目（Giant Slalom）的 117 名选手中有 45 人未能挤进榜单。
mt: In addition to the Wednesday race, Carpanedo also competed in two individual events. Her first event was slalom and she finished the first run with a "did not finish" score. There were 36 competitors with the same score out of 116. Her other event was giant slalom, where she finished tenth in the seated women's event with a total time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 behind the first-place Austrian Claudia Roesch and 1:09.02 behind the ninth-place Hungarian Gabor Danis. Four of the 117 women's seated competitors did not finish the giant slalom, and 45 did not make the cut for the final rankings.
ref: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.

src: 出于对新冠疫情的担忧，美国国家篮球协会 (NBA) 周三暂停了职业篮球赛季。 犹他爵士队的一名球员新冠肺炎病毒检测呈阳性，NBA 随即做出了这项决定。
mt: The National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season on Wednesday out of concern for the new coronavirus. A Utah Jazz player tested positive for the virus, prompting the NBA to make the decision.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: 今日最佳选手是来自华盛顿首都队的亚历克斯·奥韦奇金。 在华盛顿队以 5-3 的比分战胜亚特兰大鸫鸟队的比赛中，他贡献了 2 个进球和 2 次助攻。 奥韦奇金（Ovechkin）当晚的第一个助攻，来自新秀尼克拉斯·贝克斯特伦 (Nicklas Backstrom) 的制胜一球; 他当晚的第二个进球是他本赛季的第60个进球，成为自1995-96赛季以来首位在一个赛季中打进60个或更多进球的球员——在1995-96赛季，亚罗米尔·雅格和马里奥·拉缪都达到了这一里程碑。
mt: 今日最佳选手是来自华盛顿首都队的亚历克斯·奥韦奇金。 在华盛顿队以 5-3 的比分战胜亚特兰大鸫鸟队的比赛中，他贡献了 2 个进球和 2 次助攻。 奥韦奇金（Ovechkin）当晚的第一个助攻，来自新秀尼克拉斯·贝克斯特伦 (Nicklas Backstrom) 的制胜一球; 他当晚的第二个进球是他本赛季的第60个进球，成为自1995-96赛季以来首位在一个赛季中打进60个或更多进球的球员——在1995-96赛季，亚罗米尔·雅格和马里奥·拉缪都达到了这一里程碑。
ref: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.

mt: 今日最佳选手是来自华盛顿首都队的亚历克斯·奥韦奇金。 在华盛顿队以 5-3 的比分战胜亚特兰大鸫鸟队的比赛中，他贡献了 2 个进球和 2 次助攻。 奥韦奇金（Ovechkin）当晚的第一个助攻，来自新秀尼克拉斯·贝克斯特伦 (Nicklas Backstrom) 的制胜一球; 他当晚的第二个进球是他本赛季的第60个进球，成为自1995-96赛季以来首位在一个赛季中打进60个或更多进球的球员——在1995-96赛季，亚罗米尔·雅格和马里奥·拉缪都达到了这一里程碑。
ref: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.

src: 北岩银行在 2008 年被收归国有，此前有消息称，该公司获得了英国政府的紧急援助。 由于在 2007 年次贷危机期间遭到曝光，北岩银行 (Northern Rock) 曾请求政府提供援助。 布兰森爵士 (Sir Richard Branson) 的维珍集团 (Virgin Group) 在该银行进行国有化之前曾出价收购，但遭到拒绝。 2010 年，当时的高街银行北岩银行（Northern Rock plc）在国有化的同时，从 “坏银行” 北岩资产管理公司 （Northern Rock Asset Management）中剥离出来。 维珍集团只收购了北岩银行“好的部分”，没有收购其资产管理公司。
mt: 2008, Northern Rock was nationalized. Prior to this, there were reports that the company had received emergency assistance from the British government. Northern Rock had requested assistance from the government during the 2007 subprime crisis. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had bid to buy the bank before it was nationalized, but was rejected. In 2010, when Northern Rock plc was nationalized, it was simultaneously separated from the "bad bank" Northern Rock Asset Management. Virgin Group only bought the "good part" of Northern Rock, not its asset management company.
ref: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.

src: 陆克文先生决定签署《京都气候议定书》，这使得美国成为唯一没有签署该协议的发达国家。 澳大利亚前保守党政府拒绝签署《京都议定书》，声称由于澳大利亚严重依赖煤炭出口，该协议会削弱澳大利亚的经济，而印度和中国等国却未受排放目标的约束。
mt: Mr. Rudd decided to sign the Kyoto Protocol, making the United States the only developed country not to have signed the agreement. The former conservative Australian government refused to sign the Kyoto Protocol, saying that the agreement would weaken the Australian economy because of its heavy reliance on coal exports, while India and China were not bound by the emission targets.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: 护林员会密切监督参加虫害防治补充试验的射手，因为试验会受到监测，并会评估其效果。 在国家公园野生动物管理局（NPWS）和澳大利亚射击运动员协会（NSW）的合作中，射击运动员协会为狩猎计划招募了合格的志愿者。 澳大利亚新州国家公园和野生动物服务中心（NPWS）保护和遗产管理处代理主任米克·奥弗林（Mick O’flynn）表示：选中参与第一次射击行动的四名枪手均已接受全面的安全及培训指导。
mt: The shooters will be closely monitored by rangers as the trial will be closely monitored and its effectiveness assessed. The shooters were recruited by the NSW Shooting Association in collaboration with the National Parks and Wildlife Service (NPWS) for the hunting program. Mick O’Flynn, NPWS Protection and Heritage Management Acting Director, said: “The four shooters selected for the first shooting action have all received comprehensive safety and training guidance.”
ref: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.

src: 根据这块化石，这意味着分裂较分子证据所预计的要早得多。 这意味着一切都要推到更久之前。“埃塞俄比亚裂谷研究所的研究员、该研究的合著者 Berhane Asfaw 如是说。
mt: According to this fossil, this means that the split was much earlier than the molecular evidence predicted. This means everything has to be pushed back further. "This is a very important discovery," says Berhane Asfaw, a researcher at the Ethiopian Rift Valley Research Institute and a co-author of the study.
ref: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."

src: 在周四的东京电玩展上，任天堂总裁岩田聪发表主题演讲，公布了公司新一代任天堂 Revolution 游戏主机控制器的设计。 该控制器类似于电视遥控器，使用放置在用户电视机附近的两个传感器来对其在三维空间中的位置进行三角测量。 它让玩家可以通过在空中移动设备来控制电子游戏中的运动和操作。
mt: On Thursday, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata gave a keynote address at the Tokyo Game Show, unveiling the design of the new Nintendo Revolution game console controller. The controller resembles a television remote, using two sensors placed near the user's television to perform three-dimensional triangulation of its position. It allows players to control electronic games by moving the device in the air.
ref: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

src: 早些时候，中国通讯社新华社报道了一架飞机已被劫持的新闻。 随后的报道称，这架飞机受到炸弹威胁，被迫返回阿富汗，降落在坎大哈。 早些时候的报道称，这架飞机被拒绝在乌鲁木齐紧急降落后，已返回阿富汗。
mt: Earlier, China's Xinhua news agency reported a plane had been hijacked. Subsequent reports said the plane was threatened with a bomb and forced to return to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. Earlier reports said the plane was refused an emergency landing in Urumqi and had returned to Afghanistan.
ref: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.

src: 周一，瑞典学院诺贝尔文学委员会常务秘书萨拉·丹尼尔斯在瑞典广播电台的一档节目中向公众宣布，委员会因无法直接联系到鲍勃·迪伦，通知他获得了 2016 年诺贝尔文学奖，已经放弃了与他联系的尝试。 达尼厄斯说道：“目前我们保持按兵不动。我给他关系最好的合作者打过电话并发送了电子邮件，而且收到了对方非常友好的回复。就目前而言，这足够了。”
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy's Nobel Literature Committee, announced on a Swedish radio program that the committee had given up trying to contact Bob Dylan, who was awarded the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature. "We're keeping our powder dry for now," Danius said. "I've called his closest collaborator and sent him an email, and I've gotten a very friendly response. That's enough for now."
ref: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""

src: "美国总统乔治·沃克·布什对这一公告表示支持。 ""布什政府发言人戈登·约翰德罗 (Gordon Johndroe) 称朝鲜的承诺是""朝着实现朝鲜半岛可核查的无核化目标迈出的重要一步""。"""
mt: "U.S. President George W. Bush supports the announcement. ""Gordon Johndroe, a spokesman for the Bush administration, said the North Korean pledge was ""an important step toward the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula."""
ref: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge ""a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."""

src: 1956 年，斯拉尼亚（Słania）搬到了瑞典。三年后他开始在瑞典邮局上班，成为首席邮票雕刻师。 他曾为瑞典和其他 28 个国家/地区制作过 1000 多版邮票。 他的作品极具辨识度，拥有高质量和丰富的细节，这也使得他成为了极少数在集邮人士中“家喻户晓”的人物之一。有些人专门收集他的作品。 “他在 2000 年制作的第 1000 张邮票取材自大卫·克洛克·埃伦斯特拉尔的名画《瑞典国王的伟大功绩》，并因此入选《吉尼斯世界纪录大全》。” 他还参与了许多国家的纸币雕版制作，近期作品包括加拿大新版 5 元和 100 元纸币正面的总理肖像。
mt: 1956, Słania moved to Sweden. Three years later he began working at the Swedish Post Office as chief engraver. He has made over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is easily recognizable, of high quality and with rich detail, making him one of the few people in the philatelic world to be a household name. Some people collect his work. "He made his 1,000th stamp in 2000, based on David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl's painting 'The Great Deed of the Swedish King', and was entered into the Guinness Book of World Records." He also participated in the engraving of the faces of many countries' banknotes, including the new Canadian $5 and $100 banknotes.
ref: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."

src: 在阿拉斯加费尔班克斯（Fairbanks）南部发生数千桶原油泄漏后，横贯阿拉斯加、长达800英里的输油管道系统被关闭。 消防指挥系统的例行测试引发了一场电力故障，故障使得安全阀开启，导致原油于格里利堡（Fort Greely）第 9 泵站附近溢出。 阀门打开后，系统将释放压力，原油可通过油垫流入一个可容纳 55000 桶（230 万加仑）原油的油箱。 截至周三下午，油箱的排气口仍在漏油，这很可能是由油箱内部的热膨胀造成的。 在容积为 104,500 桶的蓄水池的下面，另一个二级防泄漏围护区还没有完全填满。
mt: After a spill of thousands of barrels of oil in south Fairbanks, Alaska, the pipeline system that runs across Alaska for 800 miles was closed.  A routine test of the fire command system caused a power outage, which caused the safety valve to open, allowing oil to spill near the 9th pump station at Fort Greely.  After the valve opened, the system would release pressure, allowing oil to flow into a tank that could hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons) of oil.  As of Wednesday afternoon, the vent on the tank was still leaking, which may be caused by the tank's internal heat expansion.  Another secondary containment area below the 104,500-barrel reservoir had not yet been completely filled.
ref: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

src: 美国陆军工兵部队估计，6 英寸的降雨量就可能冲垮之前损坏的堤坝。 “卡特里娜”飓风来袭时，第九区洪水水位一度高达 20 英尺，由于附近的防洪堤已经被淹没，目前水位已达齐腰深度。 在一处 100 英尺宽的河段，水即将溢出堤坝。
mt: 6 inches of rain could wash out levees that were damaged by Hurricane Katrina, according to the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers. The Ninth Ward's floodwaters reached 20 feet high, and the levees were already underwater, and the water is now up to the waist. At a 100-foot-wide stretch, the water is about to overflow the levees.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: 美国陆军工兵部队估计，6 英寸的降雨量就可能冲垮之前损坏的堤坝。 “卡特里娜”飓风来袭时，第九区洪水水位一度高达 20 英尺，由于附近的防洪堤已经被淹没，目前水位已达齐腰深度。 在一处 100 英尺宽的河段，水即将溢出堤坝。
mt: 6 inches of rain could wash out levees that were damaged by Hurricane Katrina, according to the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers. The Ninth Ward's floodwaters reached 20 feet high, and the levees were already underwater, and the water is now up to the waist. At a 100-foot-wide stretch, the water is about to overflow the levees.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: 汉密尔顿（Hamilton）确认，霍华德大学医院收治的病人情况稳定。 这名患者曾去过尼日利亚，当地曾出现数宗埃博拉病毒的病例。 医院遵循了感染控制规定，包括把患者与他人隔离，以防感染到其他人。
mt: Hamilton confirmed that the patient at Howard University Hospital is stable. The patient had traveled to Nigeria, where there have been cases of Ebola virus. The hospital followed infection control protocols, including isolating the patient from others to prevent spreading to others.
ref: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition. The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.

src: 彗星可能是地球上的水和有机物的来源，这些有机物可以形成蛋白质并维持生命的存续。 科学家希望了解自从彗星很久以前与地球相撞以来，行星是如何形成的，尤其是地球的形成方式。
mt: Comets may be the source of water and organic material on Earth, which can form proteins and sustain life. Scientists hope to learn how planets formed, especially Earth, since comets collided with the planet long ago.
ref: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.

src: 尽管当局还不确定威胁是否属实，但马里兰运输局在联邦调查局的敦促下关闭了该设施。 自卸卡车用来封锁隧道入口， 80 名警察于现场协助指挥驾车者绕行。 在该市的备用线路即环城高速公路上，没有出现严重的交通延误。
mt: Although authorities are not sure if the threat is real, the Maryland Transportation Authority closed the facility at the urging of the FBI. A dump truck was used to block the tunnel entrance, and 80 police officers were on scene to help direct drivers around the closure. There were no major traffic delays on the city's backup route, the Beltway.
ref: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours. There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.

src: 这名摄影师被送往加州大学洛杉矶分校罗纳德·里根医疗中心，其后不治。 报道称他年仅 20 多岁。比伯发表声明表示：“虽然我当时并不在场，也没有直接经历这起悲惨事故，但我仍为死者家属感到悲伤，为他们祈祷。” 娱乐新闻网站TMZ了解到，该名摄影师在Sepulveda大道的另一侧停车，开始拍摄警察的拦截，并在横穿马路后继续拍照，促使进行交通拦截的加州公路巡警两次停下手中工作，命令他回到对面。 据警方称，撞倒摄影师的汽车司机未必会面临刑事指控。
mt: The photographer was taken to the Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he later died. He was reportedly in his early 20s. Bieber posted a statement saying, "Although I wasn't there and didn't witness the accident, I still feel absolutely horrible and am praying for the victims and their families." TMZ reports the photographer was parking on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard, began taking pictures of the police stop, and continued taking pictures after crossing the street, prompting the CHP to stop twice and order him back to the other side. The driver of the car that hit the photographer may not face criminal charges, according to police.
ref: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."

src: 总统内务大臣罗德里戈·阿里亚斯表示，阿里亚斯的检测结果呈阳性，为轻度病毒感染。 尽管总统将居家隔离数日，但他的病情很稳定。 “除了发烧和喉咙痛外，我感觉不错，身体状况良好，并以远程办公形式继续着我的工作。 阿里亚斯 (Arias) 在一份声明中表示：“我有望在周一恢复所有工作。”
mt: President Rodrigo Aria's test results were positive for a mild viral infection. Although the president will be in isolation for several days, his condition is stable. "In addition to fever and sore throat, I feel well and my health is good, and I will continue my work in a remote office form. Aria (Arias) said in a statement: "I hope to resume all work on Monday."
ref: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."

src: 热带气旋风暴古努（以马尔代夫语中一种以棕榈叶编织的袋子命名），在最高峰时风速可达每小时 240 千米（每小时 149 英里）。 到今天早些时候，风速为每小时 83 公里左右，预计会不断减弱。
mt: Tropical Storm Goni, named after a woven bag made of palm leaves in the Maldivian language, was at its peak with winds of up to 240 kilometers per hour (149 miles per hour). As of earlier today, winds were around 83 kilometers per hour and are expected to continue to weaken.
ref: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.

src: 赤潮的起因源于腰鞭毛藻的浓度高于正常水平。它是一种自然产生的单细胞海洋生物。 自然因素可以互相配合产生理想的条件，让这种藻类的数量急剧增加。 藻类能产生一种神经毒素，能破坏人类和鱼类的神经。 鱼类经常由于水中毒素浓度极高而死亡。 人如果吸入通过风和海浪进入空气的受污染水气，就可能受到影响。
mt: The cause of the red tide is due to the high concentration of the dinoflagellate. It is a single-cell marine organism that is naturally produced. Natural factors can work together to create ideal conditions for the rapid increase in the number of these algae. The algae can produce a neurotoxin that can damage the nervous system of humans and fish. Fish often die from water toxicity due to the extremely high concentration of toxins. Humans can be affected if they inhale contaminated water vapor that enters the air through the wind and sea waves.
ref: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

src: 费利西亚 （Felicia） 曾经是萨菲尔-辛普森 （Saffir-Simpson） 飓风级别的 4 级风暴，周二消散前减弱为热带低气压。 其余威为大部分岛屿带来了阵雨，但截至目前，还没有损坏或洪水的相关报告。 欧胡岛（Oahu）的降雨量达到了 6.34 英寸，被称为“有益的”。 有些降雨会伴随雷暴和频繁的闪电。
mt: Felicia was once a Category 4 hurricane on the Saffir-Simpson scale, but weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating on Tuesday. The rest of the islands received mostly rain, but no reports of damage or flooding have been reported as of yet. Oahu received 6.34 inches of rain, which was called "beneficial." Some of the rain was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning.
ref: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."

src: 在 2008 年新加坡大奖赛上，费尔南多·阿隆索提前进站后，小皮奎特发生撞车，迫使安全车出场。 当位于阿隆索前面的赛车在安全车的引领下进行加油时，他趁机抢先，最终赢得了胜利。 小皮奎特在 2009 年匈牙利大奖赛之后被解雇。
mt: 2008 Singapore Grand Prix, Fernando Alonso pits early, Nico Rosberg crashes into him, forcing a safety car. Alonso takes advantage of the pit stop of the cars ahead of him under the safety car, and wins. Nico Rosberg is fired after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
ref: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

src: 周四，一份发表于《科学》杂志的研究报告称，一种新的鸟类在厄瓜多尔加拉帕戈斯群岛形成。 来自美国普林斯顿大学和瑞典乌普萨拉大学的研究人员报告称，由于当地特有的达尔文雀中的勇地雀和外来的仙人掌大嘴地雀之间的繁殖，这个新物种只进化了两代，尽管人们认为这一过程需要更长的时间。
mt: On Thursday, a study published in the journal Science reported a new bird species formed in the Galapagos Islands of Ecuador. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported that the new species evolved in just two generations from the local Darwin's finches and the introduced large-billed finch, despite the belief that the process takes longer.
ref: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

src: 这一艺术活动也是布加勒斯特市政厅发起的宣传活动的组成部分之一，旨在重新塑造罗马尼亚首都，打造出富有创意、多姿多彩的大都市形象。 今年 6 月至 8 月，这座城市将成为东南欧第一个举办全球最大公共艺术活动奔牛节的城市。
mt: The event is part of a city hall-led campaign to rebrand Bucharest as a creative, colorful metropolis.  The city will be the first in Southeast Europe to host the world's largest public art event, the Running of the Bulls, from June to August.
ref: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.

src: 飞机是飞往伊尔库茨克（Irkutsk）的，并且由内政部队负责驾驶。 已经展开调查。 伊尔-76 自 20 世纪 70 年代以来，一直是俄罗斯和苏联军队的主要组成部分，上个月在俄罗斯已经发生过一起严重事故。 10 月 7 日，一台发动机在飞机起飞时脱离，未造成人员伤亡。该事故后，俄罗斯短暂停飞了伊尔-76。
mt: The plane was en route to Irkutsk and was being flown by the Interior Ministry. An investigation has been launched. The Il-76 has been a mainstay of the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and there was a serious accident involving one last month. On October 7, an engine fell off during takeoff, causing no injuries. After the incident, Russia briefly grounded the Il-76.
ref: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

src: 飞机是飞往伊尔库茨克（Irkutsk）的，并且由内政部队负责驾驶。 已经展开调查。 伊尔-76 自 20 世纪 70 年代以来，一直是俄罗斯和苏联军队的主要组成部分，上个月在俄罗斯已经发生过一起严重事故。 10 月 7 日，一台发动机在飞机起飞时脱离，未造成人员伤亡。该事故后，俄罗斯短暂停飞了伊尔-76。
mt: The plane was en route to Irkutsk and was being flown by the Interior Ministry. An investigation has been launched. The Il-76 has been a mainstay of the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and there was a serious accident involving one last month. On October 7, an engine fell off during takeoff, causing no injuries. After the incident, Russia briefly grounded the Il-76.
ref: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

src: 在出演《辛普森一家》前，西蒙曾在几个节目中担任过多种职位。 20 世纪 80 年代，他在《出租车》、《欢呼》以及《特蕾西·厄尔曼秀》等节目工作。 1989 年，他与布鲁克斯和格罗宁一起创作了《辛普森一家》，并负责聘请了该剧的首支编剧团队。 尽管他在 1993 年离开了节目，但他保留了执行制片人的头衔，并持续获得每季数千万美元的版税。
mt: Before his role on The Simpsons, Simon worked in a variety of positions on several shows. In the 1980s, he worked on Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracey Ullman Show. In 1989, he and Brooks and Groening created The Simpsons, and hired the show's first writing staff. Although he left the show in 1993, he retained the title of executive producer and continued to receive millions of dollars in royalties per season.
ref: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.

src: 福禄克写道，一些人试图压制女性对女性健康问题的呼声，但天不遂人愿。 她之所以得出这个结论，是因为有许多男女个人发给她积极评价和鼓励，竭力主张将避孕药视为医疗必需品。
mt: Fluke wrote that some people tried to suppress the voices of women on women's health issues, but the sky did not favor them. She came to this conclusion because many men and women individuals sent her positive evaluations and encouragement, and insisted that contraceptives be considered a medical necessity.
ref: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.

src: 它会像水一样流动。它和水一样透明。 所以如果你站在海岸线旁边，就能看到底部的各类鹅卵石或泥状物。 斯托芬补充道：“据我们所知，只有一颗行星星体比土卫六表现得更有活力，那就是地球。”
mt: It flows like water. It's transparent like water. So if you're standing on the shoreline, you can see the pebbles or mud at the bottom. Stofan added, "To our knowledge, only one other planetary body in our solar system is more active than Titan, and that's the Earth."
ref: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

src: 这不仅证实了至少有些恐龙有羽毛——这一理论已经广为流传——而且还提供了化石通常无法提供的细节，比如颜色和三维排列。 科学家表示，这种动物的羽毛顶部为栗棕色，底部为浅色或胡萝卜色。 这一发现也有助于深入了解鸟类羽毛的进化。 恐龙的羽毛并没有发育良好的主干——这称为“羽轴”，但还是有羽毛的其他特征，比如羽枝和羽小枝，研究人员推断羽轴的进化可能比这些其他特征晚。 羽毛的结构表明它们不是用来飞行的，而是用来调节温度或炫耀的。研究人员认为，尽管这是一只年轻恐龙的尾巴，但样本显示的是成熟的羽衣，而不是幼崽的羽毛。 研究人员认为，尽管这是一只年轻恐龙的尾巴，但样本显示的是成年羽毛，而非雏龙的绒毛。
mt: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers — a theory that has been widely accepted — but also provides details that fossils usually cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. Scientists say the animal's feathers were reddish-brown on top and light or carrot-colored on the bottom. This discovery also helps to deepen our understanding of the evolution of bird feathers. The dinosaur's feathers did not have well-developed shafts — which are called "rachis" — but did have other features of feathers, such as branches and branches, researchers inferred that the evolution of the rachis may be later than these other features. The structure of the feathers indicates that they were not used for flight, but for temperature regulation or display. Researchers believe, although it is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows mature feathers, not the feathers of the chick. Researchers believe, although it is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows mature feathers, not the feathers of the chick.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: 虽然有一种实验性疫苗看似能够降低埃博拉病毒的死亡率，但迄今为止，还没明确证明任何药物适合治疗现有的感染。 一种名为 ZMapp 的“抗体鸡尾酒”（多抗体联合）最初有望在该领域发挥作用，但正式研究表明，它在预防死亡方面的效果有些不尽人意。 在 PALM 实验中，ZMapp 用作参照。也就是科学家将其作为基线，把其他三种治疗方法与之作比较。
mt: While an experimental vaccine appears to reduce the death rate from Ebola, no drug has been proven effective in treating the current outbreak. A cocktail of antibodies called ZMapp was initially thought to be a game-changer, but formal studies showed it had little effect on preventing death. ZMapp was used as a baseline in the PALM trial, meaning it was compared to three other treatments.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection. One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection. One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: 周一，斯坦福大学医学院的科学家宣布，他们发明了一种可以将细胞按类型分类的新型诊断工具：一种可打印的微型芯片。这种芯片可以使用标准喷墨打印机制造，每片价格可能在一美分左右。 主要研究人员表示，这可以让低收入国家/地区的患者尽早发现癌症、肺结核、艾滋病和疟疾。在这些国家/地区，乳腺癌等疾病的生存率可能仅为富裕国家的一半。
mt: On Monday, scientists at Stanford University's medical school announced they had invented a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a printable microchip. The chip can be made using a standard inkjet printer, and could cost as little as a penny per piece. The main researchers said this could let patients in low-income countries get early diagnoses of cancer, tuberculosis, AIDS, and malaria. Survival rates for diseases like breast cancer in these countries could be half that of rich countries.
ref: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each. Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.

src: 科学家发现了一种遍布月球表面的地貌，称为瓣状裂谷，这显然是由于月球非常缓慢地收缩造成的。 这些陡坡在月球上随处可见，而且几乎没有受到风化。这表明形成这些陡坡的地质事件是在相对近期发生的。 该理论反驳了月球上不存在任何地质活动的说法。
mt: Scientists have discovered a type of terrain that is widespread on the moon, called graben, which apparently was caused by the moon slowly contracting. These steep slopes are seen all over the moon and have not been eroded much. This indicates that the geologic event that formed these steep slopes happened relatively recently. This theory refutes the claim that there is no geologic activity on the moon.
ref: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.

src: 此后，阿德克雅被控谋杀她的儿子，于爱丁堡治安法庭受审。 她被拘留，等待起诉和审判；但是任何目击者的证据都可能受到负面影响，因为她的形象已被广泛发布。 这在英国的其他地方是常见做法，但苏格兰的司法制度有所不同，法院认为公布照片可能会造成潜在的危害。 邓迪大学（University of Dundee）的 Pamela Ferguson 教授指出：“记者如果公布嫌疑人的照片等信息的话，似乎确实存在危害性。” 起诉的主要负责部门皇家检控署向记者表示，至少在提起公诉之前将不会再发表进一步言论。
mt: Afterwards, Adekoya was charged with murdering her son and appeared at Edinburgh Sheriff Court. She was detained pending further proceedings and any evidence from witnesses may be prejudiced by her image being widely published. This is a common practice in other parts of the UK but the Scottish legal system is different, with the court considering the potential harm of publishing photographs. Pamela Ferguson, professor at the University of Dundee, said: "It seems there is a risk of harm if journalists publish the suspect's photograph and so on." The Crown Office, which is responsible for prosecuting, said it would not be making any further comment until proceedings were brought.
ref: "Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son. She is in custody pending indictment and trial, but any eyewitness evidence may be tainted because her image has been widely published. This is common practice elsewhere in the UK but Scottish justice works differently and courts have viewed publication of photos as potentially prejudicial. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes ""journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."" Crown Office, which is in overall charge of prosecutions, has indicated to journalists that no further comment will be made at least until indictment."

src: 不只是碎冰，极端的天气状况也让救援工作困难重重。 皮特曼认为天气情况要到下周才能改善。 皮特曼（Pittman）认为，这样的积冰的数量和厚度，是猎海豹船在过去 15 年以来遇到的最坏情况。
mt: It's not just the icebergs, extreme weather conditions also make rescue work difficult. Pittman believes the weather will improve by next week. Pittman says this is the worst ice conditions the whaling ships have encountered in the past 15 years.
ref: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts. Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week. The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

src: 不只是碎冰，极端的天气状况也让救援工作困难重重。 皮特曼认为天气情况要到下周才能改善。 皮特曼（Pittman）认为，这样的积冰的数量和厚度，是猎海豹船在过去 15 年以来遇到的最坏情况。

The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

src: 罗伯茨断然拒绝谈论生命从何时开始的问题。这是考虑堕胎伦理时的一个重要问题，他说，评论可能发生的案件细节是不道德的。 然而，他重申了先前的声明，即罗伊诉韦德案（Roe v. Wade）是“美国的既定法律”，并强调最高法院作出一致性裁决的重要性。 他还确认，他赞成默示隐私权，而这默示隐私权是罗伊（Roe）案件的裁决依据。
mt: Roberts flatly refused to discuss when life begins. That is an important consideration in considering the ethics of abortion, he said, commenting on the details of a possible case is unethical. However, he reiterated his previous statement that Roe v. Wade is "settled law" in the United States and emphasized the importance of the Supreme Court making a consistent decision. He also confirmed that he supports implied privacy rights, which were the basis of the Roe decision.
ref: "Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases. He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the ""settled law of the land"", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings. He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon."

src: 正值上午 8 点 46 分，整座城市陷入了寂静，标示了第一架飞机撞上目标的确切时间。 两束光被临时造出，彻夜指向天空。 该地点正在建设五座新摩天大楼，中间有一个交通中心和纪念公园。
mt: 8:46 am was the exact time the first plane hit its target, as the city fell silent. Two beams of light were created to shine through the night. The site is being developed with five new skyscrapers, a transportation center and a memorial park in between.
ref: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target. Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight. Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.

src: 正值上午 8 点 46 分，整座城市陷入了寂静，标示了第一架飞机撞上目标的确切时间。 两束光被临时造出，彻夜指向天空。 该地点正在建设五座新摩天大楼，中间有一个交通中心和纪念公园。
mt: 8:46 am was the exact time the first plane hit its target, as the city fell silent. Two beams of light were created to shine through the night. The site is being developed with five new skyscrapers, a transportation center and a memorial park in between.
ref: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target. Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight. Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.

src: 所有的洞穴入口（这些洞被称为”七姊妹“）直径至少为 100 至 250 米（328 至 820 英尺）。 红外图像显示，昼夜温度的变化表示这些地方很可能是洞穴。 “比周围的表面相比，它们白天更凉，晚上更暖。 “它们的热行为不像地球上的大型洞穴那么稳定，这些大型洞穴通常会保持相当恒定的温度，但它们与地下深穴的情况很相似，”亚利桑那州旗杆镇美国地质调查局 (USGS) 太空地质团队和北亚利桑那大学的格伦·库欣说道。
mt: All the cave entrances (these caves are called "Seven Sisters") are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature changes day and night indicate that these places are likely caves. "Compared to the surface around them, they are cooler during the day and warmer at night. "They behave thermally like large caves on Earth, but they are not as stable as large caves, which usually maintain a fairly constant temperature, but they are similar to deep underground caves," said Glenn Cushing of the USGS Space Geology Team and Northern Arizona University.
ref: "All of the cave entrances, which were named ""The Seven Sisters"", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves. ""They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night. Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground,"" said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona."

src: 据说该男子驾驶一辆装有炸药的三轮车驶进了人群当中。 涉嫌引爆炸弹的男子在爆炸中受伤，随后被拘留。 当局仍然不知道他的名字，只知道他是维吾尔族人。
mt: A man driving a tricycle with explosives drove into a crowd. The man was injured in the explosion and was detained. Authorities still do not know his name, only that he is a Uyghur.
ref: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd. The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast. His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.

src: 在南非勒斯滕堡（Rustenburg）皇家巴福肯体育场举行的英式橄榄球联盟三国赛中，南非队击败了全黑队（新西兰）。 最后结果是一分险胜，比分为 21 比 20，结束了全黑队连胜 15 场的局面。 跳羚队以五连败收官。 全黑队在两周前已经赢得了奖杯，而这场比赛是他们打的最后一场。 该系列赛的最后一场比赛将于下周在约翰内斯堡 (Johannesburg) 的埃利斯公园举行，届时斯普林博克斯 (Springboks) 将迎战澳大利亚队。
mt: In the Tri Nations rugby union match at Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa, the Springboks defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand). The final score was 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' winning streak at 15 games. The Lions finished with five losses. The All Blacks had already won the trophy two weeks ago, and this was their last game of the series. The final match of the series will be held next week in Johannesburg's Ellis Park, where the Springboks will face the Wallabies.
ref: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak. For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak. It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago. The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.

src: 尽管早些时候在空间站任务中丢失了一个陀螺仪，但空间站一直保持着它的姿态，直到太空行走任务结束。 据报告，焦立中（Chiao）和沙里波夫（Sharipov）与调姿推进器的距离是安全的。 俄罗斯地面控制中心启动了飞机，空间站随即恢复正常姿态。
mt: Although an attitude control gyro was lost earlier in the space station mission, the space station maintained its attitude until the EVA was completed. According to reports, Chiao and Sharipov were safe from the thrusters. The Russian ground control center started the engines, and the space station returned to normal attitude.
ref: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters. Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.

ref: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters. Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.

src: 作为发起指控的公司，领先的互联网服务提供商美国在线 (AOL) 的总部位于弗吉尼亚州，因此这起案件在弗吉尼亚州起诉。 这是首次按照 2003 年颁布的法律来定罪，该法律旨在遏制未经请求就向用户邮箱发送大量电子邮件（又称垃圾邮件）的行为。
mt: As the company that filed the complaint, the headquarters of leading internet service provider AOL are in Virginia, so the case was filed in Virginia. This is the first time someone has been convicted under a law enacted in 2003 that was intended to curb the sending of large amounts of unsolicited email to users' inboxes (also known as spam).
ref: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home to the leading internet service provider AOL, the company who instigated the charges. This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.

src: 三个赛季前，28岁的比达尔（Vidal）从塞维利亚队加盟巴萨。 自从转会到加泰罗尼亚的首府球队，维达尔已经为俱乐部踢了 49 场比赛。
mt: 28-year-old Vidal joined Barcelona from Sevilla three seasons ago. Since joining the Catalan capital club, Vidal has played 49 matches for the team.
ref: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla. Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.

src: 今天早些时候，贾克 (Jarque) 在意大利科维尔恰诺 (Coverciano) 进行季前赛训练。在周日与博洛尼亚队 (Bolonia) 对阵之前，他在球队的酒店里下榻。 他当时正在球队的酒店下榻，为星期天迎战博洛尼亚队做准备。
mt: Earlier today, Jarque was training at Coverciano in Italy for the pre-season. He was staying at the team's hotel before the match against Bologna on Sunday.
ref: Jarque was practicing during pre-season training at Coverciano in Italy earlier in the day. He was staying in the team hotel ahead of a match planned for Sunday against Bolonia. He was staying in the team hotel ahead of a match planned for Sunday against Bolonia.

src: 目前还没有发布海啸预警。根据雅加达地质局的说法，由于此次地震没有达到 6.5 级，因此不会发布海啸预警。 尽管那里没有海啸的威胁，当地居民却感到坐立不安，纷纷结束生意及离开家园。
mt: No tsunami warning has been issued. According to the Jakarta Geology Agency, there is no tsunami threat because the earthquake did not reach 6.5 on the Richter scale. Despite the lack of tsunami threat, residents were anxious and left their homes and businesses.
ref: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement. Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.

ref: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement. Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.

src: 他们发现，太阳和其他恒星的运行原理是一样的：星系中所有恒星的活跃度都完全决定于它们的光度和自转。 一颗恒星的罗斯贝数由其光度和旋度共同决定，与等离子体流有关。 罗斯贝数越小，恒星在磁场倒转方面就越不活跃。
mt: They found that the principle of the sun and other stars is the same: the activity of all stars in the galaxy is completely determined by their luminosity and rotation. The Rossby number of a star is determined by its luminosity and rotation, and is related to the ionized flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star is in the reversal of the magnetic field.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else. The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star is in the reversal of the magnetic field.

The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: 在 2010 年联邦大选之前曾对 1,400 名受访者做过调查，受访者中反对澳大利亚成为共和国的人数自 2008 年以来增长了 8%。 看守总理朱莉娅·吉拉德在2010年联邦大选竞选期间称，她认为在女王伊丽莎白二世退位后，澳大利亚应该成为共和国。 34% 的受访者一致表示，希望英国女王伊丽莎白二世成为澳大利亚的最后一任君主。 投票存在两极分化的情况，29% 的受访者认为澳大利亚应该尽快成立共和国，31% 的人则认为澳大利亚永远不应该成立共和国。
mt: 1,400 people were surveyed before the 2010 federal election, and the number of respondents who opposed Australia becoming a republic grew by 8% since 2008. Prime Minister Julia Gillard said during the 2010 federal election campaign that she believed Australia should become a republic after Queen Elizabeth II retired. 34% of respondents were unanimous in saying they hoped Queen Elizabeth II would be Australia's last monarch. Voting was polarized, with 29% of respondents saying Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, and 31% saying Australia should never become a republic.
ref: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008. Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch. At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.

src: 科曼基金会 (Komen Foundation) 发言人莱斯利·昂恩 (Leslie Aun) 表示，该组织采用了一项新规定，不允许向正在接受法律调查的组织提供资助或资金。 科曼的政策让计划生育计划搁浅，因为在等待众议员克里夫·斯特恩斯 (Cliff Stearns) 执行的计划生育计划资金支出和报告调查结果。 作为众议院能源和商业委员会 (House Energy and Commerce Committee) 管理下的监督和调查小组委员会主席，斯特恩斯 (Stearns) 目前正在调查是否有利用税收通过计划生育资助堕胎的行为。
mt: Leslie Aun, a spokeswoman for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new policy that prohibits funding or financial support to organizations under investigation. The Komen Foundation's policy stalled the Planned Parenthood program because it was waiting for the results of the Planned Parenthood funding and reporting expenditure investigation by Congressman Cliff Stearns (Stearns). As chairman of the House Energy and Commerce Committee's Subcommittee on Oversight and Investigations, Stearns is currently investigating whether there was any behavior of using tax dollars to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood.
ref: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation. Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns. Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.

ref: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation. Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns. Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.

src: 中央邦警方追回了被盗的笔记本电脑和手机。 副总警监埃利亚（D K Arya）称：“我们逮捕了 5 名强奸这位瑞士妇女的人，并找到了她的手机和笔记本电脑。” 被告的姓名分别是 Baba Kanjar、Bhutha Kanjar、Rampro Kanjar、Gaza Kanjar 和 Vishnu Kanjar。 警察局长钱德拉·谢卡尔·索兰基说，被告人出庭时都蒙住了脸。
mt: 5 men were arrested and the laptop and phone were recovered by the Central Reserve Police Force. Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, "We have arrested five people who raped this Swiss woman and found her phone and laptop." The names of the accused are Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Police Chief Chandrakant Shikar Sorkar said the accused were all wearing masks when they appeared in court.
ref: "The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone. Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, ""We have arrested five persons who raped the Swiss woman and recovered her mobile and laptop"". The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces."

src: 早先于全球发布的华硕 Eee PC 个人笔记本，因成本节约及功能性因素，成为 2007 年台北 IT 资讯月备受瞩目的话题。 但在华硕获得台湾行政院颁发的 2007 年台湾永续发展奖后，笔记本电脑的消费市场将发生根本性的变化。
mt: 2007 Taipei IT Month, the Asus Eee PC personal notebook, due to cost savings and functional factors, has become the focus of attention. But after the Asus received the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Development Award, the notebook computer market will undergo fundamental changes.
ref: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month. But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.

src: 该问题从 1 月 1 日开始，当时数十名当地居民开始向奥巴那泽邮局 (Obanazawa Post Office) 投诉，称他们没有收到传统和定期寄送的新年贺卡。 昨天，在发现男孩隐藏了 600 多份邮政文件后，邮局向市民和媒体道歉，藏起来的文件包括了 429 张未送到收件人手中的新年明信片。
mt: The problem began on January 1, when dozens of local residents began complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they had not received their traditional and regular New Year's greeting cards. Yesterday, after finding that a boy had hidden over 600 postal files, the post office apologized to the public and the media, the hidden files including 429 undelivered New Year's postcards.
ref: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards. Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.

src: 双方都保住了各自的每个发球局，之后穆雷在抢七局中输掉了第一盘。 德尔·波特罗（Del Potro）在第二盘刚开局时就占上风，但在比分达到 6-6 后就得进行抢七大战。 此时波特罗接受了肩膀治疗，但仍坚持继续比赛。
mt: Both players saved their respective service games, and then Murray lost the first set tiebreak. Del Potro was up 6-1 in the second set, but then had to fight back from 6-6 to win the tiebreak. Del Potro then received treatment on his shoulder, but still continued the match.
ref: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set. Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6. Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.

src: 在这些官员的陪同下，他向德克萨斯州的公民保证，政府正在采取措施来保护公众的安全。 佩里特别指出：“世界上几乎没有其他设备更齐全的地方，能更好地应对这种情况下带来的挑战。” 州长还表示：“今天，我们得知一些学龄儿童已被确认曾与该患者有过接触。” 他又称：“这个病例很严重。但我们的医疗系统运作良好，请大家放心。”
mt: In the company of these officials, he assured the citizens of Texas that the government is taking measures to protect the public's safety. Perry specifically pointed out, "There is no other place in the world that is better equipped to deal with the challenges that come with this situation." The governor also said, "Today, we have learned that some school-age children have been confirmed to have had contact with the patient." He also said, "This case is serious. But our health system is working well, please rest assured."
ref: "Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety. Perry specifically said, ""There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."" The governor also stated, ""Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."" He went on to say, ""This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."""

src: 早在《每日秀》（The Daily Show）和《科尔伯特报告》（Colbert Report）之前，赫克（Heck）和约翰逊（Johnson）在 1988 年还在华盛顿大学求学时期，就曾构想过一份出版物，以嘲讽的形式戏说新闻（包括新闻报道）。 自创办以来，《洋葱报》已经成为一个名副其实的讽刺戏仿类新闻帝国，旗下拥有印刷刊物、网站（10 月份吸引了 500 万独立访问者）、个人广告、24 小时新闻网络、播客，以及近期推出的名为《我们的愚蠢世界》的世界地图集。 艾伯特·戈尔和汤米·弗兰克斯将军漫不经心地吐露出他们最喜欢的头条（当时洋葱网曾报道说，戈尔在2000年竞选失利后，与其妻子蒂珀享受了一生中最美好的性爱时光）。 其中的许多作者后来对乔恩·斯图尔特 (Jon Stewart) 和史蒂芬·科尔伯特 (Stephen Colbert) 的新闻恶搞节目产生了巨大影响。
mt: 1988, Heck and Johnson were students at the University of Washington, they had already conceived of a publication that would satirize the news in a humorous way. Since its founding, The Onion has become a true empire of satirical news, with print publications, websites (which attracted 5 million unique visitors in October), personal ads, 24-hour news network, podcasts, and a recently released world atlas called Our Dumb World. Albert Gore and General Tommy Franks carelessly let slip their favorite headlines (The Onion had reported that Gore enjoyed the best sex of his life with his wife Tipper after his 2000 election loss). Many of its authors have gone on to have a huge influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news satire shows.
ref: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988. Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat). Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.

src: 抗议活动于当地时间 11:00 (UTC+1) 左右在白厅 (Whitehall) 开始，白厅对面是首相官邸唐宁街的入口处，由警察看守。 11 点刚过，抗议者便堵住了白厅北行车道的交通。 11 点 20 分，警察要求抗议者退回到人行道，并告知抗议者，在行使抗议权利时，务必考虑到越来越拥堵的公共交通问题。 11 点 29 分左右，抗议人群向前行进至白厅，经过特拉法尔加广场、斯特兰德大街、奥德维奇、京士威，向霍尔本行进，保守党正在当地的 Grand Connaught Rooms 酒店举行春季论坛。
mt: 11:00 am local time (UTC+1) protests began on Whitehall, which is opposite the entrance to Downing Street, the prime minister's residence, which is guarded by police. At 11:01, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound Whitehall. At 11:20, police asked protesters to move back onto the pavement and informed them that they should consider the increasingly congested public transport when exercising their right to protest. At 11:29, protesters advanced forward onto Whitehall, through Trafalgar Square, Strand, Aldwych, King Street, and onto Holborn, where the Conservative Party was holding its spring forum at the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.
ref: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence. Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall. At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up. Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.

src: 他补充道：“我们现在有 4 个月大没有糖尿病的老鼠，但它们曾经得过该病。” 埃胡德·乌尔博士（新斯科舍省哈利法克斯市达尔豪西大学医学教授，加拿大糖尿病协会临床与科学部门教授）提醒，这项研究仍处在早期阶段。 和其他一些专家一样，他对糖尿病能否治愈持怀疑态度。他指出，这些发现与已患有 1 型糖尿病的人无关。
mt: "We now have 4-month-old mice without diabetes, but they have had the disease," said Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and professor of clinical and scientific affairs at the Canadian Diabetes Association. He cautioned that the research is still in its early stages. Like other experts, he is skeptical that diabetes can be cured. He said the findings are unrelated to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.
ref: """We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic,"" he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days. Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes."

src: 作为巴布亚新几内亚航空公司的 CG4684 次航班，该“双水獭”飞机昨天曾试图降落在科科达机场，但已经失败过一次。 在原计划第二次接近进行着陆前约十分钟，它消失了。 今天，坠机地点已经确定。由于交通不便，两名警察通过直升飞机吊索进入丛林，徒步前往现场搜救幸存者。 导致飞机着陆失败的恶劣天气，也使搜索工作受到了阻碍。
mt: As flight CG4684 of Air Niugini, the "Dornier" aircraft had attempted to land at Kokoda airport yesterday, but had failed once already. It disappeared about ten minutes before the second attempt to approach for landing. Today, the crash site has been identified. Due to poor road conditions, two police officers entered the jungle by helicopter hoist, and walked to the site to search for survivors. The bad weather that caused the aircraft to fail landing also hindered the search.
ref: The Twin Otter had been trying to land at Kokoda yesterday as Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, but had aborted once already. About ten minutes before it was due to land from its second approach it disapeared. The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors. The search had been hampered by the same bad weather that had caused the aborted landing.

src: “幸运的是我没有发生什么事，但我看到了可怕的一幕，人们试着打破窗户逃出去。 人们用椅子敲打玻璃，但窗户却坚不可摧。 幸存者弗朗齐歇克·科瓦尔说：“终于有一块玻璃碎了，他们开始从窗户逃出去。”
mt: "Fortunately, I didn't get hurt, but I saw a terrible sight, people trying to break windows to escape. People were hitting the glass with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable. Survivor Frantisek Kovar said: "Finally, a piece of glass broke, and they started to escape through the windows."
ref: """Luckily nothing happened to me, but I saw a macabre scene, as people tried to break windows in order to get out. People were hitting the panes with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable. One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window,"" said survivor Franciszek Kowal."

src: 热带风暴“丹妮尔”在大西洋东部形成，它是 2010 年大西洋飓风季第四个获得命名的风暴。 这场风暴距离佛罗里达州迈阿密约 3000 英里，最大持续风速为每小时 40 英里（64 公里每小时）。 美国国家飓风中心的科学家预测，丹妮尔在星期三前将增强为一场大飓风。 鉴于风暴远未登陆，目前仍难以评估它对美国或加勒比地区的潜在影响。
mt: Tropical Storm Danielle formed in the eastern Atlantic, the fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season. It was about 3,000 miles east of Miami, Florida, and had maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predicted Danielle would strengthen into a hurricane by Wednesday. It was too early to assess its potential impact on the U.S. or the Caribbean, since it was far from land.
ref: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday. As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.

src: 李博士还对感染了 H5N1 禽流感病毒的土耳其儿童尚未发病的报道表示关切。 他特别提到一些研究表明，在引发全球性疫情之前，这种疾病必须先降低自身的致命性。 令人担心的是，如果流感症状不明显，患者可能会在日常生活中继续传染更多的人。
mt: Dr. Lee also expressed concern over reports of Turkish children infected with the H5N1 avian flu virus who have yet to show symptoms. He specifically noted some research that suggests the disease must first lower its lethality before causing a global pandemic. Worrisome is that if flu symptoms are not apparent, patients may continue to infect more people in their daily lives.
ref: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill. Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted. There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.

src: 截至 8 月 9 日晚，台风莫拉克的台风眼距离中国福建省约 70 公里。 预计台风正以每小时十一公里的速度靠近中国。
mt: As of 8 August 2018, the eye of Typhoon Maria was about 70 km from the Chinese province of Fujian. It was expected to approach China at a speed of 11 km/h.
ref: As of the night of August 9, the eye of Morakot was about seventy kilometres away from the Chinese province of Fujian. The typhoon is estimated to be moving toward China at eleven kph.

src: 美国总统乔治·沃克·布什于 11 月 16 日上午抵达新加坡，开始为期一周的亚洲之行。 他受到了新加坡副总理黄根成的欢迎，并与新加坡总理李显龙探讨了贸易和恐怖主义问题。 在经过一周的中期选举失利后，布什向听众讲述了亚洲贸易扩张的形势。
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore on the morning of November 16 for a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong and discussed trade and terrorism with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of midterm elections losses, Bush told his audience the state of Asian trade expansion.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: 今天的公告也延续了政府在今年 3 月作出的承诺：为额外车厢提供资金援助。 新增 300 节车厢，使总车厢数达到 1300 节，以此缓解过度拥挤的情况。
mt: Today's announcement also follows through on the government's promise made in March to provide funding for additional carriages.  The addition of 300 carriages brings the total to 1,300, easing overcrowding.
ref: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages. An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.

mt: Today's announcement also follows through on the government's promise made in March to provide funding for additional carriages.  The addition of 300 carriages brings the total to 1,300, easing overcrowding.
ref: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages. An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.

src: 她说：“没有情报表明近期会有袭击发生。 “然而，把威胁等级降到严重级别并不意味着整体威胁已经消失。”
mt: "There is no intelligence to suggest an attack is imminent. However, downgrading the threat level does not mean the overall threat has gone away."
ref: "She said, ""There is no intelligence to suggest that an attack is expected imminently. However, the reduction of the threat level to severe does not mean the overall threat has gone away."""

src: 昨天，马尔泰利在由 9 名成员组成的新临时选举委员会 (CEP)中宣誓就职。 这是马特利 (Martelly) 四年来第五次入选海地临时选举委员会 (CEP)。 上个月，总统委员会建议前任 CEP 辞职，这是推动国家走向新选举措施的一部分。 该委员会是马尔泰利 (Martelly) 对始于 10 月份的大规模反政府抗议活动做出的回应。 自 2011 年以来，由于一些选举未能如期举行而引发了这些抗议活动，有时抗议还会升级为暴力事件。
mt: Yesterday, Martelly was sworn in to a new temporary election commission (CEP) of nine members. This is Martelly's fifth term on the CEP in four years. Last month, the president's commission recommended the resignation of the former CEP, which was part of a move to bring the country to new elections. The commission was a response to the large-scale anti-government protests that began in October 2011, which were sometimes violent and were sparked by some elections not being held on time.
ref: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday. It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections. The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October. The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.

src: 美国体操协会对美国奥委会的信函表示支持，并接受奥运会大家庭的严格要求，即为所有运动员营造一个安全的训练环境。 我们同意美国奥委会的声明，与其吊销执照，不如在我们组织内部继续推进有意义的变革，可能更有利于维护运动员和俱乐部的利益及其运动。 根据美国体操协会支持的一项独立调查，我们也许能够得知，幸存者勇敢曝光的、拉里·纳萨尔的大规模性侵行为，为什么在这么长时间内都没有被发现。此外，协会还表示会做出必要和适当的整改。 美国体操协会和美国奥委会有一个共同的目标，那就是尽可能保证体操运动和其他运动的安全性，让运动员在安全、积极和充满支持的环境中追求他们的梦想。
mt: The USA Gymnastics letter to the USOC states support for the strict requirements of the Olympic family to create a safe training environment for all athletes. We agree with the USOC statement that revoking our membership is preferable to continuing meaningful reform within our organization that may be more beneficial to the interests of our athletes and clubs. According to an independent investigation supported by USA Gymnastics, we may be able to learn why Larry Nassar's widespread sexual abuse was not discovered for so long. USA Gymnastics also stated that it will make necessary and appropriate reforms. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have a common goal of ensuring the safety of gymnastics and other sports, allowing athletes to pursue their dreams in a safe, positive and supportive environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes. We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: 美国海军还表示，他们正在调查这起事件。 他们还在一份声明中表示，“船员目前正在确定安全撤离军舰的最佳方法”。 这是一艘复仇者级别的反水雷舰，正在前往巴拉望的普林塞萨港的途中。 它属于美国海军第七舰队，部署在日本长崎佐世保。
mt: The U.S. Navy is also investigating the incident. They also said in a statement that "crew members are currently determining the best method to safely evacuate the ship." It is a Arleigh Burke-class guided-missile destroyer, en route to the Philippines' Subic Bay. It is part of the U.S. Navy's Seventh Fleet, based in Japan's Nagasaki, Sasebo.
ref: "The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident. They also said in a statement, ""The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship"". An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan."

src: 周日晚些时候，美国总统唐纳德·特朗普通过新闻秘书发表声明，宣布美军将撤离叙利亚。 特朗普与土耳其总统雷杰普·塔伊普·埃尔多安（Recep Tayyip Erdoğan）通话后发表了声明。 该声明称，土耳其还将接管对被捕的伊斯兰国武装分子的看守任务；欧洲国家拒绝将他们遣送回国。
mt: On Sunday evening, U.S. President Donald Trump issued a statement through his press secretary announcing that U.S. troops would be withdrawn from Syria. The statement was issued after Trump spoke with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. The statement said that Turkey would also take over the guard duty of captured Islamic State militants; European countries refused to repatriate them.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria. The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: 周日晚些时候，美国总统唐纳德·特朗普通过新闻秘书发表声明，宣布美军将撤离叙利亚。 特朗普与土耳其总统雷杰普·塔伊普·埃尔多安（Recep Tayyip Erdoğan）通话后发表了声明。 该声明称，土耳其还将接管对被捕的伊斯兰国武装分子的看守任务；欧洲国家拒绝将他们遣送回国。
mt: On Sunday evening, U.S. President Donald Trump issued a statement through his press secretary announcing that U.S. troops would be withdrawn from Syria. The statement was issued after Trump spoke with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. The statement said that Turkey would also take over the guard duty of captured Islamic State militants; European countries refused to repatriate them.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria. The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: 联军和阿富汗部队进入该地区保护阵地，其他联军飞机也被派往支援。 坠机发生在高海拔山区，据称是敌方火力所致。 寻找坠机地点的任务遭遇了恶劣的天气和地形。
mt: Allied and Afghan forces entered the area to secure the site, and other allied aircraft were dispatched to assist. The crash occurred in a high-altitude mountainous area, and it was reported to be due to enemy fire. The search for the crash site was hampered by bad weather and terrain.
ref: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist. The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire. Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.
