src: 世界上有超过 5,000 种不同的语言，其中有 20 多种语言的使用者超过了 5,000 万人。 而且，书面文字往往比口头文字更容易理解。在描述地址时尤为如此，因为通常很难发清楚读音。 在许多国家/地区，全国的人都能说一口流利的英语，而在更多的国家/地区，人们对英语也略知一二，尤其是年轻人。 如果你愿意，请想象一个曼彻斯特人、一个波士顿人、一个牙买加人和一个悉尼人围坐在多伦多的一家餐馆里吃饭。 他们用各自独特的口音和当地的土语讲述家乡的故事，逗彼此开心。
mt: There are more than 5,000 different languages in the world, with more than 500 million speakers of each of 20 of them. And written language is often easier to understand than spoken language, especially when giving directions, as it is often difficult to pronounce words clearly. In many countries, everyone speaks English fluently, and in more countries, people have at least a little knowledge of English, especially the younger generation. Imagine a man from Manchester, Boston, Jamaica, and Sydney sitting around a restaurant in Toronto, eating dinner and telling stories about their hometowns in their own accents and local dialects, making each other laugh.
ref: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly. Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.

src: 全天都有公交车从城区间公交站（跨河）发车，但大部分车次，特别是开往东部和贾卡尔/布姆唐的公交车都在 06:30 至 07:30 之间发车。 鉴于区间巴士经常客满，建议提前几天购票。 大多数地区都能坐到舒适结实的日本 Coaster 小巴车。 要前往附近地方，如帕罗 (Nu 150) 和普那卡 (Nu 200)，共享出租车是一种快捷舒适的方式。
mt: All buses from the city center to the intercity bus station (across the river) depart throughout the day, but most of the buses, especially those going to the east and Jakkal/Bumthang, depart between 06:30 and 07:30. Since the intercity buses are often full, it is advisable to buy tickets in advance. Most areas can be reached by comfortable and sturdy Japanese Coaster buses. A shared taxi is a quick and comfortable way to get to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).
ref: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30. As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance. Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy. Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).

src: 又因为相对偏僻，“廷巴克图”被用来比喻遥远的异国他乡。 今天，虽然廷巴克图的名声使之成为旅游胜地，而且有一个机场，但这是一个贫穷的城镇。 1990 年，由于沙漠的威胁，它被列入了濒危世界遗产名录。 这是亨利·路易斯·盖茨 (Henry Louis Gates) 在美国公共广播公司的《非洲世界的奇迹》特别节目中的重要一站。 这座城市与该国其他城市形成了鲜明对比，因为它更多的是阿拉伯风格，而不是非洲风格。
mt: Because of its relative remoteness, Timbuktu has come to be used as a metaphor for a distant, exotic place. Today, despite its fame, Timbuktu is a poor town with an airport, and was listed as a World Heritage Site in danger in 1990 because of the threat of the desert. It was an important stop on the PBS special, "The Miracle of Africa," with Henry Louis Gates. The city stands in contrast to other cities in the country, as it is more Arab in style than African.
ref: "Combined with its relative inaccessibility, ""Timbuktu"" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands. Today, Timbuktu is an impoverished town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of world heritage sites in danger, due to the threat of desert sands. It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World. The city is in stark contrast to the rest of the country's cities, because it has more of an Arabic flair than of an African."

The city is in stark contrast to the rest of the country's cities, because it has more of an Arabic flair than of an African."

src: 残奥会将于 2021 年 8 月 24 日至 9 月 5 日举行。部分赛事将在日本其他地方举办。 东京将成为唯一举办过两届夏季奥运会的亚洲城市，第一次是在1964 年。 如果你在宣布推迟之前预订了 2020 年的航班和住宿，则可能会面临棘手的情况。 取消政策各不相同，但截至三月末，大多数由于新冠病毒而出台的取消政策并没有延长到 2020 年 7 月——原定奥运会举办时间。 预计大部分赛事的门票价格将在 2,500 日元到 13 万日元之间，一般票价约为 7,000 日元。
mt: 2020 Summer Olympics will be held from August 24 to September 5, 2021. Some events will be held in other parts of Japan. Tokyo will be the first Asian city to host two Summer Olympics, the first in 1964. If you booked flights and accommodations before the announcement of the postponement, you may be in a tricky situation. Cancellation policies vary, but as of March 31, most cancellation policies that were put in place due to the coronavirus did not extend to July 2020 — the original Olympics opening date. Ticket prices are expected to range from 2,500 yen to 1.3 million yen, with general admission tickets costing around 7,000 yen.
ref: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964. If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation. Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled. It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.

src: 龙卷风是一股气压极低的旋转气流柱，它能将周围的空气向内、向上吸入。 龙卷风会产生强风（常常每小时 100-200 英里），能把重物抛到空中，并裹挟着它们向前移动。 刚开始时，漏斗状云从雷暴云中向下伸展，当它们接触地面时就变成了“龙卷风”。
mt: A tornado is a rotating column of air that sucks in the surrounding air. Tornadoes can produce strong winds (often 100-200 mph), can throw heavy objects into the air, and can carry them forward. At first, funnel-shaped clouds extend downward from thunderclouds, and when they touch the ground, they become "tornadoes".
ref: "A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward. They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves. They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become ""tornadoes"" when they touch the ground."

They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves. They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become ""tornadoes"" when they touch the ground."

src: 如果你要访问的国家受到旅行警告的约束，你的旅行健康保险或旅行取消保险可能会受到影响。 你也可以咨询除贵国以外其他政府的建议，但他们的建议是为他们的公民而制定的。 例如，中东地区的美国公民可能面临与欧洲人或阿拉伯人的不同境遇。 旅游警示只能就当地局势提供简略摘要。 与其他地方提供的更详细的信息相比，这里所提供的建议往往较为粗略、笼统且过于简单。
mt: If you are visiting a country under a travel warning, your travel health insurance or travel cancellation insurance may be affected. You can also consult the advice of other governments, but their advice is for their citizens. For example, American citizens in the Middle East may face different situations than Europeans or Arabs. Travel warnings can only provide a brief summary of local conditions. Compared to the more detailed information provided elsewhere, the advice here is often crude, general and too simple.
ref: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens. As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs. Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country. The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.

src: 旅行社自 19 世纪一直存在至今。如果在一段旅程中，旅行者不熟悉目的地的自然、文化和语言，或者计划去低收入国家旅行，那么旅行社一般会是很好的选择。 虽然大多数旅行社都愿意接受大部分的常规预约，但也有很多旅行社专门从事特定类型、特定预算范围或特定目的地的旅行业务。 最好找一个常常预订与你的旅程类似的代理。 看看旅行社推广什么旅游产品，可以在网站上或商店橱窗里查看。
mt: Travel agencies have existed since the 19th century and are still around today. If travelers are unfamiliar with the natural, cultural, and language of their destination, or if they plan to travel to a low-income country, a travel agency is usually a good choice. Although most travel agencies are willing to accept most routine bookings, there are also many travel agencies specializing in specific types, specific budget ranges or specific destination travel businesses. It is best to find an agent who often books similar trips to yours. Check what travel products the travel agency promotes, you can view it on the website or in the store window.
ref: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries. Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations. It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours. Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.

src: 出发前和旅途中，你必须考虑到很多方面。 当你旅行时，请不要期待一切就像“在家里”一样。 礼节、法律、饮食、交通、住宿、标准和语言等等都会与你居住的地方有所不同。 这是你需要永远记在心上的一点，这样才能避免失望或者甚至对当地的做法表示厌恶。
mt: Before and during your trip, you must consider many things. When you travel, do not expect everything to be like "at home." Customs, laws, food, transportation, accommodation, standards and language, etc. will be different from where you live. This is a point you need to remember forever, so as to avoid disappointment or even disgust with local practices.
ref: "There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere. When you travel, expect things not to be like they are ""back home"". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live. This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things."

This is a point you need to remember forever, so as to avoid disappointment or even disgust with local practices.
ref: "There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere. When you travel, expect things not to be like they are ""back home"". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live. This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things."

src: 如果你第一次去发展中国家旅行，或者去一个陌生的地方旅行，千万不要低估可能出现的文化冲击。 许多情绪稳定、能力较强的旅客都曾被在发展中国家旅行的新问题所吓倒，在那里，需要迅速适应接踵而至的许多细微文化差异。 尤其是在刚开始的日子里，您可以考虑在西式和高质量的酒店、食物和服务上多花些钱，来帮助您适应环境。 在不了解当地动物群的地区，切勿睡在地上的床垫或垫子上。 如果要去野营，请带上露营床或吊床，以免蛇和蝎子之类的危害。
mt: If you're traveling to a developing country for the first time, or to a place you're unfamiliar with, don't underestimate the potential for culture shock. Many stable and capable travelers have been overwhelmed by the many subtle cultural differences they encounter in developing countries, where you need to quickly adapt to a constant stream of new issues. Especially in the first few days, you may want to spend a little extra on Western-style and high-quality hotels, food, and service to help you adjust to the environment. In areas where you're unfamiliar with the local wildlife, don't sleep on the ground with a mattress or pad. If you're camping, bring a camping bed or hammock to avoid snakes and scorpions.
ref: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock. Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly. Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize. Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna. If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.

src: 把你的保险单和保险公司的详细联系方式复印几份并随身携带。 为了咨询、授权和索赔，他们需要出示保险公司的邮箱地址和国际电话号码。 备好一份复印件放在行李中，并在网上另存一份副本（通过电子邮件给自己发送附件，或者存储在“云端”）。 如果旅行时随身携带笔记本电脑或平板电脑，在内存或磁盘中存储一份副本（无需网络也可访问）。 同时将保险合同/联系方式的副本交予旅伴以及归乡后愿意帮忙的亲友手中。
mt: 1. Make copies of your insurance policy and contact details for your insurance company. They will need to show the email address and international phone number of the insurance company. Make a copy of the policy and keep it in your luggage, and store a copy online (send yourself an attachment by email, or store it in the "cloud"). If you are traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in the memory or disk (no network required to access it). Give a copy of the insurance policy/contact details to your travel companion and to friends and family who will help you when you return home.
ref: "Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you. They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims. Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the ""cloud""). If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet). Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help."

src: 多年来，人们使用过很多不同的胶片格式。标准 35mm 胶片（36x24mm 底片）是最常见的。 如果用完了胶片，通常可以很轻易地补货，所呈现的分辨率大致与当前的数码单反相机无差。 一些中画幅胶片相机使用 6x6cm 的画幅，更准确地说，是 56x56mm 的底片。 这样一来，分辨率几乎达到了 35 mm 底片（3136 mm2 对 864）的四倍。
mt: 35mm film has been the most common format for many years. If you run out of film, it's easy to get more, and the resolution is about the same as current digital SLRs. Some medium format cameras use 6x6cm film, which is actually 56x56mm. This gives a resolution of about four times that of 35mm film (3136 mm2 vs. 864).
ref: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest. It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR. Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative. This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).

src: 开始旅行写作最简单的方法就是在一个资深旅行博客网站上磨练你的技能。 熟悉网上排版和编辑后，你便可创建自己的网站。
mt: The easiest way to start travel writing is to hone your skills on a well-established travel blog site. Once you're familiar with online layout and editing, you can create your own site.
ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

src: 开始旅行写作最简单的方法就是在一个资深旅行博客网站上磨练你的技能。 熟悉网上排版和编辑后，你便可创建自己的网站。
mt: The easiest way to start travel writing is to hone your skills on a well-established travel blog site. Once you're familiar with online layout and editing, you can create your own site.
ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

src: 在家时，由于会经常接触当地病菌，你极易对其产生免疫力。 但在从来没有过细菌群的世界其他地方，你遇到问题的可能性要大得多。 而且，在温暖的气候下细菌既可以快速繁殖，又可以在体外存活更久。 于是“德里腹泻”、”法老的诅咒”和“蒙特祖玛的复仇”之类的灾祸就出现了。 正如寒冷气候易发呼吸道问题，炎热气候也极易引发肠道问题。在绝大多数情况下，肠道问题会令人显著不适，但并非十分危险。
mt: When at home, you are constantly exposed to local bacteria, and you are likely to develop immunity to them. But in places where you have never encountered bacteria before, you are more likely to have problems. And in warm climates, bacteria can reproduce quickly and survive longer outside the body. So "Delhi belly," "the curse of the pharaohs," and "Montezuma's revenge" are born. Just as cold climates are prone to respiratory problems, warm climates are prone to gastrointestinal problems. In most cases, gastrointestinal problems will make you uncomfortable, but not very dangerous.
ref: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them. But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems. Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body. Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends. As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.

ref: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them. But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems. Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body. Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends. As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.

src: 欧洲是片面积相对较小但有着许多独立国家的大陆。在通常情况下，穿越多个国家旅行意味着必须多次经历签证申请和护照检查。 然而在这方面，申根区有点像一个国家。 只要你在此区域居留，通常可以直接通过边境，无需再次接受护照检查点的检查。 同理，有了申根签证，你就不必分别向每个申根成员国申请签证，从而节省了时间、金钱和手续。
mt: Europe is a continent with many independent countries, but relatively small in area. In most cases, traveling through multiple countries means going through multiple visa applications and passport checks. However, in this regard, the Schengen area is a bit like a country. As long as you are staying in this area, you can usually pass through the border without further passport checks. Similarly, with a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for a visa separately to each Schengen member state, thus saving time, money and paperwork.
ref: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times. The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect. As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again. Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.

src: 图坦卡蒙墓 (KV62)。 KV62 可能是山谷中最著名的墓葬。霍华德·卡特在 1922 年发现了这位年轻国王近乎完整的皇家墓葬。 但与大多数其他皇家陵墓相比，图坦卡蒙陵墓几乎不值得参观，因为它的规模要小得多，装饰也平淡无奇。 如果有人想着去看这具木乃伊从棺材中移出来时受到损坏，那么这些人可要大失所望了，因为大家只能看到木乃伊的头部和肩膀。 古墓里的巨额财富已不在墓中，而是转移到了开罗的埃及博物馆。 时间有限的游客最好选择其他去处。
mt: The tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 is probably the most famous tomb in the valley. Howard Carter discovered the near-intact royal tomb of this young king in 1922. But compared to most other royal tombs, the tomb of Tutankhamun is almost not worth visiting because it is much smaller and unadorned. If anyone is thinking of going to see the mummy removed from its coffin when it was damaged, they will be disappointed because you can only see the head and shoulders of the mummy. The vast wealth of the tomb is no longer in the tomb but has been transferred to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Tourists with limited time should choose other places.
ref: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, the scene of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact royal burial of the young king. Compared to most of the other royal tombs, however, the tomb of Tutankhamun is barely worth visiting, being much smaller and with limited decoration. Anyone interested in seeing evidence of the damage to the mummy done during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders are visible. The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer in it, but have been removed to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time would be best to spend their time elsewhere.

src: 宝云岛是适合一日游或周末游的人气目的地，当地提供皮划艇、徒步旅行、商店、餐馆等旅游项目和服务。 这个真正意义上的社区位于温哥华附近的豪湾，乘坐从温哥华市中心格兰维尔岛出发的定期水上出租车，就能轻松抵达。 对那些喜欢户外活动的人来说，必然会徒步登上 Sea to Sky。 因举办了 2010 年冬奥会，惠斯勒（距温哥华 1.5 小时车程）价格高昂，但却闻名遐迩。 在冬季，享受北美一些最好的滑雪场地；在夏季，尝试一些真正的山地自行车骑行。
mt: The island is a popular day-trip or weekend destination, offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants and other tourism projects and services. The real community is located near Vancouver in Howe Sound, and can be easily reached by regular water taxi from Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who like outdoor activities, Sea to Sky is a must. Whistler (a 1.5-hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but famous for hosting the 2010 Winter Olympics. In winter, enjoy some of North America's best ski slopes; in summer, try some real mountain biking.
ref: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential. Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.

src: 维多利亚瀑布镇是津巴布韦西部的一个小镇，与赞比亚的利文斯通接壤，靠近博茨瓦纳。 该镇紧邻瀑布，瀑布是主要的景点，但这个热门的旅游目的地为探险者和观光者提供了可以久住的大量机会。 在雨季（11 月至 3 月），水量会更高，瀑布也更加湍急。 如果你过桥或沿着瀑布附近蜿蜒的小径走，肯定会被弄湿。 另一方面，恰恰因为水量太大，视线会被水挡住，看不到完整的瀑布！
mt: Victoria Falls is a small town in western Zimbabwe, bordering Zambia and near Botswana. The town is near the falls, which are the main attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers a lot of opportunities for adventurers and sightseers to stay for a while. In the rainy season (November to March), the water will be higher and the falls more turbulent. If you cross the bridge or walk along the small paths near the falls, you will get wet. On the other hand, just because the water is so much, the view is blocked by the water, you can not see the whole waterfall!
ref: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana. The town lies immediately next to the falls, and they are the major attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers both adventure seekers and sightseers plenty of opportunities for a longer stay. In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic. You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls. On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your viewing of the actual Falls will be obscured—by all the water!

src: 有关常规摄影的规则也适用于录像，甚至可能更适用。 如果连拍照都不允许的话，就更不用想拍摄视频了。 如果使用无人机，请提前仔细确认可以拍摄的内容，以及需要哪些许可或额外的牌照。 在机场附近或人群拥挤的地方操控无人机升空，是个馊主意，即使这在你所在地区并不违法。
mt: The rules for regular photography also apply to video, and may even be more applicable. If you are not allowed to take pictures, you certainly are not allowed to film. If you are using a drone, make sure to carefully confirm what you can film, and what permits or additional licenses you need. Flying a drone near an airport or in a crowded area is a bad idea, even if it is not illegal in your area.
ref: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so. If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it. If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.

src: 注册是签证流程的附加要求。在一些国家，你必须向当地政府登记你的存在和住址。 这可能需要去当地警察局填写表格或去一趟移民办公室。 在很多有这样法律的国家，当地的旅馆可以办理登记注册手续（一定要问清楚）。 在其他情况下，只有住在旅游住宿设施以外的人需要登记。不过这样一来，法律模糊了很多，所以要事先了解。
mt: Registration is an additional requirement of the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address with local authorities. This may require filling out a form at the local police station or a trip to the immigration office. In many countries where this is a legal requirement, local hotels can handle the registration process (ask first). In other cases, only people staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register. However, this leaves a lot of gray area, so check first.
ref: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities. This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices. In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask). In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.

In other cases, only people staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register. However, this leaves a lot of gray area, so check first.

src: 在旅行中进行志愿服务是一种与众不同的好方法，但这不仅仅在于付出。 在国外生活和做志愿者，是了解不同文化、结识新朋友、了解自我、锻炼正确判断的能力、甚至是获得新技能的好方法。 这也是一个节省预算的好方法，可以在某处待更长时间，因为很多志愿者工作提供食宿，有些工作还有少量工资。
mt: Volunteering abroad is a great way to give back, but it's not just about giving. Living and volunteering abroad is a great way to learn about different cultures, meet new friends, learn about yourself, practice your judgment skills, and even learn new skills. It's also a great way to save money, as you can stay in one place for longer, as many volunteer work provides food and lodging, and some work even has a small salary.
ref: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving. Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills. It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.

src: 对许多美国家庭来说，去迪斯尼乐园游玩是一场盛大的活动。 这一“典型”的游玩过程包括飞往奥兰多国际机场，乘车前往迪士尼园区酒店，在迪士尼游玩大约一周的时间，然后回家。 迪士尼的玩法有无数种，但对大多数人来说，“去迪士尼乐园”就是这个意思。 许多在 eBay 或 Craigslist 等拍卖网站上出售的门票都是部分使用过的多日通票。 虽然这是一种很常见的行为，但迪士尼却禁止这样做：门票是不可转让的。
mt: For many American families, a trip to Disney World is a big event. This "typical" play process includes flying to Orlando International Airport, taking a car to the Disney resort hotel, playing in Disney for about a week, and then going home. There are countless ways to play Disney, but for most people, "going to Disney World" means this. Many tickets sold on eBay or Craigslist are used multi-day tickets. Although this is a very common behavior, Disney prohibits this: tickets are not transferable.
ref: "Traveling to Walt Disney World represents a major pilgrimage for many American families. The ""typical"" visit involves flying into Orlando International Airport, busing to an on-site Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving Disney property, and returning home. There are infinite variations possible, but this remains what most people mean when they talk of ""going to Disney World"". Many tickets sold online through auction websites such as eBay or Craigslist are partially used multi-day park-hopper tickets. While this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable."

src: 任何计划前往可能被认为战区国家之人，都应该接受专业训练。 在互联网上搜索“应对敌对环境课程”，也许能找到提供培训的当地公司的地址。 这门课程通常会涵盖在此讨论到的所有问题，经常会以实战经验的方式加以深入。 课程训练通常要持续 2-5 天，将涉及角色扮演、急救方式训练，有时也涉及武装训练。 关于野外生存的书籍和杂志很常见，但关于战区生存的出版物却很少。
mt: Anyone planning to travel to a country that may be considered a war zone should undergo professional training.  Search the internet for "hostile environment training" and you may find the address of a local company that provides training.  This course will cover all of the issues discussed here, often in a practical way using real-life experience.  Training usually lasts 2-5 days and will involve role-playing, first aid training, and sometimes armed training.  Books and magazines on wilderness survival are common, but publications on survival in a war zone are rare.
ref: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training. A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company. A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience. A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.

src: 净水的方法有很多，有些对特定的污染更有效。 在某些地区，水煮一分钟就足够了，在其他地区则需要几分钟的时间。 过滤器的效果各不相同，如果对此有所顾虑，那么您应该考虑购买信誉好的公司生产的密封瓶装水。
mt: There are many ways to purify water, some are more effective against certain contaminants. In some areas, a minute in boiling water is enough, in others, it takes a few minutes. The effectiveness of filters varies, if you are concerned about this, you should consider buying bottled water from reputable companies.
ref: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats. In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed. Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.

src: 离岸流是海浪从海滩快速回流到海中的回流，通常发生在暗礁或类似的地方。 水下的地形造成回流集中于几处较深的区域，那里可能会形成流向深水的急流。 大部分死亡都是因逆流而上、体力透支造成的，逆着水流游泳不太可能成功。 摆脱湍急水流之后，游回来就没有那么困难了。 努力游往你不会再次被困住的地方，或者等待救援（取决于你的技能以及你是否已被发现）。
mt: 1. Offshore currents are the backwash of waves from the beach to the sea, usually occurring near reefs or similar places. The underwater terrain causes the backwash to concentrate in a few deeper areas, where it may form a current flowing toward deep water. Most deaths are due to exhaustion from swimming against the current, and swimming against the current is not likely to succeed. After escaping the swift current, swimming back is not so difficult. Strive to swim to a place where you will not be trapped again, or wait for rescue (depending on your skills and whether you have been spotted).
ref: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar. Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there. Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible. As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally. Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.

src: 内陆水道可以作为假期游玩的一个不错的主题。 例如，在卢瓦尔河谷和莱茵河谷参观城堡，或者乘游轮去游览多瑙河沿岸好玩的城市，或者沿伊利运河乘船游玩。 它们还为热门的徒步和自行车骑行路径明确了路线。
mt: Inland waterways can be a good theme for a holiday. For example, visiting castles in the Loire Valley and the Rhine Valley, or taking a cruise along the Danube to visit interesting cities, or sailing along the Erie Canal. They also provide clear routes for popular walking and cycling paths.
ref: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around. For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal. They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.

src: 北部与萨赫勒地区接壤；南部和西部临大西洋。 女性：建议无论实际婚姻状况如何，所有女性游客都应说自己已婚。 戴戒指也会有帮助（但不要戴看上去太贵的戒指。 女性应该意识到文化差异可能会导致她们所认为的骚扰行为；而且被人尾随、抓胳膊等情况并不少见。 拒绝男人时要坚定，别害怕坚持自己的立场（不管文化有无差异，都要果断回绝！）。
mt: Borders with the Sahel region in the north; the Atlantic Ocean in the south and west. Women: All female tourists should say they are married, regardless of their actual marital status. Wearing a ring will also help (but don't wear a ring that looks too expensive. Women should be aware that cultural differences may lead to their interpreting harassment as something else; and being followed, grabbed by the arm, etc. is not uncommon. When rejecting men, be firm, don't be afraid to stand your ground (no matter the cultural differences, be firm in your rejection!).
ref: In the north the region is bounded by the Sahel, and in the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. Women: It is recommended that any women travellers say that they are married, regardless of actual marital status. It is helpful to also wear a ring (just not one that looks too expensive. Women should realize that cultural differences may result in what they would consider harassment and it is not uncommon to be followed, grabbed by the arm, etc. Be firm in turning down men, and don't be afraid to stand your ground (cultural differences or not, it doesn't make it ok!).

src: 对摄影师来说，野生动物是最难拍的对象之一。好运、耐心、经验、精良的设备，缺一不可。 很多人对野生动物摄影习以为常，但就像普通摄影作品一样，一张照片胜过千言万语。 拍摄野生动物通常会用到长焦镜头，不过拍鸟群或微小生物之类的对象则需要其他镜头。 许多珍稀动物很难找到，公园有时也有针对商业摄影的规定。 野生动物有的怕人，有的具有攻击性。环境可能寒冷、炎热或恶劣。
mt: For wildlife photographers, wild animals are one of the most difficult subjects to capture. Good luck, patience, experience, and top-notch equipment are all essential. Many people are accustomed to wildlife photography, but just like ordinary photography, a picture is worth a thousand words. Long focal length lenses are often used to capture wildlife, but bird flocks and microorganisms require other lenses. Many rare animals are difficult to find, and some parks have regulations for commercial photography. Some wild animals are afraid of people, and some are aggressive. The environment may be cold, hot, or harsh.
ref: Wildlife is among the most challenging motifs for a photographer, and needs a combination of good luck, patience, experience and good equipment. Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words. Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, though things like a flock of birds or a tiny creature need other lenses. Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks sometimes have rules about taking photographs for commercial purposes. Wild animals might either be shy or aggressive. The environment might be cold, hot, or otherwise hostile.

src: 任何在高纬度地区开车或翻越山口的人，都应该考虑到可能遭遇下雪、结冰或冻结温度的情况。 在冰雪覆盖的路面上，摩擦力很小，你不能像在光洁的柏油路上一样开车。 暴雪时，极短时间内降雪量就可以足以困住你。 降雪、飘雪、车窗上的水珠或结冰可能也会挡住视线。 另一方面，冰雪天气在很多国家都十分常见，全年交通也几乎不会中断。
mt: Anyone driving in high-latitude areas or over mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow, ice, or freezing temperatures. On icy roads, friction is low, and you can't drive like you would on a smooth asphalt road. In a snowstorm, snow can accumulate quickly enough to trap you. Snow, sleet, water on the windshield, or ice can also obstruct your view. On the other hand, snow is common in many countries, and traffic is rarely interrupted throughout the year.
ref: Anyone who's going to drive at high latitudes or over mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow, ice, or freezing temperatures. On icy and snowy roadways, friction is low and you cannot drive as if you were on bare asphalt. During blizzards, enough snow to get you stuck can fall in very little time. Visibility may also be restricted by falling or blowing snow or by condensation or ice on vehicle windows. On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic goes on mostly uninterrupted all year round.

src: 除非你是外交官，否则在海外工作一般需要向所在国家/地区缴纳所得税。 国家不同，所得税的结构是不同的，税率和税率等级也有很大的差异。 一些联邦国家，比如美国和加拿大，会征收联邦和地方所得税，因此税率和等级可能因地区而异。
mt: Unless you are a diplomat, you generally need to pay income tax in the country where you work. The structure of income tax varies by country, as do tax rates and tax brackets. Some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, collect federal and local income tax, so tax rates and brackets may vary by region.
ref: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in. Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.

src: 世界博览会（俗称万国博览会，简称世博）是一场展示艺术和科学的国际盛会。 参与国在国家展馆中举办艺术和教育展览，展示世界问题或本国的文化和历史。 世界园艺博览会是展示花卉、植物园和与植物有关的一切。 虽然理论上世博会可以每年举行一次（只要在不同的国家举办就行），但实际上并非如此。 这些项目的持续时间通常从三到六个月不等，而且是在不小于 50 公顷的场地里举行。
mt: A World's Fair, or World Exposition, is an exhibition of arts, sciences, industries, and ideas from all over the world. Participating countries hold art and education exhibitions in their national pavilions, showcasing world problems or their own culture and history. A World Horticultural Exposition is an exhibition of flowers, botanical gardens, and everything related to plants. Although World's Fairs can theoretically be held every year (as long as they are held in different countries), in practice they are not. These projects usually last from three to six months and are held on sites of at least 50 hectares.
ref: A World's Fair (commonly called World Exposition, or simply Expo) is large international festival of arts and sciences. Participating countries present artistic and educational displays in national pavilions to showcase world issues or their country's culture and history. International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events which showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants. Although in theory they can take place annually (so long as they are in different countries), in practice they are not. These events normally last anywhere between three and six months, and are held on sites no smaller than 50 hectares.

src: 虽然公园里许多动物都见惯了人类，但野生动物毕竟是野生动物，我们不应该去喂养或打扰它们。 公园的管理人员表示：与熊和狼至少要保持 100 码/米的距离，而与所有其他野生动物则需要保持 25 码/米的距离！ 无论看起来是多么的温顺，野牛、麋鹿、驼鹿、熊等几乎所有的大型动物都有可能攻击人类。 每年，数十名游客都会因未能保持适当距离而受伤。这些动物体型庞大，充满野性，具有潜在的危险性，因此请给它们留出一些空间。 此外，要注意气味会引来熊和其他野生动物，因此要避免携带或烹饪散发气味的食物，并保持营地清洁。
mt: While many animals in the park are used to humans, wild animals are wild animals, and we shouldn't go feed or disturb them. Park officials say: Keep at least 100 yards (meters) away from bears and wolves, and 25 yards (meters) away from all other wild animals! No matter how tame they look, wild bison, elk, moose, caribou, bears, and almost all large animals can attack humans. Every year, dozens of visitors are injured for not keeping a proper distance. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so please give them some space. Also, be aware that smells will attract bears and other wild animals, so avoid carrying or cooking food with a strong smell, and keep your camp clean.
ref: Though many of the animals in the park are used to seeing humans, the wildlife is nonetheless wild and should not be fed or disturbed. According to park authorities, stay at least 100 yards/meters away from bears and wolves and 25 yards/meters from all other wild animals! No matter how docile they may look, bison, elk, moose, bears, and nearly all large animals can attack. Each year, dozens of visitors are injured because they didn't keep a proper distance. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them their space. In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.
